text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Teˈ kyok tmikoˈn Jesús juntl majl twutzjo moẍ , bˈeˈx el spikyˈeˈ kyiˈj twutz , ex bˈeˈx bˈant tkaˈyin wen . Texjo tqan , bˈeˈx ul Dios te ichin .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Bˈeˈxsin aj tchqˈoˈn Jesús tuˈn taj tja , me nej xi tqˈmaˈn te : Mina meltzˈajla toj tnam , chiˈ .

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ ikyjo , bˈeˈx i xiˈ Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin kyojjo muchˈ najbˈil toj tnam te Cesarea Filipo . Nchi bˈaj bˈettaq , teˈ t ‑ xi tqanin Jesús kye : ¿ Ankyeqiˈn toj kywutzjo jniˈ xjal ? chiˈ .

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: Xi kytzaqˈwin t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin kyjaluˈn : At junjun nqˈmaˈnte qa ajiy qtzan Juan , a Jawsil Aˈ ; at junjuntl nqˈmaˈnte qa ajiy Elías , a yolil Tyol Dios . Ex at junjuntl nqˈmaˈnte qa ajiy jun yolil Tyol Dios jaw itzˈje juntl majl .

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: ¿ Yajtzin kye toj kywutz ? ¿ Ankyeqiˈn ? chi Jesúsjo . Xi ttzaqˈwin Pegr : A tejiy Crist , a skˈoˈnxix tuˈn Dios , tuˈn tul tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , chiˈ .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús kye , tuˈn mina chi ok tene qˈmalte kye jniˈ xjal .

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: Ok tenl Jesús xnaqˈtzil kye t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin . Xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Ayiˈn , a Tkˈwal Ichin , a skˈoˈnxix tuˈn Dios , nimx kykyˈelix wuˈn , ex ok kchin elil iˈjliˈn kyuˈn kynejilxjal ex kyuˈn kynejil pale junx kyukˈa tkyaqil xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil . Kchin kˈwel bˈyoˈn kyuˈn , me toj toxin qˈij kchin jawil anqˈintla juntl majl .

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Tej tbˈaj tyolin Jesús , ex teˈ tbˈinte Pegr ikyjo , bˈeˈx ex tkˈleˈn najchaq chˈintl , exsin ok ten yisolte tuˈn tqˈma , qa tuˈntaq tbˈajjo jniˈ ikyjo tiˈj .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: Ajtz meltzˈaj Jesús kaˈyil kyiˈjjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , exsin ok ten yisolte Pegr : ¡ Pegr ! Ayetziˈn tyola ikyjo , tyol tajaw il , quˈn a taj tajaw iljo tuˈn tbˈantjo kyaj xjal , ex nya a taj Dios . ¡ Ay , tajaw il , laqˈemila nkˈatza ! chiˈ .

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Bˈeˈxsin i xi ttxkoˈn Jesús t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin exsin jniˈ xjal , ex xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Ankye jun taj tuˈn tok te nxnaqˈtzbˈiˈn , il tiˈj tuˈn tel tiˈn toj tkˈuˈj tkyaqil tajbˈil , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi tqˈoˈn tibˈ , tuˈn t ‑ xi lipe wiˈja toj tkyaqil , exla qa ma kyim twutz cruz .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Ikytziˈn , alkye taj noq tuˈn tkubˈ tbˈinchin tajbˈil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , kxeˈl toj najin te jun majx . Ex alkye kˈwel tzyuˈn tibˈ tiˈj tkyaqiljo at tajbˈin kyexjal tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , noq tuˈn npaja ex tuˈn tpajjo Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , ktenbˈil tchwinqil te jun majx .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: ¿ Quˈn tiˈxsila tajbˈin tuˈn tkanbˈit tkyaqiljo ajbˈil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , exsin tuˈn tnaj tanmin ? ¿ Ma akutzin tzˈok tkyaqil tqˈinimil te klol tanmin ?

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: ¿ Ma akutzin klet tchwinqil noq tuˈn pwaq ?

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: Ikytziˈn , aj qa at jun saj txˈixwe wiˈja ex tiˈjjo nyola kywutzjo jniˈ xjal aj il , ex ikyx wejiˈy , ayiˈn Tkˈwal Ichin , ex ok kchin tzajil txˈixwe weˈ te , aj wula tukˈa nkawbˈila ex tukˈa tkyaqil tqoptzˈajiyil nMaˈn junx kyukˈa jniˈ xjan angel .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Ex xi tqˈmaˈnl Jesús kye : Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy ; at junjun iteˈ tzaluˈn wukˈiy , mi kyli kyimin , tzmaxi aj kylonte nimku tipin Tkawbˈil Dios tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ qaq qˈij , i xi tkleˈn Jesús oxe t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin tukˈa , a Pegr , Santyaw exsin Juan , ex i kanin twiˈ jun wutz . Kywutzx t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , txˈixpitjo kaˈyin .

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: Ex t ‑ xbˈalin ox qoptzˈajx wen , manyor sjaninx tzeˈnku jun bˈuˈẍ , a aˈkxtaq tbˈaj txjet .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Iwletzin Jesús kyuˈn t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin nchi yolintaq kyukˈa Elías ex Moisés .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Bˈeˈx i xobˈxjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , teˈ kylonte ikyjo . Ante Pegr ntiˈl tumil jyet tuˈn ; oˈkx xi tqˈmaˈn te Jesús : ¡ Xnaqˈtzil ! Tbˈanilx teˈ otoˈ tzaluˈn . Kˈaˈ kubˈ qbˈinchiˈn oxe tal pach ; jun te , ex jun te Moisés , ex jun te Elías .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Texjo paq , tej tkubˈ juktzˈaj jun muj kyibˈaj . Ex tojjo muj etz yolin jun tqˈajqˈojil , ex tqˈma : Axixpen wejiˈy Nkˈwal lo kˈuˈjlinxix wuˈn . ¡ Kybˈinkujiˈy Tyol !

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Atzaj teˈ t ‑ xi kykaˈyin t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin kyiˈjile , mix aˈl kyli , oˈkxl Jesús .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Teˈ kymeltzˈaj twiˈ wutz , xi toqxeninxix Jesús kyeˈ kyjaluˈn : Mix alqe kxele kyqˈmaˈnjiˈy a ma kyliy , tzmaxi aj njatz anqˈin , a ayiˈn Tkˈwal Ichin , kyxol kyimnin , chiˈ .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Ex mix al qe txi kyqˈmaˈne ; noq kyij ten kyxolx , me nchi yolintaq tzeˈn tzˈelpineˈ yol , a tuˈn tjaw anqˈin juntl majl .

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Xi kyqanin te Jesús : ¿ Tzeˈntzin ttentz nkyqˈmaˈn xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil , qa ataq Elías tuˈn tul nej twutza ? ¿ Nyapela tiˈjjo lo nchi yolinetaq , a ma qliˈy ?

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Twutzx teˈ . Ate Elías tuˈntaq tul nej , tuˈntzintla noq bˈinchil kytenxjal , aj wula . Me ntqˈmaˈntl Tuˈjil Tyol Dios qa nimx tuˈn tikyˈx tuˈn Tkˈwal Ichin , ex qa tuˈn tel ikyˈin kyuˈn xjal .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: Ex kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , o tzul te Elías , quˈn ate Juan , a Jawsil Aˈ , ul te t ‑ xel . Ex kubˈ kybˈinchinxjal tiˈj tzeˈnkuxtaq kyaj , ikyxjo tzeˈnku ntqˈmaˈn Tyol Dios .

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Kykˈulinxi twiˈ wutz kyukˈa oxe t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin kykˈatzjo txqantl , ayeˈ nchi yolintaql kyukˈa xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil , ex attaql txqan xjal kyiˈjile .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Teˈ tiwle kyuˈnxjal , chˈixtaq tkanin kykˈatz , i jaw kaˈylaj , ex bˈeˈx i el rinin qˈolbˈilte Jesús .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Xitzin tqanin Jesús kyexjal : ¿ Tiˈtzin nkyyoliˈn kyukˈa nxnaqˈtzbˈiˈn ?

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Tzajtzin ttzaqˈwin jun ichin kyxoljo txqan xjal : Xnaqˈtzil , ma tzaj wiˈn nkˈwala twutza , tuˈn tkubˈ tqˈaniˈn , quˈn mina nbˈant tyolin , tuˈn tzyuˈn tuˈn jun taqˈnil tajaw il .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Noq ja taˈ , aj ttzaj tiˈj , ex bˈeˈx nkubˈ tzˈaq tuˈn , ex nbˈaj n ‑ etz plut toj ttzi , tzunx nchi juˈchˈin tste , ex bˈeˈx n ‑ el ttxˈiˈlin tibˈ . Ma txi ntqˈmaˈn kye t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈiˈn , tuˈn tex kylajoˈn taqˈnil tajaw il toj tanmin , me mina n ‑ ex kyuˈn .

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús kye t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin : Ntiˈxsin kynimbˈila tiˈj Dios . ¿ Jteˈxsin qˈij nkubˈlin ten kyxola , ex naˈmxsin tok qeˈ kykˈuˈja wiˈja ? ¿ Jteˈxsila qˈij kkyˈelixjo ikyjo wuˈn ? Qˈintzinjiy qˈa , chiˈ .

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Xitzin kyiˈntz . Atzin teˈ tiwle Jesús tuˈn taqˈnil tajaw il , tzaj kyimin tiˈjjo qˈa ex jaw luˈlin . Kubˈ tzˈaq , ex jaw ttolin tibˈ twutz txˈotxˈ , ex bˈajetz plut toj ttzi .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: Xitzin tqanin Jesús teˈ ttata : ¿ Jteˈxitzin qˈij ttzyetlin tuˈn ikyjo ? chiˈ . Xi ttzaqˈwiˈn ttata : Atxixjo te muchˈxtaq .

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: Ilaˈ maj o txiˈxi tzˈaq toj qˈaqˈ ex toj aˈ tuˈn tkyim . Qa aku bˈant jun tiˈ tuˈn tiˈj , qˈaqˈintzin tkˈuˈja qiˈja ; qˈaninkutzin chˈin .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús te : Atzin ntzaj tqˈmaˈn weˈy , qa aku bˈant jun tiˈ wuˈn tiˈj tkˈwala . Kaˈn . Bˈinkutziˈn . Qa at jun xjal at tnimbˈil wiˈja , tkyaqilx aku bˈant wuˈn tiˈj .

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Atzin ttata qˈa jaw ẍchˈin , ex xi tqˈmaˈn : Qˈuqle weˈ nkˈuˈj tiˈja . Me chin tmojintza tuˈn tok qexix wen .

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Teˈ tok tkaˈyin Jesús nimx xjal nbˈaj rinin tuˈn kykanin tkˈatz , xi tqˈmaˈn te taqˈnil tajaw il : Noq tuˈn tpaja , mina nbˈant tbˈiˈn ex tyolin qˈa . Kxel nqˈmaˈn teˈy , tuˈn tetza toj tanmin , ex tuˈn mina tzˈokx majla .

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Atzin taqˈnil tajaw il jaw ẍchˈin wen , ex tbˈinche tuˈn ttzaj junl majl kyimin tiˈjjo qˈa , ex bˈeˈx etzkux toj tanmin , ex kyij tqˈoˈn tzeˈnku jun kyimnin . Nimxl xjal qˈmante qa otaq tzˈel kyim te jun majx .

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: Me ante Jesús jaw t ‑ xkoˈn ex kubˈ twaˈbˈin .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Tetziˈn tokx Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin toj jun ja kyjunalx , xi kyqanin t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin te : ¿ Tzeˈntzin tten mi xbˈant qe qlajon teˈ taqˈnil tajaw il toj tanminjo qˈa ? chi chiˈ .

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Atzin taqˈnil tajaw il ikyjo , nbˈant tlajet noq tukˈa naˈj Dios .

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Kyikyˈlinxi antza , i ikyˈku toj Galiley . Tkyˈeˈtaq Jesús tuˈn tel tqanil ,

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: quˈn nchex t ‑ xnaqˈtzintaqjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin . Ex nxitaq tqˈmaˈn kye : Ayintziˈn Tkˈwal Ichin , skˈoˈnqiˈn tuˈn Dios , kchin xel qˈoˈn kyeˈ xjal , tuˈn nkubˈ kybˈyoˈn , chiˈ . Aj nkyima , me toj toxin qˈij , kchin jawitz anqˈin juntl majl .

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: Minataq n ‑ el kynikyˈ te tiˈtaq tzˈelpine yol ikyjo , quˈn nchi xobˈtaq tuˈn t ‑ xi kyqanin .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: Kykaninxitzin toj Capernaum ; i okx toj jun ja , ex xi tqanin Jesús kye : ¿ Titziˈn nkyyolintaqa toj bˈe ?

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Me noq i bˈaj kubˈ mutxe tuˈn kytxˈixew , quˈn otaq bˈaj kubˈ kyyolintaq alkye nimxtaq toklin kyxol .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Kubˈ qe Jesús , ex i xi ttxkoˈn t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin tkˈatz , exsin xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Alkye taj tuˈn tok te tnejil kyxol xjal , ilx tiˈj tuˈn tok te tchˈibˈil , ex tuˈn tajbˈin kye txqantl .

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Tzaj ttxkoˈn Jesús jun tal kˈwal , ex kubˈ twaˈbˈin kyxolx , ex jaw tchleˈn . Xi tqˈmaˈn kye :

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: Alkye kxel kˈmonte jun tal kˈwal tzeˈnku lo , noq tuˈn tnimbˈil tiˈj nbˈiˈy , nya noq oˈkxjo kˈwal kxel tkˈmoˈn , qalaˈ majqinxa ; ex atziˈn xjal kxel kˈmon weˈy , nya noq oˈkqinxa kchin xel tkˈmoˈn , qalaˈ majxjo Dios , a tzaj chqˈoˈn weˈy .

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Juan te Jesús : Xnaqˈtzil , o qli qeˈ jun xjal , a nchi etzjo jniˈ taqˈnil tajaw il toj kyanminxjal tuˈn , noq toj tumil tbˈiy , me nya jun qukˈa . Tuˈnpetzintzjo , kyij qqˈmaˈn teˈ , tuˈn mina kubˈ tbˈinchintaqljo ikyjo .

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Me ante Jesús xi tqˈmaˈn kye : ¡ Mina txi kyqˈmaˈn kye ikyjo ! Quˈn alkyeˈ nkubˈ tbˈinchin jun tiˈ wen nimx toklin tiˈj nbˈiˈy , nya ajqˈoj wiˈja , ex nlay jaw yolbˈin wiˈja .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Quˈn atziˈn luˈn nya qiˈjbˈinxi taˈ , qukˈa taˈ teˈ .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Aˈlchaqx kye jun xjaltz tzaj qˈoˈnte chˈin tiˈ kyeˈy , iˈchaqx noq jun tal pulbˈil aˈ , quˈn tuˈn weqiˈy , twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn , ok ktzajil chjon teˈ tuˈn Dios .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: Alkye jun xjal tjoy ttxolil tzeˈn tten , tuˈn tkubˈ tzˈaq jun muchˈ kˈwal tiˈj tnimbˈil wiˈja , wenpetla te te , tuˈn tok tkˈloˈn jun abˈj te chebˈl triy tiˈj tqul , exsintla xi t ‑ xoˈn tibˈ toj aˈ , tuˈn tkyim .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Qa noq tuˈn tpaj jun tqˈobˈa mo jun tqan , aku kubˈ tzˈaqiy toj il , bˈantla tuˈn tel ttxˈemin , exsin tuˈn tokxa toj kyaˈj tukˈa junchˈin tqˈobˈa , tzeˈnkuljo tuˈn t ‑ xiˈy toj qˈaqˈ tukˈa kykabˈil .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Toj qˈaqˈ , aye ẍchuqˈ mina nchi kyim , ex mina nyupjjo qˈaqˈ .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ikyxjo qa tuˈn tpaj tqan , aku kubˈ tzˈaqiy toj il , bˈantla tuˈn tel ttxˈemin , exsin tuˈn tokxa toj kyaˈj noq tukˈa junchˈin tqan , tzeˈnkuljo tuˈn t ‑ xiˈy toj qˈaqˈ tukˈa kykabˈilx ,

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: quˈn toj qˈaqˈ , aye ẍchuqˈ mina nchi kyim ex mina nyupjjo qˈaqˈ .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Ikyxjo qa noq tuˈn tpaj twutza , aku kubˈ tzˈaqiy toj il , wenitla tuˈn tetz tiˈn , exsin tuˈn tokxa toj kyaˈj jaˈ nkawine Dios , tukˈa junchˈin twutza , tzeˈnkuljo tuˈn t ‑ xiˈy toj qˈaqˈ tukˈa kykabˈilx ,

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: quˈn toj qˈaqˈ , aye ẍchuqˈ mina nchi kyim , ex mina nyupjjo qˈaqˈ .

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: N ‑ ajbˈin te atzˈin tiˈj chibˈj , tuˈn mi junxiyixe . Ikyqexsin qeˈ , kkyˈelix tiˈchaqku tiˈ quˈn , tuˈn mina qox toj il .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Nimx n ‑ ajbˈine atzˈin te aqˈbˈil ttxutxjil qchiˈ . Me tzˈelit naj tpitzˈmejil , ntiˈ aku tzˈajbˈine qe . Tzˈelit tnaj tpitzˈmejil , ikyxjo tzeˈnku jun xjal tzˈel naj twenil kywutzx xjal ex twutz Dios . Tuˈnpetzintzjo , tentzin kywenila kykyaqilxa , tuˈntzin tten tzaljbˈil kyxola .

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Etz Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin tojjo tnam Capernaum , exsin i xiˈ tojjo txˈotxˈ te Judey , ex i xiˈ tojjo txˈotxˈ tjlajxi Nim Aˈ Jordán . Pon chmet txqan xjal tiˈjile antza , ex ok ten xnaqˈtzilkye tzeˈnkuxtaqjo ntenetaq tuˈn .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Kyxoltziˈn xjal , i kanin junjun Parisey , tuˈn t ‑ xi kyqanin jun tumil , tzeˈn tten tuˈn tkubˈ tzˈaq toj til tiˈjjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈil . Chi chiˈ kyjaluˈn : ¿ Wenpetzila , tuˈn tkubˈ tpaˈn jun ichin tibˈ tukˈa t ‑ xuˈjil ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin : ¿ Tiˈtzin kyij ttzˈibˈin Moisés kyeˈy toj Ojtxe Kawbˈil ?

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Xi kytzaqˈwin : Ttziye te Moisés , tuˈn tkubˈ bˈinchit jun uˈj te kypaˈbˈlxjal kyibˈ . Ikytzin n ‑ aje kychqˈoˈne ichin kyxuˈjil tja kytata .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús : Tzaj tqˈoˈn Moisésjo kawbˈil ikyjo , quˈn tuˈn tkujil kyanmiˈn , tuˈn kykyˈeˈy kubˈ kyniminjiˈy tkawbˈil Dios kyij tqˈoˈn te tnejil .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Quˈn tnejilxix , kubˈ tbˈinchin Dios jun ichin ex jun qya .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kyjel ttzaqpiˈn te ichin ttata ex tnana , noq tuˈn tok meje tukˈa t ‑ xuˈjil .

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: Ex kykabˈilx kchi okil te junchˈin .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , nlay tzˈel tpaˈn te xjaljo , a s ‑ ok tmujbˈin Dios .

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Telninxitzin bˈajjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈil , i xiˈ toj jun ja . Atzaj teˈ kykanin , xi kyqanin t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin juntl majl te tiˈjxjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈil kyiˈj paˈl kyibˈ .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús kye : Qa at jun ichin xkubˈ tpaˈn tibˈ tukˈa t ‑ xuˈjil , exsin qa ma jaw meje tukˈa juntl qya , aj kyˈaˈjiljo ichin ikyjo twutz tnejil t ‑ xuˈjil .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Ex ikyxjo jun qya , qa ma kubˈ tpaˈn tibˈ tukˈa tchmil , ex qa ma jaw meje tukˈa juntl ichin , aj kyˈaˈjiljo qya ikyjo twutz tnejil tchmil .

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: I bˈaj tzaj kyiˈnxjal junjun tal kˈwal tkˈatz Jesús , tuˈn tkubˈ tqˈoˈn tqˈobˈ kyibˈaj , tuˈn kykubˈ tkyˈiwlin . Me ayetziˈn t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin bˈeˈx i ok ten yisol kyeˈ nchi bˈaj kanintaq .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Tej kyok tkaˈyin Jesús ikyjo , bˈeˈx tzaj tqˈoj kyiˈj t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , ex xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Kytzaqpinqetzjiˈy tal kˈwal , tuˈn kybˈaj tzaj laqˈe nkˈatza . Mi chi kubˈ kymeqoˈn , quˈn kykyaqiljo kˈwel kymutxsin kyibˈ tzeˈnqeˈ tal kˈwal lo , ayepen kye kchi okixjo toj Tkawbˈil Dios .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy ; qa ntiˈ tqˈuqbˈil kykˈuˈja wiˈja tzeˈnku jun kˈwal , nlay bˈant tkawin Dios toj kychwinqila .

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: I jaw tchleˈn kˈwal , ex i kubˈ tkyˈiwlin tukˈa tqˈobˈ .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Teˈ t ‑ xiˈ Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , pon rinin jun ichin tkˈatz , exsin kubˈ meje twutz , ex xi tqanin te : Ay , xnaqˈtzil wenxix , ¿ Tiˈn kˈwel nbˈinchiˈn , tuˈn nkanbˈintejiˈy chwinqil te jun majx ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : ¿ Tiquˈn ntzaj tqˈmaˈn qa wenqiˈn ? Ntiˈx jun te xjal wen tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , qalaˈ oˈkx te Dios .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: ¿ On chi tbˈijiy tkawbˈil Dios ? Mi bˈiyiˈn . Mi kyˈaˈjiˈn . Mi tzˈelqˈiˈn . Mi jaw bˈant yol tiˈj jun aˈla noq tuˈn kukxjo . Niminkujiy ttatiy ex tnaniy .

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn ichin te Jesús : Xnaqˈtzil , kykyaqilxjo anetziˈn , o bˈaj bˈant wuˈn atxix toj nqˈayila .

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Xi tkaˈyin Jesús tukˈa tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj , ex xi ttzaqˈwin : Noq junchˈintl tuˈn tbˈant tuˈn : Kux txiˈy kˈayil teˈ tkyaqiljo jniˈ at teˈy , ex oyinxjiy jniˈ tpwaqa kye yaj . Ikytzin ktenbˈila tqˈinimiljiy toj kyaˈj . Exsin ku tzajtza lipeka wiˈja .

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Tej tbˈin teˈ qˈinin ikyjo , bˈeˈx jaw bˈisin , quˈn manyor qˈininxtaq .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Teˈ tajjo qˈinin tja , jaw kaˈylaj Jesús tiˈjile , exsin xi tqˈmaˈntz kye t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin : Kujx teˈ luˈn kye qˈinin , tuˈn kyokx toj Tkawbˈil Dios .

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Ex ikyqexjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , bˈeˈx i jaw kaˈylaj , teˈ kybˈin teˈ ikyjo . Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús kye : Nkˈwal , kujx teˈ tuˈn tokx jun xjal toj Tkawbˈil Dios .

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Kxel nqˈmaˈn juntl majl kyeˈy : Jun paqxla aku tzˈex jun chej toj toyajil jun bˈaq te slepbˈil bˈuˈẍ , tzeˈnkul teˈ tuˈn tokx jun qˈinin toj Tkawbˈil Dios .

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ayetzin t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , teˈ kybˈin teˈ ikyjo , i jaw kaˈylajxixtl , ex i jaw qanlaj kyxolilex : Qa nlay chi okx qˈinin toj kyaˈj , ¿ Yajtzila qetz ? ¿ Altzila kye k ‑ okixtz ?

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: I ok tkaˈyin Jesús , ex i xi ttzaqˈwin : Nlay bˈant tuˈn kyklet ‑ xjal kyuˈnx kyibˈx . Me mete Dios kbˈantil teˈ tuˈn tkyaqil .

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Ok ten Pegr qˈmalte te Jesús : Ma kyij qtzaqpinqejiˈy tkyaqiljo jniˈ attaq qeˈy , ex loqoˈy lipcheqok tiˈja .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , aˈlchaqx kye kyij ttzaqpiˈn jniˈ tja , ttziky , titzˈin , tnana , ttata , tkˈwal , jniˈ ttxˈotxˈ ex tkyaqil jniˈ at te , noq tuˈn npaja ex tuˈn tpajjo nyola ,

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: nimx t ‑ xel ktzajil tqˈoˈn Dios te twutzxjo txˈotxˈ luˈn , tzeˈnku tja , ttziky , titzˈin , tnana , tkˈwal , jniˈ ttxˈotxˈ , exla qa tukˈa yajbˈil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ . Me tojtziˈn juntl tchwinqil , ok tkanbˈe tchwinqil te jun majx .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Me nimx jaˈlin iteˈk te tnejil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , me chi kyjel te tchˈibˈil , qa ntiˈ kynimbˈil . Ex nimx ntiˈ kyoklin tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ jaˈlin , me kchi okil te tnejil noq tuˈn kynimbˈil .

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Kyjaˈtaq kyjax Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin tzma Jerusalén ; nejnin Jesús kywutzjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , ex aye t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin tzaj tchewil kyiˈj , quˈn bˈeˈx kynabˈle tiˈ tuˈntaq tbˈaj tiˈj Jesús antza . Ex ayetzin xjal lipcheqextaq kyiˈj , bˈeˈx i tzaj xobˈ tuˈn ikyjo . Ajtz meltzˈaj Jesús , ex i tzaj ttxkoˈn t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin kyjunalx , ex ok ten qˈmalte kye :

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: Ikytziˈn tzeˈnku n ‑ ok kykaˈyiˈn , chˈix qjapin Jerusalén , a jaˈ ayiˈn , a Tkˈwal Ichin , kchin xel kˈayiˈn kyeˈ kynejil kypale Judiy exsin kyeˈ xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil . Kyqˈmaˈbˈil qa ayiˈn at npaja , noq tuˈn nkubˈ bˈyokuy kyuˈn aj il .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Kchin okil kyxmayiˈn , kbˈajil kytzubˈin wiˈja , kchin okil kylankˈiˈn , exsin kchin kˈwel kybˈyoˈn . Me toj toxin qˈij , kchin jawil anqˈiˈntla . Ikytzin bˈaj tyolin Jesúsjo kywutz t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin .

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Atzin te Santyaw exsin Juan , kˈwalbˈajqe te Zebedey , i xi laqˈe tkˈatz Jesús , exsin xi kyqˈmaˈn te : Xnaqˈtzil , qaja tuˈn tbˈinchiˈn jun bˈaˈn qiˈja .

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : ¿ Tiˈtzin kyaja tuˈn tkubˈ nbˈinchiˈn kyiˈja ?

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Xi kyqˈmaˈn : Qˈontza qokliˈn , tuˈn qkubˈ qeˈy toj Tkawbˈila toj tman qˈobˈa ex juntl toj tẍnayaja kawil tukˈiy .

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Mina n ‑ el kynikyˈa tiˈjjo ntzaj kyqaniˈn weˈy . ¿ Ma akutzin tzikyˈx kyeˈ kyuˈn tkyaqiljo jniˈ kkyˈelix wuˈn ? ¿ Ex ma akutzin kypa kyeˈ tkyaqil yajbˈil kkyˈelix wuˈn ?

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Xi kytzaqˈwintz : Ok kkyˈelix qe quˈn . Xi ttzaqˈwinl Jesús kye : Twutzx teˈ , akula tzikyˈx kye kyuˈn tzeˈnku weˈ kkyˈelix wuˈn ,

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: me atziˈn tuˈn tkubˈ qe jun kyeˈ toj nman qˈobˈa ex juntl toj nẍnayaja kawil wukˈiy , nyaqin weˈ tiˈj teˈ ; qalaˈ a nMaˈn , quˈn oˈkx teˈ ojtzqilte ex bˈilte alqe kxele tqˈoˈne .

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Atzaj teˈ tok kybˈiˈn lajajtl t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin ikyjo , bˈeˈx tzaj kyqˈoj kyiˈj Santyaw ex Juan .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Me i xi ttxkoˈn Jesús kykyaqilx , ex xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Ojtzqiˈnl kyeˈ kyuˈn tzeˈn kytenxjal nya nimil ; quˈn ayetziˈn tnejil kawil , qa tiˈx jun tiˈ , manyor txˈuˈjqex tukˈa kykawbˈil , quˈn nyakuj etzinqe kyuˈn .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Me atzin kyxola , nya iky teˈ . Qalaˈ ankye teˈ taj tuˈn tok te nim toklin kyxola , il tiˈj tuˈn tajbˈin kye txqantl .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Ex ankye taj tuˈn tok te tnejil , il tiˈj tuˈn tok tzeˈnku jun aqˈnil te jun majx kye txqantl .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Quˈn kaˈntzinjiy weˈ , a ayiˈn Tkˈwal Ichin ; mi ẍin ul weˈ tuˈn kyajbˈinxjal weˈy ; qalaˈ ayin weˈ tuˈn wajbˈiˈn kye txqantl , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈoˈn nchwinqila te kyxel , tuˈn kyklet te jun majx .

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Tej kyxiˈ Jerusalén , iltaq tiˈj tuˈn kyikyˈ tojjo jun tnam , Jericó . Teˈ kyex ttxanxi tnam , lipcheqektaq txqan xjal kyiˈj . Ex attaq jun moẍ qˈuqle ttzi bˈe , Bartimey tbˈi , tkˈwal Timey , nmoˈntaq .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Teˈ tbˈiˈnte qa ataq Jesús aj Nazaret , bˈeˈx ok ten ẍchˈil : Jesús , tyajil David , qˈaqˈintz tkˈuˈja wiˈja .

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Bˈeˈx ok kyyisoˈnxjal , tuˈn tkubˈ qen , me noqx kyjaˈ jawe ẍchˈine : Tyajil David , qˈaqˈintz tkˈuˈja wiˈja .

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Teˈ tbˈinte Jesúsjo ikyjo , bˈeˈx kubˈ weˈ , ex tqˈma : ¡ Kyqˈolbˈintza ! Ex bˈeˈxsin tzaj kyqˈolbˈintz moẍ , ex xi kyqˈmaˈn te : Qe tkˈuˈja . ¡ Weˈksa ! Luˈy nqˈolbˈajtz .

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Bˈeˈxsin kyij t ‑ xoˈnkuxjo t ‑ xbˈalin , jun paqx tjaw tˈikypaj , ex xi tiˈn tibˈ , tuˈn tkanin tkˈatz Jesús .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Xi tqanin Jesús te : ¿ Tiˈ taja tuˈn tkubˈ nbˈinchiˈn tiˈja ? Xi ttzaqˈwin : Xnaqˈtzil , waja tuˈn kykaˈyin nwutza .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús te : Kux tzˈaja , noq tuˈn tnimbˈila wiˈja ma chi kaˈyin twutza . Texjo paq , kykaˈyin twutz , ex bˈeˈx ok lipe tiˈj Jesús .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Tkanin Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin kyojjo kabˈe muchˈ tnam Betfagé ex Betania , nqayin t ‑ xe wutz Olivos . Teˈ chˈixtaq kykanin toj Jerusalén , i xi tchqˈoˈn kabˈe t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , tuˈn kyxiˈ toj jun kybˈe .

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Ku kyxiˈy tojjo tal kojbˈil jlajxi . Ajtzin kyokxa ttxaˈn tnam , ok knetil jun tal bur kyuˈn , kˈloˈn , me mix jun xjal o chejinxi tibˈaj . ¡ Kypjumila , exsin kyintza tzaluˈn !

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Qa at jun aˈla saj qaninte kyeˈy . ¿ Tiquˈnil n ‑ el kypjuˈn ? qa chiˈ . At k ‑ okile te qAjaw , chichkujiˈy , me jaˈlinx tzˈajtz qqˈoˈntla .

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: I xiˈ , ex atzaj kykanin , kˈloˈntaqjo tal bur ttzi bˈe nqayin tkˈatz jun ja , exsin tzaj kypjuˈntz .

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: Me xi kyqanin jun chˈuq xjal kye , a iteˈtaq antza : ¿ Titziˈn nbˈaj kyeˈy ? ¿ Ti qe n ‑ el kypjunjiˈy tal bur ?

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Xi kyqˈmaˈntz tzeˈnkuxjo otaq txi tqˈmaˈn Jesús kye . Bˈeˈxsin tzaj kytzaqpiˈntz . Exsin tzaj kyiˈntzjo tal bur .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Atzaj teˈ tul tkˈatz Jesús , bˈaj jax kyqˈoˈn kytxoˈw tibˈaj , exsin jax qe Jesús tibˈaj .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Bˈaj kubˈ kylikyˈin jniˈ xjal kytxoˈw toj tbˈe , ex ayetziˈn txqantl bˈaj tzaj kytoqin t ‑ xaq tze , tuˈn tkubˈ kychtoˈn toj tbˈe .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: I bˈaj kubˈ nejjo txqan xjal twutz , ex txqantl bˈaj ok lipe ; kykyaqilxtaq nchi bˈaj bˈitzin wen , ex kyqˈmaˈntaq : Qo bˈitzin tiˈj tbˈi a tzul tiˈj tbˈi tAjaw Tkyaqil , quˈn kyˈiwlinxix .

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Kyˈiwlinxixa , a ma tzul kaniˈn , ay tyajil David , tuˈn tkawiˈn qxola . Nimxitjo toklin tbˈiy toj tnajbˈila .

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: I oˈkx Jesús toj Jerusalén kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , ex xiˈ tojjo tnejil ja te naˈbˈl Dios . Bˈaj tkaˈyin tiˈchaq tokxtaq toj . Bˈeˈxsin xiˈtz juntl majl kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin tzma Betania , quˈn otaq qoqix , teˈ tok kykaˈyin .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Toj junxil qˈij , teˈ kyjaˈtaq kyikyˈx tojjo Betania , otaq tzaj waˈyaj tiˈj Jesús .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Tli jun tqan iw najchaq , ẍqiyin wen . Xiˈ lolte kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , qa attaq twutz . Me teˈ kykanin , ntiˈ twutz , noq t ‑ xaq attaq , quˈn nyataq tqˈijjo tuˈn twutzin .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Tuˈntzin ikyjo , qanbˈin tiˈj , ex xi tqˈmaˈn te tqan iw : Mixla jtojx tuˈn tel twutza te kyloˈxjal . Kybˈi t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin ikyjo .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Atzaj teˈ tkanin Jesús juntl majl kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin Jerusalén , okx tojjo tnejil ja te naˈbˈl Dios . Bˈajetz tlajoˈn jniˈ xjal nchi bˈaj kˈayintaq , ex nchi bˈaj loqˈintaq toj . Bˈaj jaw tpichˈkin jniˈ kymeẍjo nchi bˈaj txˈexbˈintaq pwaq , jniˈ kyqˈuqiljo nchi bˈaj kˈayintaq palom , a aye nchi bˈaj ajbˈintaq te aqˈbˈil chjonte te Dios .

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: Ex mix ttziye tuˈn kyokx juntl majljo kˈayil .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Exsin ok ten xnaqˈtzil : Tzˈibˈinl teˈ toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios : Atzin njaˈy k ‑ okil te ja te naˈbˈl Dios te tkyaqil xjal ; me ayetzinl kyeˈ , ma chi ok qˈonte te kyja ileqˈ .

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Teˈ tok kybˈiˈn kynejil kypale aj Judiy ikyjo exqetziˈn jniˈ xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil , bˈeˈxsin i ok ten jyol ttxolil tzeˈn tuˈn tkubˈe kybˈyoˈne , quˈn otaqx tzˈok kyxobˈil te , quˈn nimxxjal otaq tzˈok lipe tiˈjjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈil .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Atzin teˈ qok yupj , bˈeˈx meltzˈaj Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Toj junxil qlixje , ikyˈ Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin tkˈatzjo tqan iw , ex ok kykaˈyin otaq jaw tzqij .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Ante Pegr , teˈ tok tkaˈyin , tzaj tnaˈn tiˈjjo tqˈma Jesús tiˈjjo tqan iw , ex xi tqˈmaˈn : Aj Xnaqˈtzil , ¡ Kaˈn ! Ma tzqij tej tqan iw , aj kyij tqˈoˈn qanbˈil tiˈj .

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Tenxix kynimbˈila tiˈj Dios , ex tiˈjjo jniˈ nbˈaj bˈant tuˈn .

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , qa at jun xjal at ‑ xix tnimbˈil , ex nya njawje , qa ma txi tqˈmaˈn te wutz luˈn , Ku tela tzaluˈn , ex ku txiˈy toj ttxuyil aˈ , qa at ‑ xix tqˈuqbˈil tkˈuˈj , ok kbˈantil .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , aj t ‑ xi kyqanin jun tiˈ toj naˈj Dios , ten kynimbˈila tuˈn ttzaj tqˈoˈn , ex ok ktzajil kykˈmoˈn .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Ex aj kyok ten naˈl Dios , kynajsinkuy til jun xjal , qa at xbˈajte kyiˈja , tuˈntzin tkubˈ tnajsin Diosjo kyeˈ .

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: Qatzin qa mina xkubˈ kynajsiˈn til jun xjal , ex nlay kubˈ najsin kyeˈ tuˈn Dios .

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ ikyjo , kykanin juntl majl Jerusalén , ex i ok ten bˈetejil tpeˈn tnejil ja te naˈbˈl Dios . I tzaj laqˈe kynejil pale kyukˈa xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil , junx kyukˈa jniˈ nejinel kyxolxjal ,

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: ex xi kyqanin te : ¿ Tiˈn tokiy tuˈn tbˈinchintejiy jniˈ lo , a nkubˈ tbˈinchiˈn ? ¿ Ex ankye saj qˈoˈnte tokliˈn ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Ex ikyx wejiˈy , kxel nqaniˈn jun nxjelbˈitza kyeˈy .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Xitzin tqanintz : ¿ Ankye tzaj chqˈoˈnte qtzan Juan tuˈn kykuˈxxjal tuˈn toj aˈ te jawsbˈil aˈ ? ¿ Apela Dios , mo noq ayexjal ? ¡ Kytzaqˈwintziˈn !

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Bˈeˈxsin bˈaj ok tentz yolil kyxolile , ex kyqˈma : Qa ma txi qqˈmaˈn a Dios , bˈeˈx ktzajil tqˈmaˈn qe , ¿ Tin quˈn mi xi kynimintza ? chilaˈ .

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: Ex qa ma txi qqˈmaˈn qa xjal , at qxobˈil . ¿ Ma nyatzin kykyaqil xjaltz qˈmante qa a Juan jun yolil Tyol Dios ?

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Mix jyetil tumil kyuˈn , tiˈ tuˈn t ‑ xi kytzaqˈwin . Oˈkx xi kyqˈmaˈn te : Nya bˈiˈn qe quˈn . I xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Exsin ikyx wejiˈy , nlay txi nqˈmaˈn weˈ , alkye saj qˈoˈnte wokliˈn tuˈn tkubˈ nbˈinchiˈn tkyaqiljo lo .

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Kubˈ tqˈoˈn Jesús jun techil tiˈj jun ichin tajaw txˈotxˈ : Jun ichin ok tawin tqan uv . Ok tchˈlajin tiˈjile , ex bˈeˈx jaw twaˈbˈin jun xkyaqˈte toj te tzajbˈilte . Exsin xi tqˈoˈntz te kymajin aqˈnil , ex bˈeˈx xiˈ najchaq .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Teˈ tul kanin tqˈij awal , tzaj tchqˈoˈn jun taqˈnil qanil teˈ twutz awal te manbˈil ttxˈotxˈ .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Me ayetzin manil , teˈ tkanin taqˈnil , bˈaj kylankˈin , ex kukxjo aj kychqˈoˈne .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Toj juntl majl tzaj tchqˈoˈn juntl taqˈnil , ex ikyxjo , bˈeˈx kyˈixbˈe twiˈ , noqx jniˈ bˈaj kyyisoˈn , ex kukxljo , aj kychqˈoˈn .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Tzaj tchqˈoˈn juntl taqˈnil ; noqx teˈ tkanin , bˈeˈx kubˈ kybˈyoˈn . I tzaj tchqˈoˈnl txqantl . Me ikyx bˈajjo kyiˈj : At kyˈixbˈe , ex at bˈeˈx bˈaj kubˈ kybˈyoˈn .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Noq jun tkˈwal kyij , tuˈn ttzaj tchqˈoˈn , a kˈuˈjlinxixtaq tuˈn . Quˈn kubˈ tbˈisin : Nyapela kˈwel kynimin nkˈwala .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: Atzin teˈ t ‑ xi kykaˈyin manil txˈotxˈ teˈ ttzajjo kˈwalbˈaj , bˈeˈx i bˈaj ja yolin kyxolile : Ate luˈn kyjel te tajaw txˈotxˈ . Tuˈnpetzintzjo , qbˈyoˈnku , tuˈntzin qkyij te tajaw .

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Bˈeˈxsin tzaj kytzyuˈn , exsin kubˈ kybˈyoˈn , ex i xtaˈj xoˈlte ttxanxi txˈotxˈ .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: ¿ Tiˈtzila kbˈajil te tajaw txˈotxˈ kyiˈjjo manil , toj kywutza , aj tul ? ¿ Nyapela bˈeˈx kchi kˈwel tbˈyoˈn , ex kxel tqˈoˈn ttxˈotxˈ te kymajin txqantl ?

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: ¿ Naˈmtzin tel kynikyˈa te ntqˈmaˈn Tyol Dios ? A abˈj , a xi kyxoˈn bˈinchil ja , a nyakuj ntiˈtaq tajbˈin , me axixpente abˈjjo ma tzˈokin te tqˈuqil tẍkyin ja , a nimxix toklin .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Atzin tbˈanilxjo ma tzaj tqˈoˈn tAjaw Tkyaqil qe , ex ma qo jaw kaˈylajx tiˈj .

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Tetziˈn tkubˈ tyolin Jesús ikyjo , bˈeˈxtaq xi qˈiˈn toj tze kyuˈn kynejil Judiy , quˈn bˈeˈx el kynikyˈ te techil , qa kyiˈjtaq nyoline . Me bˈeˈx kyij kytzaqpiˈn , tuˈn kyxobˈil kye xjal .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Ayetzin kynejil Judiy i xi kychqˈoˈn junjun Parisey ex junjuntljo aye lipcheqetaq tiˈj Herodes , tuˈn kyxiˈ qanil jun kyxjelbˈitz te Jesús , noq tuˈn tkubˈ tzˈaq kyuˈn tiˈjjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈil .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Teˈ kykanin , xi kyqanin : Ay , xnaqˈtzil , noq samiy , bˈiˈn qe quˈn , qa nyolin te twutzxix , ex nxnaqˈtziˈn noq tiˈjjo tbˈeyil chwinqil tuˈn qxiˈ tukˈa qMan Dios . Ex nya noq lipcheka tiˈjjo nkyqˈmaˈnxjal , ex mi nchi kubˈ tniminjiy aye nim kyoklin , quˈn toj twutza , junx kyoklinxjal kykyaqil . Tuˈnpetziˈn , ¿ Wenpela tuˈn t ‑ xi qchjonjiˈy kˈaybˈil te kawil te Rom , mo minaj ? Xi kyqanin ikyjo quˈn kykyˈeˈtaq Parisey tuˈn t ‑ xi chjet kˈaybˈil , me ayetzin kyukˈa Herodes , kyajtaq . Ikytzin iltaq tiˈj tuˈn tkubˈ tzˈaq Jesús kyuˈn toj til kywutzjo jun chˈuq xjal lo . Tuˈnpetziˈn , xi kyqˈmaˈn te : ¿ Okpela kxel qchjoˈntza , mo minaj ?

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Me tojtzqiˈntaq te Jesúsjo kyxmiletzˈil tiˈjjo xi kyqanin , ex xi tqˈmaˈn kye : N ‑ el we nikyˈ te tiˈjjo kyaja . Kyaja tuˈn nkubˈ tzˈaqa tiˈjjo nxnaqˈtzbˈila . Kyyekˈintziˈn jun pwaq weˈy , tuˈn tok nkaˈyiˈn .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Xi kyyekˈin te , ex xi tqanin Jesús kye : ¿ An qwutzbˈiyiljo lo , ex an qbˈi tzˈibˈink twutz ? Xi kytzaqˈwinxjal : Te nmaq kawil te Rom , chi chiˈ .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Tuˈnpetziˈn , kyqˈoˈnx kyejiˈy a ntqanin nmaq kawil te Rom , ex kyqˈoˈnxjiˈy a te Dios ntqanin . Tetziˈn kyxi ttzaqˈwin ikyjo , noqx i bˈaj jaw kaˈylaj .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Attaq jun chˈuq Sadusey nbˈaj xnaqˈtzintaq , qa aj tkyim jun xjal , minataq njaw itzˈje juntl majl . I tzaj tkˈatz Jesús , ex xi kyqˈmaˈn te :

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Xnaqˈtzil , kyij ttzˈibˈin Moisés toj Tyol Dios , qa aj tkyim jun ichin , ex qa ntiˈ jun tkˈwal kyij tukˈa t ‑ xuˈjil , il tiˈj tuˈn tjaw meje tukˈaxjo ttziky mo titzˈin qtzan tchmil , quˈn tuˈntzin aj tuljo tnejil tal , te tkˈwaljo qtzan tchmil tuˈn toke .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Jun maj , attaq wuq ichin kyitzˈimila kyibˈ . Atzin kytziky knet t ‑ xuˈjil , me ntiˈx jun tkˈwal kyij , teˈ tkyim .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Atzintzjo tkabˈ jaw meje tukˈa t ‑ xuˈjil kyij , me ikyxljo , ntiˈ jun tkˈwal kyij , teˈ tkyim . Ex ikyxl bˈajjo tiˈjjo toxin ,

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: ex ikyx bˈajjo kyiˈjjo txqantl . Ex bˈeˈx kyimljo qya .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Atziˈn jaˈlin , at jun qxjela teˈy : ¿ Tzeˈntzila tteˈn tuˈn kyjaw anqˈintl kyimnin ? Quˈn , qa ikyjo , aj kyjaw itzˈje juntl majl , ¿ Tiˈtzila kbˈajiltz ? ¿ Altzila kye k ‑ okil te tchmiljo qya kyxoljo wuq ichin , quˈn kykyaqilx i ok meje tukˈa ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Najninx iteˈya kyeˈ . ¿ Naˈmxsin tel kynikyˈa te Tyol Dios , ex te jniˈ tipin ?

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Ajtzin kybˈaj jaw itzˈje juntl majljo kyimnin , mikyxil teˈ chwinqil tzeˈnku luˈn . Ayetzin ichin exqetziˈn qya mina chi bˈaj jaw meje juntl majl . Iky kchi bˈaj okileˈ tzeˈnqeku angel toj kyaˈj .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Tiˈjtzintzjo aj kyjatz itzˈje juntl majl kyimnin , ¿ Ma naˈmtzin tkux kyuˈjinjiˈy Tyol Dios , a kyij ttzˈibˈin Moisés , tej tyolin Dios tukˈa tojjo tqan txˈiˈx , a nkˈanttaq ? Chiˈ kyjaluˈn : Ayin wejiˈy tDios Abraham , te Isaac ex te Jacob . Mix tqˈma qa ayintaq wejiˈy , qalaˈ ayin wejiˈych .

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Ikytziˈn , ate Dios nya kyDios kyimnin , qalaˈ kyDios itzˈ , exla qa o chi kyim tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , quˈn toj twutz Dios , itzˈqe kykyaqilx . Tuˈnpetziˈn , najninx iteˈy .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Teˈ tok tbˈiˈn jun xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil ikyjo , tuˈn toj tumil i xi ttzaqˈwine Jesús , xi laqˈe tkˈatz ex xi tqanin : ¿ Ankyeˈ tkawbˈil Dios nimxix toklin kyxoljo txqantl ?

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : An tnejiljo luˈn : Kybˈinkuxixsiˈn , tyajil Israel . Oˈkx Diosjo junchˈin , a tAjaw Tkyaqil .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Tuˈnpetzintzjo , kˈuˈjlinkxixa tukˈa tkyaqil tanmiˈn ex tukˈa tkyaqil tnabˈla ex tukˈa tkyaqil tipiˈn .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Atzin tkabˈtz : Kˈuˈjlink t ‑ xjalila tzeˈnkux ay . Ntiˈx juntl tkawbˈil nim toklin tzeˈnqe luˈn .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Ante xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil xi tqˈmaˈn : Xnaqˈtzil , twutzxjo ikyjo tzeˈn ntzaj tqˈmaˈn ; junchˈinx te Dios , tAjaw Tkyaqil ; ntiˈ juntl .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Tuˈn tok qkˈuˈjlin Dios tukˈa tkyaqil qanmin , tkyaqil qnabˈl , ex tkyaqil qipin , ex tuˈn kyok qkˈuˈjlin qxjalil tzeˈnkux awo ; axixjo luˈn nim toklin tzeˈnqekuˈ oyaj ex chojbˈil nchi kubˈ patit twiˈ t ‑ altar Dios .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Teˈ tok tbˈiˈn Jesús , teˈ otaq txi ttzaqˈwin xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil toj tumil , xi tqˈmaˈn te : Noq chˈintl tuˈn tel te tnikyˈ teˈ Tkawbˈil Dios . Tbˈajlinxiˈ ikyjo , mix aˈl juntl el t ‑ xobˈil , tuˈn t ‑ xi tqanin juntl t ‑ xjelbˈitz te Jesús .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Teˈ nxnaqˈtzintaq Jesús toj tnejil ja te naˈbˈl Dios , xi tqanin jun t ‑ xjelbˈitz kye xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil : ¿ Tzeˈntzin tten kyqˈmaˈn xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil , qa tyajil David te Crist , a Kolil , a at toklin tuˈn Dios ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Ax David qˈmante jun maj tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan : Xi tqˈmaˈn Dios te wAjawa : Qekuy toj nman qˈobˈa kawil wukˈiy , ex kˈwel kyiˈjjo tajqˈoja wuˈnch .

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Twutzx teˈ qa a David t ‑ xeˈchil Crist . ¿ Me tzeˈntzin ttentz o yolin te David tiˈj Crist , a naˈmtaq titzˈje , ex ok tqˈoˈn te tAjaw ? Tbˈanilx ele t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin toj kywutzjo jniˈ xjal .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Nxnaqˈtzintaq Jesús kye jniˈ xjal , ex xi tqˈmaˈn : Kykaˈyink kyibˈa , tuˈn mina chi ok lipeˈy kyiˈjjo xnaqˈtzil tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil . Nbˈaj kubˈ kyyekˈin kyibˈ te tnejinel tnam , ex nbˈaj ok kyqˈoˈn kyxbˈalin tbˈanilx , manyor xqerx wen , noq tuˈn kyokku kaˈyin kyuˈnxjal . Ex kyajxix , tuˈn kyok qˈolbˈit wen jaˈchaq nchi bˈete .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Kyajxix tuˈn kyokx qe te tnejil kyojjo ja te naˈbˈl Dios ex toj jun waˈn toj jun nintz qˈij .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Me nbˈajel kyelqˈin kyja qya mebˈeqe , a o chi kyim kychmil , ex tkyaqiljo jniˈ at kye , ex tuˈn mina tzˈel kynikyˈtzajil , nchi ok tennaj naˈl Dios nimx tqan . Tuˈntzin ikyjo , okx kychjaˈbˈilx toj qˈaqˈ .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Qˈuqletaq Jesús jun maj tkˈatz jun tkubˈil oyaj pwaq , tokxtaq toj tnejil ja te naˈbˈl Dios , nkaˈyintaq kyiˈjjo jniˈ xjal tzeˈn nbˈaj kux kyqˈoˈntaq kyoyaj . Ex ayetzin qˈinin , nimx pwaq bˈaj kux kyqˈoˈn .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Ex kanin jun qya , a otaq kyim tchmil , yajxix wen . Kux tqˈoˈn kabˈe tal netzˈ pwaq .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: I tzaj ttxkoˈn Jesúsjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , ex xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy ; ajo tal qya lo , nim chˈintljo toyaj ma kux tqˈoˈn kywutzjo txqantl ,

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: quˈn jotxjo xjal , a ma kux qˈonte toyaj , a t ‑ xkyijlbˈin ; qalatzinl teˈ tal yaj , a ma kux tqˈoˈn , a attaq tajbˈin te tuˈn tanqˈin .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Tetz Jesús toj tnejil ja te naˈbˈl Dios , bˈeˈx xi tqˈmaˈn jun t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin te : Xnaqˈtzil , ayex kye junjun tij abˈj ex junjun tij ja tbˈanilqex wen .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús te : Tbˈanilqex kye junjun tij ja nchi ok tkaˈyiˈn , me twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn tey , qa tkyaqilx kchi kˈwel yuchˈj , ex ntiˈx jun abˈj kyjel tibˈaj juntl , aj tpon tqˈijil .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ ikyjo , bˈeˈx xiˈ Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin twiˈ wutz Olivos , xinin twutzjo tnejil ja te naˈbˈl Dios . Teˈ kykanin , kubˈ qe Jesús , me ayetzin Pegr , Santyaw , Juan exsin Andrés , xi kyqanin kyjunalx :

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: ¿ Jtojtzin bˈaˈn tbˈajjo ikyjo , ex tiˈchaqtzin txqantl kbˈajil , aj chˈixtaq tkˈul kaniˈn ikyjo ? chi chiˈ .

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin Jesús : Kykaˈyink kyibˈa tuˈn mix aˈl kubˈ sbˈun kyeˈy ,

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: quˈn ilaˈxte tzul , ex k ‑ okil kyqˈoˈn kyibˈ tzeˈn ayiˈn . Chichkuˈ kyjaluˈn : Ayin weˈ Crist , ex nimx xjal kbˈaj kˈwel kyuˈn , tuˈn kybˈaj ok lipe kyiˈj .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Aj tok kybˈiˈn tqanil jniˈ qˈoj n ‑ ok tzaluˈn mo tzachiˈn , mina chi jaw xobˈa , quˈn atziˈn jniˈ anetziˈn ilx tiˈj tuˈn tbˈaj . Me naˈmtaqtzin tul kanin teˈ qˈij , a jaˈ tuˈn tbˈaje twutz txˈotxˈ tkyaqilx .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Ilx tiˈj tuˈn kykˈul kaniˈn qˈij , jaˈ tuˈn toke qˈoj tuˈn junjun nim tnam tukˈa junjuntl ; ex tzul kyaqnajnabˈ ex nintz waˈyaj noq jaˈchaqku tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ . Tkyaqiljo ikyjo , ikyjo tzeˈnku tnejil tchyoˈn tkˈuˈj jun qya tukˈa tal .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: Bˈaˈnx chi kaˈyin kyibˈa , quˈn kchi bˈaj xel qˈoˈn toj kyqˈobˈjo kawil ex kchi bˈajil lankˈiˈn toj muˈẍ ja te naˈbˈl Dios . Kchi bˈaj pon qˈiˈn kywutz nmaq kawil ex kywutz muchˈ kawil , noq tuˈn npaja . Antza kˈwele kychikyˈbˈiˈn nqanila kywutz .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Me tuˈn tbˈajjo tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ , il tiˈj nej tuˈn tbˈaj yolitjo nyola te kolbˈil kyexjal toj kykyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Me mina chi jaw bˈisin kyeˈ , aj kyxi qˈiˈn kywutzjo nmaq kawil , ex tiˈ tuˈn txi kyqˈmaˈn kye , quˈn nyaqe kyeˈ kchi yolil , qalaˈ ikytzin ate Xewbˈaj Xjan k ‑ yolil kyiˈja .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Kyojjo qˈij anetziˈn , iteˈ itzikybˈaj kchi bˈaj xel kykˈayin kyitzˈin kye kawil , tuˈn kybˈaj kubˈ bˈyoˈn ; ex iteˈ manbˈaj kchi bˈaj kxel kykˈayin kykˈwal , ex ikyqexl kˈwalbˈajjo , kchi bˈaj xel kykˈayin kytata , tuˈn kybˈaj kubˈ bˈyoˈn .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Kykyaqilxjo xjal nya nimilqe kchi bˈaj okil ikyˈin kyuˈn noqx tuˈn npaja , me ankye teˈ mina tzˈel tiˈn tnimbˈil wiˈja , ajxi tjapin bˈaj tqˈijil , apente kkletiljo .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Ajtzin t ‑ xi kykaˈyinjiˈy ajo ichin , a kˈwel tbˈinchin a tixqex toj najbˈil xjanxix ( aj tkux kyuˈjinjiˈy luˈn , tzˈelku kynikyˈa te ) . Ajtzin tok kykaˈyin xjaljo tkyaqiljo lo , ayeˈ iteˈ toj txˈotxˈ te Judey , bˈeˈx kchi xel oq toj kˈul .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ex atzin xjal , a tokxtaq twiˈja , nlay taqˈ ambˈil tuˈn tkuˈtz qˈilte jun tiˈ te tuja .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Ex ikyxljo , a tzmataq n ‑ aqˈnin toj ttxˈotxˈ , mi taqˈ ambˈil tuˈn tul qˈilkye t ‑ xbˈalin tja .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: ¡ Ayexjo tal qya , ayeˈ chˈixtaq kykubˈ tzˈaq , ex ayeˈ tzmataq nbˈaj miˈẍin kyal !

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Chi naˈn Diosa , noqit nya toj jbˈalilku , mo tojku jun qˈij te ajlabˈl kubˈ tzˈaqe ikyjo .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Quˈn nimkux jun kyixkˈoj kkyˈelix kyuˈn , a bˈajxi kylaˈy tukˈaxjo tzajlin xkye twutz txˈotxˈ , ex mixla kqlaˈbˈil juntl majl , aj tjapin bˈaj tkyaqil .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Quˈn noqit mi tzˈajtz tajsin Dios kyiˈjjo qˈij anetziˈn , mixitla aˈlx jun aku kyij anqˈin . Me ok ajitz tajsin Dios noq tuˈn tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj kyiˈjjo o chi jaw tskˈoˈn .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Qa at jun saj qˈmaˈnte kyeˈy kyojjo qˈij anetziˈn : Lu Crist lo , mo qa luˈ at tzachiˈn , qa chiˈ , mi txi kynimiˈn .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Quˈn chi ul sbˈul k ‑ okil kyqˈoˈn kyibˈ te Crist , mo te jun xjal tzeˈnku jun yolil Tyol Dios ojtxe . Ex okpe kˈwel kybˈinchin nim techil kyipin , noq tuˈn kysbˈetkuxjal kyuˈn . Ex okpela k ‑ okil kynikyˈin tuˈn kykubˈjo skˈoˈnqe tuˈn Dios , me nlay chi kubˈ .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Kykaˈyink kyibˈa . Tuˈnpetziˈn , ma txi nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy naˈmtaq tuˈn tul kanin ikyjo .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: Noqx aj kybˈaj ikyˈjo qˈij te yajbˈil , k ‑ okil qlolqex twutz qˈij , ex mi kˈantl yaye .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Ex jniˈ qeˈ cheˈw kchi kˈwelitz tzˈaq twutz txˈotxˈ . Ex tkyaqiljo jniˈ at twutz kyaˈj okx kchi luˈlilx .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Exsin kchin xel kykaˈyintza , aj ntzaja toj muj twutz kyaˈj tukˈa tkyaqil wipiˈn ex jniˈ nqoptzˈajiyila , ayiˈn a Tkˈwal Ichin .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Ajtzin nkˈula twutz txˈotxˈ , kchi tzajil nsmaˈn n ‑ angela , tuˈn kyok chmetjo jniˈ skˈoˈnqe wuˈn toj tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: Kykaˈyinkjiˈy techil tiˈj tqan iw : Aj ttzaj xulin tal tqˈobˈ , ex aj tzaj poqˈle t ‑ xaq , antza k ‑ elile kynikyˈa te , qa chˈix tul kanin qˈijil .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Ikyxsintzjo , aj tok kykaˈyiˈn tkyaqiljo luˈn , tzˈelku kynikyˈa te , qa chˈix tpon tqˈijil tuˈn wula juntl majl .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , a naˈmxtaq kybˈaj kyimxjal , a iteˈ tojjo tqˈijil jaˈlin , aj t ‑ xi xkyejo jniˈ luˈn .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: A kyaˈj ex txˈotxˈ ok kchi bˈajil , me mex weˈ nyol nlayx chi kyij xkyeˈ , tuˈn mi chi japin bˈaje .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Me alkye qˈij ex alkye or chin ula , mix aˈl teˈ bˈilte , mixpe aye angel toj kyaˈj , mixpe ayinkuy , a Kˈwalbˈaj te Dios ; qalaˈ oˈkx te nMan bˈilte .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn kyimil kywatla toj kynimbˈila , ex kykaˈyink kyibˈa , quˈn nya bˈiˈn kyuˈn jtoj bˈaˈn nmeltzˈaja .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Ikyx te luˈn tzeˈnku jun ichin kyjaˈ t ‑ xi toj jun tbˈe toj junxil tnam najchaq . Kyjel kyqˈmaˈn kye taqˈnil tuˈn tok kykaˈyin tja ; ex kyjel tqˈoˈn taqˈin junjun , kyjel tqˈmaˈn te xqˈuqil tja , tuˈn telsin twatl , ex tuˈn tok tkaˈyin tkyaqil .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Ikyqexsin kyejiˈy bˈant ‑ x kyteˈn , ex bˈaˈnx chi kaˈyin kyibˈa , quˈn nya bˈiˈn kyuˈn jtoj bˈaˈn wula , qa noq aj qok yupj , mo nikyˈjin aqˈwilj , mo aj toqˈ ekyˈ , mo nqo el sqixkuj . Tuˈnpetzintzjo , ilx tiˈj tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈinchin kyteˈn , quˈn ntiˈ nqanila aj wula .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: ¿ Yajtzin qa nchin ulkuy , ex nya bˈinchin kyteˈn ?

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , nxi nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , ex nya noq kyekuy ex majx kye jniˈ xjal tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ : ¡ Kybˈinchim kyteˈn !

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Atxtaql kabˈe qˈij , tuˈn tkubˈ ikyˈsit nintz qˈij te Xjan Qˈij , a jaˈ nchi waˈnxjal pan , a ntiˈ txˈamsbˈilte . Ayetzin kynejil pale aj Judiy exqetziˈn xnaqˈtzil teˈ jniˈ kawbˈil nkyjyoˈntaq jun ttxolil toj ewajil , tuˈn ttzyet Jesús , ex tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈyoˈn .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Bˈaj kubˈ kyyolin kyxolilex : Mina kubˈ qbˈinchin toj nintz qˈij te Waˈj Pan , quˈn tuˈn mina bˈaj jaw tiljexjal qiˈj .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Attaq Jesús tojjo kojbˈil Betania , ex kanin tja jun xjal , Simun tbˈi . Atzin Simun otaq tzˈel weˈ te jun yabˈil tzeˈnku txˈaˈk , lepra tbˈi . Antza , tzaj laqˈe jun qya qˈiˈntaq jun tal ẍunk tuˈn , bˈinchin tuˈn jun wiq abˈj tbˈanilx wen , ex nojnin tukˈa jun wiq jupsbˈil manyor wiˈyil wen , nardo tbˈi . Teˈ tkanin , ex jaw tjqoˈn ẍunk , exsin jax tqoˈn jupsbˈil toj twiˈ Jesús .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Atzaj teˈ tok kykaˈyin junjun xjal ikyjo , bˈeˈx bˈaj tzaj kyqˈoj tiˈjjo qya , exsin ok ten yolbˈil tiˈj : ¿ Tiˈtzila qe ma kubˈ tyajin qya qˈanbˈil anetziˈn ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: ¿ Noqxitzin noq chˈin twiˈ ? Qalaˈ noqxpet ma txi tkˈayin tuˈn jweˈlajaj kˈal pwaq ex atzintlaˈ pwaq xi oyit kye yaj .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús kye : ¡ Tenkuj ! ¡ Tin qe n ‑ ok kyiliˈn ! Atzin ma tbˈinchin wiˈja , tbˈanilx wen .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Quˈn bˈapeˈ kye yaj kukx kyeˈ kytenku kyxola , bˈaˈn kyxi kymojiˈn alkye qˈij kyaja , qalatzin weˈ nya axsi chin kˈwel teniy kyxola .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Atziˈn ma kubˈ tbˈinchiˈn qya wiˈja , tbˈanilx , quˈn naˈmxtaq nkyima te s ‑ ok tqˈoˈn qˈanbˈil wiˈja , a tzeˈn n ‑ ok kyiˈj kyimnin tzeˈn chi kux muqet .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , jaˈchaqx kubˈeˈ yolite nyola twutz txˈotxˈ , ex kˈwel yolitjo a ma bˈant tuˈn qya wiˈja , ex kˈwel naˈyit .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Kyxoljo kabˈlajaj t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin Jesús , oˈkx jun aj meltzˈaj tiˈj , a Judas Iscariot tbˈi . Xiˈ Judas lol kyeˈ kynejil kypale aj Judiy , tuˈntzin t ‑ xi tqˈoˈn Jesús toj kyqˈobˈ .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Teˈ kybˈinte kynejil pale ikyjo , ox chi tzalajx wen , exsin bˈeˈx xi kysuqin pwaq te Judas . Bˈeˈxsin okku tentz jyol ttxolil , tzeˈn tten tuˈn tel jyet Jesús tuˈn , tuˈntzin t ‑ xi tqˈoˈn kye pale .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Tojjo nintz qˈij te Waˈj Pan , ilxtaq tiˈj nchi waˈn aj Judiy pan , a nya txˈamsin , ex nkubˈ kybˈyoˈn jun tal tal rit . Tojtzin tnejil qˈij , xi kyqanin t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin Jesús te : ¿ Jaˈtzin tajiy tuˈn qxiˈy bˈinchilte wabˈj te ikyˈsbˈil Waˈj Pan ?

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Bˈeˈxsin i xi ttxkoˈn kabˈe t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , ex xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Ku kyxiˈy toj tnam . Ex aj kylontiy jun ichin iqin jun ẍoqˈ aˈ tuˈn , bˈeˈx kˈaˈ chi ok lipey tiˈj , ex tojjo ja , jaˈ k ‑ okixe ,

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: axsa kˈaˈ chi okxiy , exsin kˈaˈ txi kyqaniˈn te tajaw ja , ¿ Ankye ja , jaˈ kchin waliy kyukˈa nxnaqˈtzbˈiˈn ? chitzin xnaqˈtziljo .

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Ktzajil tyekˈin jun ja kyeˈy , chebˈex bˈinchin wen tibˈajxi juntl . Kˈaˈ kubˈ kybˈinchinjiˈy qwa antza .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Bˈeˈxsin i xiˈkuxjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin . Teˈ kykanin toj tnam , ikyx bˈajjo tzeˈnku bˈaj tqˈmaˈn Jesús kye . Kyij kybˈinchin wabˈj , exsin i xiˈ juntl majl jaˈ iteˈyetaq Jesús .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Tetzinj qok yupj , xiˈ Jesús kyukˈa kabˈlajaj t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin jaˈ otaq bˈante wabˈj .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Tej kykanin , bˈeˈx i ok ten waˈl . Me nchi bˈaj waˈntaq , teˈ t ‑ xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús kye : Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , at jun kyeˈ , a luˈ nwaˈn wukˈiy k ‑ okil meltzˈaj wiˈja , ex kchin xel tkˈayiˈn .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Tej kybˈin teˈ ikyjo , bˈeˈx i jaw bˈisin kykyaqilx , exsin junjunku ok ten qanilte te : ¿ Me qa ayiˈn ? chi chiˈ junjun .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: I xi ttzaqˈwin : Jun kyeˈ , a luˈ nwaˈn junx wukˈiy .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Ayiˈn Tkˈwal Ichin , ok kbˈajilx wiˈja tzeˈn ntqˈmaˈn Tyol Dios , tuˈn nxi kˈayiˈn , me atziˈn kxel kˈayin weˈ , wenxpetla noqit mina s ‑ ul itzˈje twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Nchi bˈaj waˈntaq , teˈ tjaw ttzyuˈn Jesús jun pan , ex xi tqˈoˈn chjonte te Dios tiˈj , exsin xi tsipin kye t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , me nej xi tqˈmaˈn : Kywanxjiˈy pan luˈn , quˈn atziˈn nxmililjiˈy .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Teˈ tbˈajxi waˈn , jaw tiˈn jun tkˈwel vin , xi tqˈoˈn chjonte te Dios tiˈj , ex xi tsipin kye , tuˈn t ‑ xi kykˈwaˈn ,

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: ex xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Atziˈn vin kxel nqˈoˈn kyeˈy tuˈn t ‑ xi kykˈwaˈn , atziˈn nchkyˈeljiˈy , a akˈaj tumil , a bˈantnin tiˈj tuˈn Dios , tuˈn kykyijxjal toj wen tukˈa .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , mi chin kˈwantla tiˈjjo kˈwabˈj luˈn , tzmaxiˈ aj qkˈwan junx kyukˈiy tzma toj Tkawbˈil nMaˈn toj kyaˈj .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: I bˈaj bˈitzin jun bˈitz nej kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , exsin i xiˈ twiˈ wutz Olivos .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Teˈ kykanin antza , xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús kye : Kykyaqilxa k ‑ elil kyiˈn tqˈuqbˈil kykˈuˈja wiˈja , quˈn ikytzin ntqˈmaˈn Tyol Dios toj Tuˈjil : Kˈwel nbˈyonjiˈy kyikˈlel , ex ayetzin rit kchi bˈajelil tilj , chiˈ .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Me ajtzin njaw itzˈjiˈy juntl majl , nej chin pon kaniˈn kywutza toj Galiley .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Me ante Pegr xi ttzaqˈwin : Ex qa kykyaqilx s ‑ el kyiˈn tqˈuqbˈil kykˈuˈj tiˈja , me mina weˈ , chi Pegrjo .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Xi tqˈmaˈn Jesús te Pegr : Twutzxix kxel nqˈmaˈn teˈy , tojxjo qnikyˈin lo , a naˈmtaqx toqˈ tman ekyˈ , otaq chin kubˈ tewiˈn oxe maj kywutzxjal , ex kxel tqˈmaˈn kye qa nya ojtzqiˈnqiˈn tuˈnch .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Me mina , chi Pegr . Ex qa ma chin kyima tukˈiy , me nlay kubˈ wewiˈn , chiˈ . Ex ikyxljo , kyqˈmaˈn txqantl t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Bˈeˈx xiˈ Jesús kyukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin tojjo najbˈil Getsemaní . Teˈ kykanin antza , xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Ku kykyij qeˈy tzaluˈn . Ma chin weˈ naˈl Dios .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Me i xi tkˈleˈn oxe tukˈa ; a Pegr , Santyaw exsin Juan . Tzajx txqan bˈis toj tanmin ,

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: ex xi tqˈmaˈn kye : Ma tzajx jun tij bˈis toj wanmiˈn , nya tzaj chin kyimila , chiˈ . Ku kykyija tzaluˈn , me noq tzaj kywatla .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: El laqˈe chˈintl kykˈatz , kubˈ mutxe twutz txˈotxˈ , ex xi tqanin te Dios noqit tzeˈn tten mina tzikyˈxi kyixkˈoj tuˈn .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Chiˈ kyjaluˈn toj tnaˈj Dios : Ay nMan , tkyaqilx te nbˈant tuˈn . Chin tklomila teˈ tkyaqil jniˈ kkyˈelix wuˈn . Me waja tuˈn tkubˈ tbˈinchinjiy a taja wiˈja , ex nya weˈ waj .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Bˈeˈx meltzˈaj kykˈatz oxe t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin . Atzaj teˈ tul kykˈatz , xi tqˈmaˈn te Pegr : Simun , ¿ Ma tzuntzin nktan ? ¿ Ma mixsin s ‑ el jun orjo twatla ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Kyimil kywatla , ex kux chi bˈaj naˈn Diosa , tuˈn mina chi kubˈ tzˈaqa toj tqˈobˈ tajaw il , quˈn kyaja tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈinchinjiˈy a taj Dios , me alkyetz kuj n ‑ ele te kyeˈy tuˈn tbˈant .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Xiˈ juntl majl naˈl Dios , ex ikyxl tnaˈj Diosjo kubˈ tqˈmaˈn .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Teˈ tmeltzˈaj juntl majl kykˈatzjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin , ex ikyxljo , nchi ktantaql teˈ kyel knetl tuˈn . Ex mix tene tumil kyyol te , quˈn mix kypaˈyix watl .
