text: Even so hath the Lord ordained that they which preach the gospel should live of the gospel .
text2: Ikytzin tumiljo xkyij tqˈmaˈn qAjaw Jesús , qa ayejo , a yolil Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , ex at kyoklin tiˈj jun onbˈil , quˈn tuˈn a kyaqˈiˈn .

text: But I have used none of these things : neither have I written these things , that it should be so done unto me : for it were better for me to die , than that any man should make my glorying void .
text2: Me tzeˈnku weˈ , ntiˈ nchin qaniˈn kyeˈy , tuˈn ttzaj kyqˈoˈnjiˈy onbˈil weˈy . Ex nya ma txi ntzˈibˈiˈn wejiˈy luˈn kyeˈy , a tuˈn t ‑ xi kyxikybˈin tuˈn ttzaj kyqˈoˈn onbˈil weˈ . Bˈaˈntla qa wen tuˈn nkyim weˈ , tzeˈnku a tuˈn ttzaj ntzyuˈnjiˈy onbˈil kyeˈy . Quˈn tuˈn ttzaj ntzyuˈnjiˈy onbˈil , ax nyola kˈwel tzˈaq wibˈaja .

text: For though I preach the gospel , I have nothing to glory of : for necessity is laid upon me ; yea , woe is unto me , if I preach not the gospel !
text2: Tzeˈnku weˈ , nya noq tuˈn teˈ yolil Tyol Diosqiˈn , kjawil nimsin wibˈa ; qalaˈ quˈn ilx tiˈj tuˈn tkubˈ nbˈinchinjiˈy aqˈuntl , quˈn jun waqˈin wejiˈy ma tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios . Quˈn qa mina xkubˈ nbˈinchiˈn , ktzajil tqˈoj Dios wiˈja .

text: For if I do this thing willingly , I have a reward : but if against my will , a dispensation of the gospel is committed unto me .
text2: Qa ma kubˈ nbˈinchinjiˈy luˈn a wuˈnkuxa , atla jun chojbˈil weˈ . Me nyaxix noq tuˈn ikyjo , quˈn ma chin jaw skˈoˈn weˈ tuˈn Dios , ex ma tzaj toqxenin Tyol weˈy , ex nlay kubˈ wewiˈn , quˈn ilxix tiˈj tuˈn tkubˈ bˈinchit .

text: What is my reward then ? Verily that , when I preach the gospel , I may make the gospel of Christ without charge , that I abuse not my power in the gospel .
text2: ¿ Tiˈtzila chojbˈil wetza ikyjo toj nwutza ? Atziˈn nchin tzalaja tuˈn nchin yoliˈn tiˈjjo Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil noq kukxjo , nya loqˈaj . Tuˈnpetziˈn , mi nchin qaniˈn jun onbˈil tiˈj , quˈn tuˈntzin mi chi jaw yolbˈinxjal wiˈja , qa noq tuˈn jun onbˈil nchin yoliniˈy tiˈj Tyol Dios . Exla qa at we woklin tiˈj jun onbˈil , me mina ntzaj ntzyuˈn .

text: For though I be free from all men , yet have I made myself servant unto all , that I might gain the more .
text2: Qalaˈ tzaqpiˈnqiˈn , quˈn mix aˈl jun weˈ onilwe , ex ntiˈ jun xjal aku kawin wiˈja . Me metzin weˈ , ma tzˈok nqˈoˈn wibˈa nyakuj tjaqˈ kykawbˈil tkyaqil , me noq tuˈn kynimin tkyaqil xjal wuˈn tiˈj Tbˈanil Tqanil .

text: And unto the Jews I became as a Jew , that I might gain the Jews ; to them that are under the law , as under the law , that I might gain them that are under the law ;
text2: Tej ẍin bˈeta kyxol aj Judiy , ma tzˈok nmujbˈin wibˈa junx kyukˈa , noq tuˈn tok kybˈiˈnku wiˈja , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi kynimin a Tbˈanil Tqanil . Ex tej ẍin bˈeta kyxoljo kyaj tuˈn kyel wen twutz Dios noq tuˈn tjapin bˈaj ojtxe kawbˈil kyuˈn , ex ma txi nmujbˈin wibˈa kyukˈa , me nya tuˈn wel wena twutz Dios , qalaˈ noq tuˈn tok kybˈiˈnku xjal wiˈja , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi kyniminku Tbˈanil Tqanil .

text: To them that are without law , as without law , ( being not without law to God , but under the law to Christ , ) that I might gain them that are without law .
text2: Ex tej ẍin bˈeta kyxol aj nya Judiyqe , ayeˈ mina xkubˈ kybˈinchin tzeˈnku tzˈibˈin toj ojtxe kawbˈil , ex ma txi nmujbˈin wibˈa junx kyukˈa , nyakuj ntiˈ kawbˈil wibˈaja , noq tuˈn tok kybˈiˈnku wiˈja , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi kyniminku Tbˈanil Tqanil . Me mi nxi nqˈmaˈn tukˈa lo qa ma kubˈ nbˈinchinjiˈy a nya bˈaˈn twutz Dios , quˈn nimilqiˈn tiˈj Tkawbˈil Crist .

text: To the weak became I as weak , that I might gain the weak : I am made all things to all men , that I might by all means save some .
text2: Ex tej ẍin bˈeta kyxol xjal , ayeˈ ntiˈxix kyoklin kyxoljo nmaq xjal tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , ma tzˈok nqˈoˈn wibˈa tzeˈn jun kye , tuˈn tok kybˈiˈnku wiˈja , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi kyniminku Tbˈanil Tqanil . Waja tuˈn woka tzeˈnku tkyaqil wiq xjal , noq tuˈn tok kybˈiˈnku wiˈja , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi kyniminku Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil .

text: And this I do for the gospel ' s sake , that I might be partaker thereof with you .
text2: Nkubˈ nbˈinchiˈn tkyaqiljo luˈn , noq tuˈn tpaj Tbˈanil Tqanil , tuˈntzintla qmujbˈin te qibˈ junx qkyaqilx tjaqˈ tkyˈiwbˈil Dios .

text: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all , but one receiveth the prize ? So run , that ye may obtain .
text2: Jun tumil wuˈn kyeˈy tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈinchiˈn tukˈa tkyaqil kyanmiˈn toj taqˈin qMan Dios , ikyx tzeˈnku we . Quˈn bˈiˈn kyeˈ kyuˈn , a kyxol txqan xjal , a rinil , tkyaqilx tetz nrinin , me noq junchˈin teˈ nkanbˈin chojbˈil . Ikytziˈn toj qnimbˈil , me il tiˈj tuˈn kykanbˈintiˈy chojbˈil qˈoˈntz tuˈn Dios toj kyaˈj .

text: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things . Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown ; but we an incorruptible .
text2: Tkyaqiljo rinil , a taj tuˈn tkanbˈin , il tiˈj tuˈn tkubˈ ttzyuˈn tibˈ tiˈjjo jniˈ tiˈchaq tiˈ , a aku bˈant tuˈn tsikyte t ‑ xmilil , aj txiˈ rinil . ¿ Tiquˈnil ? Noq tuˈn tkanbˈitkuˈ jun tal oyaj , a jun paqx nbˈaj . ¿ Me atzin qetz ? Iltzin tiˈj tuˈn qrinin wen toj qnimbˈil tuˈn qkanbˈin teˈ jun oyaj , a nlayx bˈaj toj kyaˈj .

text: I therefore so run , not as uncertainly ; so fight I , not as one that beateth the air :
text2: Tzeˈnku weˈ nkubˈ nbˈinchiˈn toj nnimbˈila tzeˈnku jun rinil lajoˈnxix tuˈn jikyin wen , tuˈn tkanin tzma jaˈ taˈye chojbˈil . Ex ikyx tzeˈnku jun bˈujil toj saqchbˈil , nya noq k ‑ okil ten tzaqpilkye tqˈobˈ , qalaˈ ok tjyabˈil jaˈ tumil k ‑ aqˈila tukˈa tuˈn .

text: But I keep under my body , and bring it into subjection : lest that by any means , when I have preached to others , I myself should be a castaway .
text2: Ikyqintzin wejiˈy tzeˈnku jun rinil ex jun bˈujil , nkubˈ ntzyuˈn wibˈa tuˈn nkanbˈintejiˈy jun oyaj toj kyaˈj , ex tuˈn mi chin eliˈy toj ntxˈixewa , quˈn qa otaq chin bˈaj xnaqˈtzin kyiˈj txqantl , exsin mi chin kanbˈintza .

text: Moreover , brethren , I would not that ye should be ignorant , how that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ;
text2: Me waja tuˈn kybˈintiˈy werman , qa nya tkyaqilx kkanbˈil chojbˈil , a tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios . Quˈn kanqetzinjiˈy aj Israel ojtxe , aye qxeˈchil toj qnimbˈil . Quˈn kykyaqilxjo i etz toj Egipto tukˈa Moisés , ex i mujbˈin te kyibˈ tukˈa , tej kyten tjaqˈ muj , ex tej kyikyˈx toj ttxuyil aˈ , Kyaq tbˈi , nyakuj te jun jawsbˈil aˈ .

text: And did all eat the same spiritual meat ;
text2: Ex kykyaqilx i waˈn tiˈjjo xjan wabˈj , tej kywaˈn tiˈj maná , a tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios , ex tej kykˈwan tiˈjjo aˈ etz toj piky tuˈn Dios . Me atziˈn piky luˈn nyolin tiˈj Crist , a attaq kyukˈa toj tzqij txˈotxˈ .

text: But with many of them God was not well pleased : for they were overthrown in the wilderness .
text2: Exla qa ok qe kykˈuˈj tiˈjjo jawsbˈil aˈ ex xjan wabˈj anetziˈn , me mix tzalaje Dios kyiˈj , ex tuˈn ikyjo , bˈeˈx i kyij kyim nimkuxix kybˈaj ; noqx jun jteˈbˈin kyij .

text: Now these things were our examples , to the intent we should not lust after evil things , as they also lusted .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin erman , bˈaj tkyaqiljo lo te jun yekˈbˈil , tuˈn mi pon qkˈuˈj tiˈjjo nya wen tzeˈnku pon kye kykˈuˈj tiˈj .

text: Neither be ye idolaters , as were some of them ; as it is written , The people sat down to eat and drink , and rose up to play .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , mi chi kˈuliˈn kywutzjo kywutzbˈiyil dios tzeˈnku kye txqantl , tzeˈn ntqˈmaˈn Tuˈjil Tyol Dios : Aye xjal i kubˈ qe waˈl ex kˈwal twutzjo kywutzbˈiyil dios . Exsin tej kybˈaj waˈntz , noq tiˈchaqku bˈaj bˈant kyuˈn kywutz .

text: Neither let us commit fornication , as some of them committed , and fell in one day three and twenty thousand .
text2: Ex mi chi bˈaj kyˈaˈjiˈn tzeˈnku kye junjun aj Israel , ex tuˈn ikyjo , bˈeˈx kyim 23 , 000 toj junx qˈij .

text: Neither let us tempt Christ , as some of them also tempted , and were destroyed of serpents .
text2: Ex mi tzˈok kynikyˈbˈiˈn Crist , tuˈn tkubˈ kyximiˈn , qa wen te Dios qa ntiˈ aku tqˈma tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈinchin chˈiˈn tzeˈnku kyaja . Quˈn ikyx kyxim junjun aj Israeljo ojtxe , ex ikyxjo , ex bˈeˈx i kyim , tej kyok txˈaˈn tuˈn kan .

text: Neither murmur ye , as some of them also murmured , and were destroyed of the destroyer .
text2: Ex mi chi yolbˈiˈn tiˈj Dios tzeˈnku junjunkye i yolbˈin , ex bˈeˈx i kyim tuˈn angel te kyimin .

text: Now all these things happened unto them for ensamples : and they are written for our admonition , upon whom the ends of the world are come .
text2: Bˈaj tkyaqiljo lo , ex bˈeˈx kyij tzˈibˈit toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios te jun yekˈbˈil te qe , ex te jun aqˈbˈil qnabˈl , tuˈntzin mina kubˈ qbˈinchinqe ikyjo , a awo nqo anqˈin kyojjo qˈij jaˈlin , a chˈix tjapin bˈaj tkyaqil .

text: Wherefore let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , qa waˈlqiˈy wen toj kynimbˈila toj kywutza , kykaˈyinktzin kyibˈtza , tuˈn mi chi kubˈ tzˈaqiˈy , tzeˈnku kye aj Israel ojtxe .

text: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man : but God is faithful , who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able ; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape , that ye may be able to bear it .
text2: Quˈn ajo xim tuˈn tbˈinchit il , ikyxjo tzeˈnku kyxim txqantl nimil toj tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ . Me ate Dios bˈaˈn tuˈn tqe qkˈuˈj tiˈj , quˈn nlay taqˈ te Dios , tuˈn ttzaj jun yajbˈil qiˈj , a nlayit qpa ; qalaˈ qa ma tzaj jun yajbˈil toj qchwinqil , ax te Dios ktzajil qˈonte tumil tzeˈn tten tuˈn qetz tjaqˈ .

text: Wherefore , my dearly beloved , flee from idolatry .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn ayiˈy werman , nimxix nkˈuˈja kyiˈja ; ku kyel oqa teˈ kˈulbˈil kywutzjo kywutzbˈiyil dios .

text: I speak as to wise men ; judge ye what I say .
text2: Quˈn qa twutzxix at kynabˈla tzeˈnku nkubˈ kyximiˈn , ex ayexa k ‑ elil kynikyˈ te , qa twutzxixjo nyola lo .

text: The cup of blessing which we bless , is it not the communion of the blood of Christ ? The bread which we break , is it not the communion of the body of Christ ?
text2: Tzeˈnku tojjo Xjan Wabˈj , ex tzeˈn nxi qqˈoˈn chjonte te Dios tiˈj , nkubˈ qyekˈin qmujbˈil qibˈ tukˈa Crist tiˈjjo tchkyˈel . Ex aj qwaˈn tiˈjjo Xjan Wabˈj , a nbˈaj kubˈ sipit qxol , nkubˈ qyekˈin qa at qmujbˈil qibˈ qxolx , a awo o qo ok te t ‑ xmilil Crist twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: For we being many are one bread , and one body : for we are all partakers of that one bread .
text2: Exla qa ma nintz qbˈaj , me noq tiˈj jun Xjan Wabˈj nqo waˈne , ma qo ok te junchˈin , a t ‑ xmilil Crist . Tuˈnpetziˈn , at qmujbˈil qibˈ qxolx , quˈn qkyaqilx nqo waˈn tiˈjjo Xjan Wabˈj .

text: Behold Israel after the flesh : are not they which eat of the sacrifices partakers of the alter ?
text2: Quˈn kykaˈyinktziˈn kyiˈj aj Israel . Ayeˈ nxi kyqˈoˈn aluˈmj te oyaj twutz Dios , at kyoklin tiˈj tchibˈjil , ex nchi kˈulin te Dios , aj t ‑ xi kychyoˈnjo oyaj lo .

text: What say I then ? that the idol is any thing , or that which is offered in sacrifice to idols is any thing ?
text2: Me nya tuˈn lo nxi nqˈmaˈn qa at tipin jun twutzbˈiyil ex qa a chibˈj , a n ‑ okx oyit twutzjo twutzbˈiyil , nimxixtl toklin tzeˈnku txqantl chibˈj .

text: But I say , that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice , they sacrifice to devils , and not to God : and I would not that ye should have fellowship with devils .
text2: Qalaˈ , a wejiˈy nxi nqˈmaˈn , qa ayeˈ nya nimil , tzeˈn nxi kyqˈoˈn tchibˈjil aluˈmj te oyaj kywutzjo kywutzbˈiyil , te taqˈnil tajaw il nxi kyqˈoˈne , ex nya te qMan Dios .

text: Ye cannot drink the cup of the Lord , and the cup of devils : ye cannot be partakers of the Lord ' s table , and of the table of devils .
text2: Ex ntiˈ qmujbˈil qibˈ tukˈa qAjaw , qa axsa nqo kˈwane tojxjo Xjan Wabˈj , ex axsa tuˈn qkˈwan toj kykˈwabˈl taqˈnil tajaw il . Ex ntiˈ qmujbˈil qibˈ kyukˈa tkyaqil nimil , a junx nchi waˈn wabˈj toj Xjan Wabˈj , ex axsa tuˈn qmujbˈin te qibˈ kyukˈa xjal nchi waˈn kywutzjo kywutzbˈiyil taqˈnil tajaw il . Nlay qo ok te kabˈe tumil .

text: Do we provoke the Lord to jealousy ? are we stronger than he ?
text2: Qa nqo labˈte tuˈn qxiˈ tojjo kabˈe tumil ikyjo , n ‑ okx qyekin Dios tuˈn ttzaj tqˈoj qiˈj . Ex nlay miyet tqˈoj , qa ma tzaj . ¿ Ma attzinqe qipin tzeˈnku te Dios ?

text: All things are lawful for me , but all things are not expedient : all things are lawful for me , but all things edify not .
text2: Twutzxix tzeˈnku nqˈumj , qa : Tzaqpiˈnqo tuˈn tkubˈ qbˈinchin noq alkyex qaj . Me te weˈy , nya tkyaqil at tajbˈin . Twutzxix tetz tzeˈnku nkyqˈmaˈn , qa : Tzaqpiˈnqo tuˈn qbˈinchin noq alkyex qaj . Me nya tkyaqil n ‑ onin qiˈj tuˈn qchˈiy toj qnimbˈil .

text: Let no man seek his own , but every man another ' s wealth .
text2: Quˈn mix aˈlx jun nimil njyoˈn tuˈn tel wen tuˈnx tibˈx , qalaˈ noq tuˈn tel wenjo txqantl .

text: Whatsoever is sold in the shambles , that eat , asking no question for conscience sake :
text2: Bˈaˈn txi kychyoˈnjiˈy tkyaqil chibˈj nkˈayajtz toj kˈaybˈil chibˈj , ex mi kubˈ kybˈisiˈn , mo tuˈn t ‑ xi kyqaniˈn , qa nej xkubˈ bˈyet kywutzjo twutzbˈiyil .

text: For the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof .
text2: Quˈn ntqˈmaˈn toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios kyjaluˈn : Te qMan Dios tkyaqil txˈotxˈ ex jniˈ at twutz .

text: If any of them that believe not bid you to a feast , and ye be disposed to go ; whatsoever is set before you , eat , asking no question for conscience sake .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , qa at jun nya nimil , nxi txkon kyeˈy waˈl tja ; ex qa kyajtaqkuy tuˈn kyxiˈy , bˈaˈn tuˈn kyxiˈy , ex bˈaˈn tuˈn kynikyˈbˈiˈn tiˈchaqx kubˈ qˈoˈntz kywutza , ex nya wen tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈisiˈn , mo tuˈn t ‑ xi kyqaniˈn , qa nej xkubˈ bˈyet twutz jun twutzbˈiyil .

text: But if any man say unto you , This is offered in sacrifice unto idols , eat not for his sake that shewed it , and for conscience sake : for the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof :
text2: Me qa ma tzaj qˈmaˈntz kyeˈy , qa nej xkubˈ bˈyet twutzjo twutzbˈiyil , nyapen wentz tuˈn t ‑ xi kychyoˈn ,

text: Conscience , I say , not thine own , but of the other : for why is my liberty judged of another man ' s conscience ?
text2: tuˈntzintla mi kubˈ kybˈinchiˈn a nya wen tuˈn tbˈinchinte jun nimil toj twutzjo nya nimil , iˈchaqxla ntiˈ tkyˈi twutz Dios . Me qa ikyjo , aku bˈant tuˈn ttzaj tqanin weˈy kyjaluˈn : ¿ Me tiquˈn nyolbˈiˈn wiˈja tiˈj jun tiˈ , a ntiˈ tkyˈi twutz Dios , exla qa at tkyˈi twutz jun aˈla ?

text: For if I by grace be a partaker , why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks ?
text2: Quˈn qa ma xi nqˈoˈn chjonte te Dios tiˈjjo a nxi nchyoˈn , ¿ Tiquˈntzin nyolbˈin wiˈja tuˈn xi nchyoˈn ?

text: Whether therefore ye eat , or drink , or whatsoever ye do , do all to the glory of God .
text2: Oˈkxsin kxel nqˈmaˈnjiˈy kyeˈy , qa ma chi waˈn , qa ma chi kˈwaˈn , mo qa tiˈ juntl tiˈ xkubˈ kybˈinchiˈn , kybˈinchinkuy te nimsbˈil tbˈi qMan Dios .

text: Give none offence , neither to the Jews , nor to the Gentiles , nor to the church of God :
text2: Exla qa ntiˈ tkyˈi jun tiˈ twutz Dios , me mi kubˈ kybˈinchiˈn , tuˈn mi yaje kyyekˈbˈil kyibˈa tiˈj kynimbˈila kywutz Judiy ex nya Judiy ex kywutzjo txqantl nimil .

text: Even as I please all men in all things , not seeking mine own profit , but the profit of many , that they may be saved .
text2: Quˈn te weˈy , n ‑ ok tilil wuˈn tuˈn tbˈantjo a wen kywutz tkyaqilxjal . Ex nya tok ipbˈil wuˈn tuˈn tbˈantjo tzeˈn waja te weˈy , qalaˈ kye txqantl , tuˈntzin kyklet .

text: Be ye followers of me , even as I also am of Christ .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , chi lipeka tiˈjjo nkubˈ nyekˈiˈn , tzeˈnku weˈ lipcheqiˈn tiˈjjo tyekˈbˈil Crist .

text: Now I praise you , brethren , that ye remember me in all things , and keep the ordinances , as I delivered them to you .
text2: Kxel nqˈoˈn chjonte kyeˈy , tuˈn kukx nchi tzaj kynaˈnjiˈy , ex tuˈn nkubˈ kybˈinchiˈn tzeˈnku xkyij nqˈmaˈn .

text: But I would have you know , that the head of every man is Christ ; and the head of the woman is the man ; and the head of Christ is God .
text2: Me waja tuˈn tel kynikyˈa te , qa ate Crist nejinel te ichin , ex atzin te ichin nejinel te kya , ikytzin tzeˈnku te Dios nejinel te Crist . Tuˈnpetziˈn at jun txˈixpibˈl kyxol kyoklin ichin tukˈa Crist , ex kyxol qya tukˈa ichin , ex kyxol Crist tukˈa qMan Dios .

text: Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
text2: Quˈn qa ma jax tktxuˈn ichin twiˈ tzeˈnku qya toj tja Dios , aj taqˈe naˈl Dios , mo qa aj tyolin Tyol Dios , n ‑ el tikyˈiˈn tmujbˈil tibˈ tukˈa Crist .

text: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head : for that is even all one as if she were shaven .
text2: Ex ikyxjo kyeqya ; qa noq tuˈn kyokku tzeˈnku jun ichin , mi jax kyktxuˈn kywiˈ toj tja Dios , aj kyaqˈe naˈl Dios , mo qa aj kyyolin Tyol Dios , n ‑ el kyikyˈiˈn kymujbˈil kyibˈ kyukˈa ichin , quˈn n ‑ ok kyqˈoˈn kyibˈ te ichin nyakuj mitzoˈn kywiˈ te jun majx .

text: For if the woman be not covered , let her also be shorn : but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , qa at jun qya , tkyˈeˈ jax tktxuˈn twiˈ toj tja Dios , bˈaˈntla tuˈn tel tmitzoˈn twiˈ , tuˈn tok tzeˈnku jun ichin te jun majx . Me jun tij ttxˈixewjo qya aku tzˈel ikyjo tuˈn tkyij twiˈ tzeˈn twiˈ jun ichin . Tuˈnpetziˈn , ilx tiˈj tuˈn tjax tktxuˈn twiˈ toj tja Dios .

text: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head , forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God : but the woman is the glory of the man .
text2: Quˈn tzeˈnku te ichin , nya wen tuˈn tjax tktxuˈn twiˈ toj tja Dios tzeˈnku jun qya , quˈn twutzbˈiyil Dios teˈ , ex jun yekˈbˈil tiˈjjo tqoptzˈajiyil t ‑ xilin Dios . Ex ikyxjo teqya , jun yekˈbˈil tiˈjjo tqoptzˈajiyil t ‑ xilin ichin .

text: For the man is not of the woman ; but the woman of the man .
text2: Quˈn te tnejil , nya te s ‑ el anqˈin tiˈjqya , qalaˈ a teqya tiˈj ichin .

text: Neither was the man created for the woman ; but the woman for the man .
text2: Ex nya tuˈn tpaj teqya xbˈante ichin , qalaˈ tuˈn tpaj te ichin xbˈante qya .

text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , bˈaˈn tuˈn tjax tktxuˈn qya twiˈ , te jun yekˈbˈil kywutz angel , qa tjaqˈ tkawbˈil ichin taˈye .

text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman , neither the woman without the man , in the Lord .
text2: Me toj Ttanim Dios il tiˈj kykabˈil , quˈn ntiˈ ichin qa ntiˈ qya , ex ikyxjo qya ntiˈ , qa ntiˈ ichin .

text: For as the woman is of the man , even so is the man also by the woman ; but all things of god .
text2: Quˈn te tnejil , ate qya tzajnin tiˈj ichin . Me ex ikyxjo , qa tkyaqil ichin n ‑ anqˈin tiˈjqya . Ex tkyaqiljo luˈn tzajnin tiˈj Dios .

text: Judge in yourselves : is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered ?
text2: Quˈn ayex kyeˈ aku chi qˈmante , qa nya wen tuˈn tnaˈn jun qya Dios toj tja Dios tzeˈnku jun ichin , a mi njax kutxbˈil twiˈ , quˈn il tiˈj jun txˈixpibˈl kyxol ichin ex qya .

text: Doth not even nature itself teach you , that , if a man have long hair , it is a shame unto him ?
text2: Quˈn ¿ Ma nyatzin twutzx , qa ttxˈixew te ichiˈn tuˈn tkubˈ tchˈiysin twiˈ tzeˈnku twiˈ jun qya ?

text: But if a woman have long hair , it is a glory to her : for her hair is given her for a covering .
text2: Qalaˈ ma tzaj tqˈoˈnx te Dios tsmal twiˈqya nmaq , tuˈn tok te jun yekˈbˈil qa at txˈixpibˈl kyxol tqoptzˈajiyil qya tukˈa tqoptzˈajiyil ichin . Quˈn ma tzaj tqˈoˈn twiˈqya , tuˈn tchˈiy nmaq wen , tuˈn tok te kutxbˈil twiˈ .

text: But if any man seem to be contentious , we have no such custom , neither the churches of God .
text2: Me ex tiˈj tkyaqiljo luˈn , qa at jun kyxola taj tuˈn tjaw yolbˈin wiˈja tuˈn tpajjo lo , kxel nqˈmaˈn , qa ntiˈ juntl tumil ojtzqiˈn quˈn , ex toj tkyaqil Ttanim Dios .

text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not , that ye come together not for the better , but for the worse .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy tiˈjjo aj tikyˈsit Xjan Wabˈj kyuˈn , nya wen kybˈinchbˈiˈn toj nwutza , ex nya toj tumil ikyjo .

text: For first of all , when ye come together in the church , I hear that there be divisions among you ; and I partly believe it .
text2: Toj tnejil , nqˈumle weˈy qa , aj tok kychmoˈn kyibˈa tuˈn tikyˈsit Xjan Wabˈj kyuˈn , noqx nimku paˈbˈl kyxola . Me toj jun tnej , bˈalaqa twutzx .

text: For there must be also heresies among you , that they which are approved may be made manifest among you .
text2: Quˈn bˈalaqa toj kywutza , il tiˈj tuˈn kypaˈn kyibˈa kyukˈa txqantl , tuˈntzintla kynimsin kyibˈa , ex tuˈn tyekˈinte nyakuj wenqiˈy twutz Dios kywutz txqantl .

text: When ye come together therefore into one place , this is not to eat the Lord ' s supper .
text2: Me kxel nqˈmaˈn qa ajo paˈbˈl lo ntiˈ tajbˈin , ex ajo Xjan Wabˈj , a nchi waˈn tiˈj , nyaxla xjan twutz qAjaw .

text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper : and one is hungry , and another is drunken .
text2: Quˈn ajtzin kywaˈn junx , a naˈmtaq tpon or te Xjan Wabˈj , aye junjun kyxola , a at chˈin kyqˈinimil , nejxix nchi ok ten loˈlte jotx , tuˈn kynojxix wen , ex majxpe nchi bˈaj ja txˈujte . Me ayetzin junjun erman , a yajqe , chˈixtaq kyel kyim tuˈn waˈyaj .

text: What ? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in ? or despise ye the church of God , and shame them that have not ? What shall I say to you ? shall I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
text2: Me ayetzin kyeˈ qˈinin , ¿ Ma ntiˈtzin kye kyja tuˈn kywaˈn ex tuˈn kykˈwan wen antza ? ¿ Tiquˈnil n ‑ el kyikyˈinjiˈy Ttanim Dios , a jaˈ junx kyoklin tkyaqil nimil ? ¿ Ex tiquˈn n ‑ el kyiˈn kytxˈixewjo a ntiˈ at kye ? ¿ Tiˈtzila kxel nqˈmaˈn tiˈjjo lo ? ¿ Okpela kchin tzalajila ? Mina . ¡ Mixla jtojx !

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: Atziˈn xnaqˈtzbˈil ma txi nqˈoˈn kyeˈy , ax qAjaw saj qˈonte weˈy : Quˈn toj qnikyˈin , tej t ‑ xi kˈayin qAjaw Jesús , jaw ttzyuˈn jun wabˈj ,

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: ex xi tqˈoˈn chjonte te qMan Dios . Tbˈajlinxiˈ ikyjo , kubˈ tpiẍin , ex tqˈmaˈ : Atziˈn wabˈj lo atzin wejiˈy nxmilil kxel qˈoˈyit te kyimin noq tuˈn kyel wena . Kybˈinchinkujiˈy luˈn te naˈbˈl weˈy .

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: Ex ikyxjo , tbˈajlinxiˈ waˈn , jaw ttzyuˈn jun tkˈwel kˈwabˈj , ex tqˈma : Atziˈn kˈwabˈj , a tkuˈx tojjo tkˈwel kˈwabˈj lo , atzin nchkyˈeljiˈy k ‑ okil te kujsil te akˈaj tumil bˈantnin tiˈj , tuˈn kykyijxjal toj wen tukˈa Dios . Junjun maj , aj t ‑ xi kykˈwanjiˈy lo , kykˈwanxa te naˈbˈl weˈy .

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Tkyaqil maj , aj t ‑ xi kykˈwanjiˈy kˈwabˈj , ex aj t ‑ xi kywaˈnjiˈy wabˈj , kukxitla xkubˈ kynaˈnjiˈy tkyimlin qAjaw , ajxi tul juntl majl .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , alkye jun kxel waˈn teˈ wabˈj ex kxel kˈwan teˈ kˈwabˈj luˈn , ex nya toj tumil , at til tiˈj , quˈn n ‑ el tikyˈin t ‑ xmilil ex tchkyˈel qAjaw , a xi tqˈoˈn te chojbˈil il .

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , teyile junjun tuˈn t ‑ xpichˈin tiˈj tchwinqil , qa at jun tkyˈi twutz Dios , a naˈmxtaq twaˈn ex tkˈwan tiˈjjo Xjan Wabˈj .

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: Quˈn alkye nwaˈn ex nkˈwan , qa mi s ‑ aj qˈaqˈin tkˈuˈj tiˈj Ttanim Dios , a t ‑ xmilil qAjaw , ax nqaninte jun tkawbˈil Dios tibˈajx kujxix wen .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Tuˈn tpajjo ikyjo , nimku kyxola ntiˈ kyipin , ex yabˈqe , ex ilaˈ o kyim .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: Quˈn noqit nqo xpichˈin wen tiˈjjo qchwinqil , ex noqit nkubˈ qbˈinchin tzeˈnkux taj Dios , nlaytla tzaj tqˈoˈn tkawbˈil qibˈaj .

text: But when we are judged , we are chastened of the Lord , that we should not be condemned with the world .
text2: Exitla qa ma tzaj tkawbˈil qAjaw qibˈaj tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , noqitla tuˈn tjikysit qchwinqil , tuˈntzintla mi qo naje te jun majx kyukˈa nya nimilqe .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , when ye come together to eat , tarry one for another .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn werman , ajtzin tok kychmoˈn kyibˈa waˈl teˈ Xjan Wabˈj , kyyoˈnku kyibˈa kykyaqilxa , quˈn junx kyokliˈn kykyaqila .

text: And if any man hunger , let him eat at home ; that ye come not together unto condemnation . And the rest will I set in order when I come .
text2: Ex qa at jun kyxola , a at chˈin tqˈinimil , bˈaˈn tuˈn ttzaj waˈn tja , qa at waˈyaj tiˈj , tuˈntzin mi chi tzaj kawiˈn tuˈn Dios tuˈn tpajjo chmobˈl ikyjo . Ex atzin txqantl tiˈ , kˈwel nnikˈuˈn , aj npoˈn kyukˈiy .

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , waja tuˈn kybˈinte chˈin tiˈj Xewbˈaj Xjan :

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Bˈiˈn kyuˈn , teˈ naˈmtaq kynimiˈn Tyol Dios , nxi kyqˈoˈntaq kyibˈa tuˈn kykubˈ sbˈuˈn , ex nchex qˈiˈntaqa kˈulil kywutzjo twutzbˈiyil , a mibˈin chi yolin .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Qalaˈ te Jesús aku tAjaw Tkyaqil . Tuˈnpetziˈn , waja tuˈn kybˈintiˈy qa mix aˈl jun aku qˈmante aj kˈa te Jesús , a qa at Xewbˈaj Xjan tukˈa . Ex ikyxjo , mix aˈl juntl aku qˈmante tukˈa tkyaqil tanmin qa ate Jesús tAjaw Tkyaqil , a qa mina nyolin tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , at nimku qoklin , me ate Xewbˈaj Xjan junchˈin , ex ttxuyil tkyaqiljo qoklin .

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: Ex at nimku tumil tuˈn qajbˈin te Dios , me junxchˈin qAjaw , a jaˈ nqo ajbˈine .

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Ex at nimku tumil tuˈn qbˈinchin tajbˈil Dios , me junxchˈin qMan Dios , a nkubˈ bˈinchinte tkyaqiljo lo .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: Me tkyaqiljo qoklin , ex jniˈ tumil tuˈn qajbˈin te Dios , ex tkyaqil qbˈinchbˈin tzajninqe tiˈj Xewbˈaj Xjan , tuˈn tajbˈin kye txqantl .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Quˈn ate Xewbˈaj Xjan ntzaj qˈoˈnte nim nabˈl te junjun , ex te juntl axjo Xewbˈaj Xjan ntzaj tqˈoˈn , tuˈn tyolin tukˈa nim tumil ex ojtzqibˈl .

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: Ex te juntl ax Xewbˈaj Xjan ntzaj qˈoˈnte qˈuqbˈil tkˈuˈj tiˈjjo kˈwel tbˈinchin Dios . Ex te juntl ntzaj tqˈoˈn toklin tuˈn kyqˈanit yabˈ tuˈn .

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: Ex te juntl ntzaj tqˈoˈn toklin tuˈn tyekˈitjo tipin Dios , ex te juntl tuˈn tyolin Tyol Dios tukˈa tkyaqil tanmin ; ex te juntl tuˈn tel tnikyˈ te qa nyolin jun xjal tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , mo te taqˈnil tajaw il ; ex te juntl ntzaj tqˈoˈn toklin tuˈn tyolin toj junxil yol ; ex te juntl ntzaj tqˈoˈn tuˈn tel pjetjo yol anetziˈn .

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: Me tkyaqiljo qoklin lo , ax Xewbˈaj Xjan ntzaj qˈoˈnte teyile junjun , noq alkyex wen toj twutz .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Qkaˈyinktzin tiˈjjo qxmilil . Junxchˈin , me ilaˈ elnin . Me exla qa ilaˈ elnin , me junxchˈin xmilil at . Exsin ikyxjo tukˈa Ttanim Crist .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Quˈn tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , qkyaqilx nqo kuˈx toj aˈ te jawsbˈil aˈ , tuˈn qok te junchˈin Ttanim , a t ‑ xmilil Crist . Exla qa Judiy mo minaj , exla qa aqˈnil te jun majx , mo tzaqpiˈnj , ma qo ok te junchˈin Ttanim noq tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , a ma tzaj qkˈmoˈn .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , jun xmilil , nya noq junchˈin elnin , qalaˈ nimku .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Ikytzintlaˈ chit qanbˈajjo kyjaluˈn : Tuˈn nya qˈobˈajqiˈn , ntiˈ wokliˈn tiˈjjo xmilil , chitjo . Me nya tuˈn ikyjo , ntiˈt toklin tiˈj qxmilil .

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Exitla tqˈma ẍkyinbˈaj kyjaluˈn : Tuˈn nya wutzbˈajqin weˈ , ntiˈ weˈ woklin tiˈjjo xmilil , chitjo . Me nya tuˈnjo luˈn , ntiˈt toklin tiˈj qxmilil .

text: If the whole body were an eye , where were the hearing ? If the whole were hearing , where were the smelling ?
text2: Quˈn noqit tkyaqil qxmilil wutzbˈaj , mitla nqbˈiˈn . Ex noqit tkyaqil qxmilil ẍkyinbˈaj , mitla nqsqoˈn .

text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body , as it hath pleased him .
text2: Me axte Dios , ma tzˈok qˈonte junjun tnej qxmilil jaˈxjo at tajbˈin toj twutz .

text: And if they were all one member , where were the body ?
text2: Quˈn noqit junx tnej tkyaqil , ntiˈtla teˈ qxmilil .

text: But now are they many members , yet but one body .
text2: Me chjonte Dios , a qxmilil junchˈin , me nimku elnin .

text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand , I have no need of thee : nor again the head to the feet , I have no need of you .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , a wutzbˈaj , nlay txi tqˈmaˈn te qˈobˈaj : Ntiˈ te tajbˈin weˈy . Ex a wiˈbˈaj , nlay txi tqˈmaˈn te qanbˈaj : Ntiˈ te tajbˈin weˈy , chitjo .

text: Nay , much more those members of the body , which seem to be more feeble , are necessary :
text2: Qalaˈ , ayetziˈn tnej qxmilil , a nyakuj ntiˈxix kyipin toj qwutz , ayexixpe kye nim kyajbˈin .

text: And those members of the body , which we think to be less honourable , upon these we bestow more abundant honour ; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness .
text2: Ex ayetziˈn tnej qxmilil nyakuj noq chˈin kyoklin , ayexix nchi ok qktxuˈn wen . Ex ikyqexjo ayeˈ nya qˈanchaˈlqexix toj qwutz , ayexix nchi ok qkˈuˈjliˈn .

text: For our comely parts have no need : but God hath tempered the body together , having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked :
text2: A lo nya ilxix tiˈj kyukˈa tnej qxmilil , a ntiˈ txˈixwejil tiˈj . Me ate Dios xkubˈ bˈinchinte qxmilil , tzeˈnkux tten tuˈntzin il tiˈj tuˈn kyok kˈuˈjlit kyeˈ aye nyakuj ntiˈxix kyoklin toj qwutz ,

text: That there should be no schism in the body ; but that the members should have the same care one for another .
text2: tuˈntzin ntiˈ paˈbˈl toj qxmilil ; qalaˈ teyilex te junjun tnej at tajbˈin kye txqantl .

text: And whether one member suffer , all the members suffer with it ; or one member be honoured , all the members rejoice with it .
text2: Quˈn qa ma kyˈixbˈe jun tnej qxmilil , kykyaqilxjo txqantl ktnaˈbˈil kyixkˈoj . Ex qa ma txi kyqˈoˈnxjal jun nimsbˈil tiˈj jun tnej qxmilil , kykyaqilxjo txqantl nchi tzalaj junx .

text: Now ye are the body of Christ , and members in particular .
text2: Tzeˈnku kye , ma chi oka te junchˈin Ttanim Dios , a T ‑ xmilil Crist , ex teyile junjun kyeˈ at toklin tiˈj . Quˈn axte Dios xi qˈoˈnte toklin junjun kyeˈ toj Ttanim : Tnejil kye tsanjil ; tkabˈ kye yolil Tyol Dios ; toxin kye xnaqˈtzil ; ex ikyxjo kye aye nchi bˈinchin yekˈbˈil te tipin Dios , ex aye nchi qˈanin kye yabˈ , ex aye nchi onin kyiˈj txqantl , ex aye nchi nikˈunte taqˈin Dios , ex aye nchi yolin toj tzeˈnchaqkul yol .

text: Are all apostles ? are all prophets ? are all teachers ? are all workers of miracles ?
text2: ¿ Ma tkyaqilxpela at kyoklin te tsanjil Jesús ? Mo ¿ Ma tkyaqilxpela at kyoklin te yolil Tyol Dios mo tuˈn kybˈinchin yekˈbˈil te tipin Dios ,

text: Have all the gifts of healing ? do all speak with tongues ? do all interpret ?
text2: mo tuˈn kyqˈanin yabˈ , mo tuˈn kyyolin toj tzeˈnchaqkul yol , mo tuˈn tpjet yol kyuˈn ? ¡ Mina !

text: But covet earnestly the best gifts : and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way .
text2: Me kyqˈonktzintza tilil ex kyjyomjiˈy tbˈanil kyokliˈn . Ex atzin jaˈlin kxel nqˈmaˈn jun tumil tbˈanilxix wen tzeˈnqeku luˈn :

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: Qa ma qo yolin yol tbˈanilx tzeˈnku kye xjal , mo qa toj noq tzeˈnchaqkul yol tzeˈnku kye angel , ex qa ntiˈ tqˈaqˈbˈil qkˈuˈj kyiˈj qukˈa , ntiˈxla qajbˈin ; ikyqoxjo tzeˈnku tqˈajqˈojil jun tiˈ ntinin wen , mo tzeˈnku jun kxbˈil , a noq oˈkx ntzlinin .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: Ex qa ma tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios tuˈn qyolin Tyol , ex tuˈn tel qnikyˈ te tkyaqil t ‑ xilin t ‑ xim Dios , a ewintaq , ex jniˈ tnabˈl , exla qa at nim qnimbˈil , tuˈn tikyˈ jun wutz quˈn , ex tuˈn tpon toj juntl tqˈuqbˈil , exsin qa ntiˈ qkˈuˈj kyiˈj qukˈa , ntiˈx qajbˈin ikyjo .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: Ex qa ma txi qsipin tkyaqiljo at qe kye tal yaj , ex qa ma t ‑ xi qqˈoˈn qibˈ tuˈn qkyim tuˈn tpaj qnimbˈil , me qa ntiˈ qkˈuˈj kyiˈj qukˈa , ntiˈx k ‑ ajbˈile qe , aj qok toj paˈbˈin twutz qMan Dios .

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: Qa at qkˈuˈj kyiˈj qukˈa , il tiˈj tuˈn tikyˈx quˈn , ex soˈjqo , mi nloˈchj qanmin kyiˈj , nya nimsil qibˈqo , nya yekˈbˈil qibˈqo ,

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: mi kubˈ qbˈinchin a nya wen kywutz qukˈa , mi qo jyon tiˈj noqx te qeku , ntiˈ tyabˈ qwiˈ , ex mibˈin qo kˈuˈn qˈoj .

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: Mi qo tzalaj tiˈjjo nya wen , qalaˈ qo tzalaj tiˈjjo a twutzxix .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Tkyaqilx kkyˈelix quˈn , kukx kqebˈil qkˈuˈjjo tiˈj qMan Dios toj tkyaqil , ex qo ayoˈn tiˈj tajbˈil qMan tukˈa qukˈa . Tuˈnpetziˈn , kukx paˈn quˈn .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Atzin qkˈuˈjbˈil mixla jtojx tuˈn tbˈaj . Me nya kukx k ‑ yolile Diosjo kyuˈn yolil Tyol ; ex aye tzeˈnchaqku yol ; exsin jniˈ nabˈl kchi bˈajil te jun majx .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Ex noq kyinchaqjo Tyol Dios n ‑ el qnikyˈ te jaˈlin .

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: Me ajtzin tul teˈ a tzˈaqlexix , tkyaqiljo tnejin kbˈajil .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Quˈn ikytzin tzeˈnku weˈ , tej kˈwalqinxtaqa , nchin yolintaqa , nchin ximintaqa , ex ikytaq nnabˈla tzeˈnku jun kˈwal . Me atzin te ẍin tijiˈn , o kyij nqˈoˈnjiˈy tkyaqiljo tzeˈnku nbˈanttaq wuˈn , tej kˈwalqintaqa .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Quˈn ikytziˈn qnimbˈil tiˈj qAjaw tzeˈnku qwutz nkux qkaˈyin toj jun kaˈybˈil wutzbˈaj . Qˈanchaˈl , me nyakuj najchaq taˈye , quˈn nlay tzyet quˈn . Me aj tul qAjaw , k ‑ okil qkaˈyin qwutz tukˈa . Quˈn atzin jaˈlin , noq kyinchaqjo n ‑ el qnikyˈ te . Me toj tqˈijil qAjaw , okpin k ‑ elil qnikyˈtz te tkyaqil , ikytziˈn tzeˈnku te qAjaw ojtzqiˈnqo tuˈn qkyaqilx .

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin kyxol nimil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ atjo qnimbˈil , ex atjo qˈuqbˈil qkˈuˈj , ex atjo qkˈuˈj kyiˈj qukˈa . Me kyxoljo oxe luˈn , axix te nim tokliˈn : Qkˈuˈjbˈil qibˈ qxolx .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Chi lipektzintza tiˈj kykˈuˈjbˈil kyibˈa , ex kyqˈonktzin tililjo a kyokliˈn , a tzajnin tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan . Me tibˈaj tkyaqiljo kyokliˈn , tuˈn kyyoliˈn Tyol Dios kyxolxa .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Quˈn ayetziˈn nchi yolin toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol , nya kyukˈa xjal nchi yoline , qalaˈ tukˈa Dios , quˈn a yol tzajnin te Xewbˈaj Xjan , ex mix aˈl n ‑ el tnikyˈ te .

text: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification , and exhortation , and comfort .
text2: Me metzin kye nchi yolin Tyol Dios , nchi mojin tuˈn kychˈiyjo txqantl toj kynimbˈil , ex tuˈn tnimsit kykˈuˈj , ex tuˈn tqe kykˈuˈj tiˈj .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Qalaˈ , ayetziˈn nchi yolin toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol , noqx tuˈn kychˈiy kyil kyibˈx . Me ayetzin kyeˈ nchi yolin Tyol Dios , nchˈiyjo Ttanim Dios kyuˈn .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Wajatlaˈy tuˈn kykyaqilxa tuˈn kyyoliˈn toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol . Me tuˈn tchˈiy Ttanim Dios wen , nimxix toklin Tyol Dios tuˈn kyyoliˈn tiˈj , tzeˈnku tuˈn kyyoliˈn toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol , a ntiˈ pujbˈilte .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: Atziˈn jaˈlin werman , qa ma chin kaniˈn yolil kyxola toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol , ¿ Tiˈn k ‑ ajbˈile kyeˈy , qa mi ẍin yoliˈn jun xim , jun nabˈl , jun yol , mo jun xnaqˈtzbˈil , a tiˈj Tyol Dios ?

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Ikytziˈn tzeˈnqeku chnabˈ , tzeˈnku jun xux mo juntl tiˈ : Qa mix txˈixpit tqˈajqˈojil kywiˈ , ¿ Tzeˈntzin tten tuˈn tel tnikyˈtzajil alkye bˈitz n ‑ ok tuˈn ?

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: Ex ikyxjo tzeˈnku tqˈajqˈojil jun chun kyxol xoˈl qˈaqˈ ; me qa noqx ntutin , ex ntiˈ tqˈajqˈojil twiˈ te txokbˈil , ¿ Tzeˈntzin tten tuˈn tel kynikyˈ te , qa il tiˈj tuˈn kyxiˈ toj jyoj qˈoj ?

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Exsin ikyxjo kyetza : Qa ma chi yoliˈn toj junxil yol , a ntiˈ ttxolil kywutz txqantl , ¿ Tzeˈntzin tten tuˈn tel tnikyˈtzajiljo a nxi kyqˈmaˈn ? Quˈn mix aˈl k ‑ elil tnikyˈ te , nyakuj noq toj kyqˈiqˈ nxi kyqˈmaniˈy .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Quˈn ilaˈku yol nyolajtz tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , me ntiˈ jun ntit ttxolil kye nchi yolin .

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , qa mi n ‑ el nnikyˈa te tyol jun xjal , ma chin oka tzeˈnku jun amaqˈ xjal toj twutzjo xjal , ex ikyxjo texjal toj nwutza .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Me ayetzin kyeˈ ma chi oka te junchˈin Ttanim Dios , ex kyaja tuˈn tyekˈit Xewbˈaj Xjan kyxola tuˈn kyokliˈn , tzeˈnku tuˈn kyyoliˈn toj junxilchaq yol . Me kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , kyqˈonktzintza tilil kyiˈjjo kyoklin tuˈn tbˈant kyyoliˈn tzeˈnkuxjo chi yolinxjal tuˈn tchˈiyjo Ttanim Dios .

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , aye nchi yolin toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol , bˈaˈn tuˈn t ‑ xi kyqanin toj kynaˈj Dios , tuˈn tpjetjo yol anetziˈn .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: Quˈn qa ma chin naˈn Dios toj junxil yol , ex qa mi n ‑ el nnikyˈa te , okla chin naˈla Dios toj wanmiˈn , me tukˈa nnabˈla , mina .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: ¿ Tzeˈntzin k ‑ okiltz wuˈn ? Nyala tzeˈntz ; qa ma chin naˈn Dios toj wanmiˈn , me il tiˈj tuˈn tel nnikyˈa te titziˈn nxi nqaniˈn ; ex qa ma chin bˈitziˈn tukˈa wanmiˈn , ex il tiˈj tuˈn tel nnikyˈa te titziˈn nxi nbˈitziˈn .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Qa at jun nbˈiˈn kyiˈja toj kˈulbˈil , ex qa ma txi kyqˈoˈn chjonte te Dios toj junxil yol , ¿ Tzeˈntzin tten tuˈn tel nikyˈbˈaj te , qa toj tumil kyyola ?

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Bˈalaqa toj tumil nchi qˈoniˈy chjonte te Dios , me ante , a mi n ‑ el tnikyˈ te , nlay chˈiy toj tnimbˈil .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Nxi nqˈoˈn chjonte te qMan Dios , tuˈn tbˈant ‑ xix chˈintl nyoliˈn toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol tzeˈnku kyeˈ .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: Me qa waja tuˈn tel kynikyˈjo Ttanim Dios te nyola , il tiˈj tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈmaˈn jun jweˈ nyola , me tuˈn tel kynikyˈ te , tzeˈnkul teˈ tuˈn wok ten qˈmal txqan nyola , exsin mi tzˈel kynikyˈ te .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Ayiˈy werman , mi chi oka tzeˈnku jun kˈwal , a noq tiˈjx nbˈisine ; qalaˈ ku kyoka tzeˈnku jun tij xjal at tnabˈl . Noq oˈkx tiˈjjo tumil il , bˈaˈn tuˈn kyoka te kˈwal , a naˈm tuˈn tel tnikyˈ te bˈinchj il .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Quˈn ikytzin ntqˈmaˈn toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios : Kchin yolila kyukˈa nmaq tnam lo toj junxil yol ; junxilqel kchi okil nqˈoˈn te yolil wiˈja . Me mixla tuˈnxj nlayxla chin kubˈ kynimiˈn , chi tAjaw Tkyaqil .

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: Ikytziˈn , bˈiˈn quˈn qa nqo yolin toj tzeˈnchaqku yol toj kˈulbˈil , nya jun yekˈbˈil qa at Xewbˈaj Xjan qukˈa , tzeˈnku nkyqˈmaˈn , qalaˈ noq tuˈn mi tzˈeleku kynikyˈxjal tiˈj Tbˈanil Tqanil , ex tuˈn kyklet . Me atzin teˈ tuˈn qyolin Tyol Dios nyekˈin teˈ , qa te Diosqo .

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: Quˈn ajtzin tok kychmoˈn kyibˈa toj kˈulbˈil , ayiˈy Ttanim Dios , ex qa kykyaqilxa nchi yoliˈn toj tzeˈnchaqku yol , exsin qa aku s ‑ okpin jun nya nimil bˈil kyiˈja , ¿ Nyapela aku kubˈ tbˈisin qa txˈuˈjqiˈy ?

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: Me metziˈn qa kykyaqilxa nchi yoliˈn Tyol Dios , exsin qa aku s ‑ okpin jun nya nimil , ax kˈwel bˈisinte qa aj il , ex ax kˈwel nabˈlinte toj tanmin qa nya bˈaˈn tten , quˈn tuˈn k ‑ elil tnikyˈ te kyyola .

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: Quˈn ikytziˈn a ewintaq toj tanmin k ‑ elitz toj qˈanchaˈl , ex kˈwel meje tuˈn tnimsin tbˈi Dios , ex ktqˈmaˈ , qa twutzxix at Dios kyxola .

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn werman , aj qa ma tzˈok kychmoˈn kyibˈa , i tbˈitzin junjun jun bˈitz , mo i tqˈoˈn junjun jun xnaqˈtzbˈil , mo jun tumil tzajnin te Dios , mo juntl tumil toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol , mo jun pujbˈil kye yol ayeˈ . Bˈaˈn teˈ ikyjo , me noqit tkyaqil tzˈajbˈin te chˈiysbˈilte Ttanim Dios toj kynimbˈil .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Aj kyyoliˈn toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol , bˈaˈn tuˈn kyyolin oˈkx kabˈe mo oxe , me junjunku . Ex il tiˈj tuˈn tpjetjo yol nkyqˈmaˈn .

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: Me qa mix aˈl jun xjal aku pjunte yol anetziˈn , bˈaˈntla tuˈn mi chi yoliniˈy tojjo noq tzeˈnchaqku yol tojjo kˈulbˈil te Ttanim Dios . Qalaˈ , qa kyaja tuˈn kyyoliˈn toj noq tzeˈnchaqku yol , teyilex te junjun tuˈn tyolin tiˈjx tukˈa Dios .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin kyiˈjjo aye nchi yolin Tyol Dios , bˈaˈn tuˈn kyyolin kabˈe mo oxe , ex ayetzin txqantl toj kˈulbˈil bˈaˈn tuˈn kyximinxix tiˈjjo a nqˈumle .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: Me qa aku s ‑ ok tyekˈin Dios jun tumil toj tnabˈl jun xjal qˈuqle bˈil toj kˈulbˈil , atziˈn nyolintaq bˈaˈn tuˈn t ‑ xi tqˈoˈn ambˈil te tkabˈ tuˈn tyolin .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Ikytziˈn , tkyaqil a ma tzaj tyekˈin Dios jun tumil , bˈaˈn tuˈn kyyolin toj kˈulbˈil , me junjun maj te junjun , tuˈntzin tkyaqilx tuˈn t ‑ xnaqˈtzajtz , ex tuˈn tnimsit kykˈuˈj toj kynimbˈil .

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , il tiˈj tuˈn kytzyuˈn kyibˈa tuˈn kyqˈoˈn ambˈil kye txqantl tuˈn kyyolin .

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: Quˈn ate qMan Dios , jun Dios te nukˈbˈil , nya noq te tzeˈnchaqku , ikytziˈn tzeˈnku nbˈant toj tkyaqil Ttanim Dios toj tkyaqil tnam .

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: Ex at juntl tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy kyiˈjjo qya , a mi n ‑ el kynikyˈ te yol toj kˈulbˈil , quˈn noq tiˈchaqku tiˈ nchi ok ten qanilte te kychmil , ex noq nbˈajel kyyuchˈiˈn chmobˈl . Nya wen ikyjo . Tuˈnpetziˈn , bˈaˈntla noq tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈiˈn , ex tuˈn tkubˈ kynimin tzeˈnku ntqˈmaˈn toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Qatla qa kyaj tuˈn kyqanin jun tiˈ , bˈaˈntla tuˈn t ‑ xi kyqaninte kychmil tzma kyja , quˈn nya wen tuˈn tyuchˈitjo kˈulbˈil tuˈn ikyjo .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: Toj tkyaqiljo tumil wuˈja lo , il tiˈj tuˈn tel kynikyˈa te , qa nya kyukˈiy saj xkye Tyol Dios , ex nya noq oˈkqexa ma chi kˈmoˈnte . Quˈn toj tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ nchˈiy Ttanim Dios wen tuˈn xnaqˈtzbˈil lo , ¿ Yajtzin kyeˈ ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Qa at jun njaw tnimin tibˈ yolil Tyol Dios , ex qa at Xewbˈaj Xjan toj tanmin , bˈaˈn tuˈn tel tnikyˈ te , qa ajo nkubˈ ntzˈibˈiˈn axjo tnukˈbˈil qMan Dios .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Quˈn alkye mi nkubˈ tbˈin nyola lo , ex nlayxla kubˈ nbˈiˈn tyol .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn werman , kyqˈonka tilil tuˈn kyyoliˈn Tyol Dios , ex mi tzˈok kymiyoˈn tuˈn tyolatzjo noq tzeˈnchaqku yol .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Me kybˈinchinkuy tkyaqil toj tumilxix ex tukˈa nukˈbˈil .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Atzin jaˈlin werman , waja tuˈn tkubˈ kynaˈnjiˈy Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , a xi nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy . Axsin yoljo lo a o kubˈ kynimiˈn , ex jaˈ waˈlqexixa toj kynimbˈila ;

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: ex tuˈn yol lo ma chi kleta , qa ma kubˈ kykˈuˈnjiˈy , a xi nqˈmaˈn . Qatzin mina , ntiˈxla tajbˈin kynimbˈila ikyjo .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Kxel nqˈmaˈn qa a Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , a tzaj nkˈmoˈn , a xi nqˈmaˈnjiˈy kyeˈy : Ajo t ‑ xilin yol lo : Bˈeˈx kyim Crist te chojbˈilte qil , tzeˈnku ntqˈmaˈn toj Tyol Dios ;

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: ex kux muqet , ex toj toxin qˈij , bˈeˈx jaw anqˈintl juntl majl , tzeˈnku ntqˈmaˈn toj Tyol Dios .

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ ikyjo , ok tyekˈin tibˈ te Pegr , ex kywutzjo kabˈlajaj , aye skˈoˈn tuˈn Jesús te t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈin .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Atximaytaq chˈintl , ok tyekˈin tibˈ kye jweˈ syent nimil junx , a nimku itzˈx , ex iteˈ junjun o chi kyim .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ ikyjo , ok tyekˈin tibˈ te Santyaw , ex atximaytaq chˈintl kye kykyaqil tsanjil .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Tbˈajlinxi jniˈ ikyjo , ok tyekˈin tibˈ weˈy , a otaqxi tzˈaj toj kyaˈj .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Quˈn ayin weˈ ntiˈtaq wajbˈiˈn kywutzjo txqantl tsanjil Jesús , ex ntiˈtaq chˈin wokliˈn tuˈn woka te tsanjil , quˈn ma chin jyoˈn qˈoj tiˈj Ttanim Dios .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Me noq tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil , ma chin oka te tsanjil Jesús . Ex nya noq kukxjo txokbˈil lo , quˈn ma chin aqˈniˈn kujxixtl tzeˈnku txqantl ; me ex nya ayiˈn , qalaˈ noq tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil qMan Dios wukˈiy .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Quˈn nya tuˈn te , aj qa weˈy s ‑ ela kybˈiˈn , moj qa kye txqantl tsanjil Jesús , quˈn junxchˈin te Tbˈanil Tqanil , a xi qqˈmaˈn , ex o chi nimiˈn tiˈj .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , qa jun elnin qyola tiˈjjo tanqˈbˈil Crist juntl majl kyxol kyimnin , ¿ Tiquˈntzin at junjun kyxola nqˈmaˈnte qa nlay chi jatz anqˈintl juntl majl kyimnin ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: A noqit ikytzjo , mitla xjatz anqˈintl juntl majl te Cristtz .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Ex noqit mi xjatz anqˈin te Crist , ntiˈxitla tajbˈiˈn qyola , ex ntiˈxitla tajbˈin kynimbˈila .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Ex awotzin qeˈ , matla qo oka nikyˈil yol tiˈj Dios , quˈn ma qqˈmaˈy , qa ma jaw anqˈin juntl majl Crist tuˈn . Quˈn noqit ntiˈ a tuˈn tjatz anqˈin kyimnin , ex mitla xjatz anqˈin te Crist .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Quˈn noqit twutzxtz qa mi nchi jaw anqˈin kyimnin , exitla ikyxjo te Crist , bˈeˈxitla kyim teˈ te jun majx .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Quˈn noqit mi xjatz anqˈin Crist , ntiˈxitla tajbˈin kynimbˈila ; kukxitla kytenjiˈy tjaqˈ tkawbˈil il , ex ntiˈxitla kolbˈil kyeˈy .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: A noqpetzin iky tetzjo , ayetzintlaˈ nimil o chi kyim , najnintla iteˈ kyetzjo te jun majx .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Ay werman , a noqpetzin oˈkx tajbˈin qnimbˈil tiˈj Crist tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , noqxitla ma kubˈ qsbˈuˈn te qibˈtz tzeˈnku kye txqantl xjal .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Me twutzxix tetz , qa ate Crist xjatz anqˈin kyxol kyimnin , tzeˈnku tnejil twutz awal , te jun yekˈbˈil te qe , qa il tiˈj tuˈn qjatz anqˈinqe .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Quˈn ikyxjo tzeˈnku s ‑ ul kanin kyimin kye jniˈ xjal noq tuˈn jun ichin , ex ikyxjo noq tuˈn jun ichin , kchi jawitz anqˈin kyimnin , aye kchi nimil tiˈj , tuˈn tten kychwinqil te jun majx .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Quˈn noq tuˈn tbˈinchbˈin Adán , jaˈ saje kyimin kyibˈaj kykyaqilxjal . Exsin ikyxjo , noq tuˈn Crist kykyaqiljo kchi nimil tiˈj kchi jawil anqˈintl juntl majl .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Me teyilex te junjun toj ttxolil . Quˈn ate Crist xjatz anqˈin tnejil . Atzin qetz , awo o qo nimin tiˈj , tzmaxi aj tul Crist juntl majl toj tqˈijil ,

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: aj tjapin bˈaj tkyaqil . Tojjo qˈij anetziˈn , kykyaqilx otaq kubˈ tiˈj , tuˈn Crist : Jniˈ nmaq kyoklin , junx tukˈa tkyaqil kawbˈil , ex jniˈ atnaj tipin qibˈaj . Ex k ‑ okil tchmoˈn Crist twutz Dios tkyaqiljo jniˈ tchˈiysbˈin , tuˈn tkawin qMan tibˈaj te jun majx .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Quˈn ate Crist il tiˈj tuˈn tkawin , me tzmaxiˈ aj ttzaj tqˈoˈn qMan tuˈn tkanbˈin Crist kyibˈaj jniˈ tajqˈoj .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Ex atziˈn tchˈibˈil tajqˈoj , a kˈwel yuchˈit te jun majx , atziˈn kyimin .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Quˈn ikytziˈn ntqˈmaˈn Tuˈjil Tyol Dios kyjaluˈn : Quˈn ate Dios xi qˈoˈnte tuˈn tkanbˈin kyibˈaj tkyaqil . Me a yol , tkyaqil , mi ntqˈmaˈn qa ajin qMan Dios , quˈn apente Dios xi qˈonte tuˈn tkanbˈin Crist tibˈaj tkyaqil .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Me ajtzin tjapin bˈajjo luˈn , k ‑ okil tqˈoˈn Crist tkyaqiljo otaq bˈant tuˈn , tjaqˈ tkawbˈil qMan Dios te jun majx , tuˈntzin tyekˈin qa a Dios twutzxix , qa a tAjaw Tkyaqil ex Tibˈaj Tkyaqil .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , il tiˈj tuˈn kyjaw anqˈin kye nimil , ayeˈ otaq chi kyim . Ex qa mina , ¿ Tiquˈntzin nchi kuˈxa toj aˈ , te jawsbˈil aˈ te jun naˈbˈl kyiˈjjo nimil , ayeˈ o chi kyim ? Quˈn qa mi ẍi jaw anqˈin qtzan nimil , bˈeˈx i kyimtz te jun majx . Ex qa ikyjo , ¿ Tiquˈntz nchi tzaj kynaˈn , aj kykuˈxa toj aˈ ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Quˈn noqpetzin mi chi jaw anqˈin kye kyimnin , ¿ Tiquˈn n ‑ elje qiˈja junjun qˈijtz tuˈn tpajjo Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Twutzxix nyola qa tkyaqil qˈij n ‑ elje wiˈja tuˈn nkubˈ bˈyoˈn noq tuˈn tpaj nnimbˈila tiˈj qAjaw Jesucrist , ex twutzxix aye kyeˈ ma chi ok te twutz waqˈnbˈiˈn .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Qa ma tzˈok tilil wuˈn tuˈn nyoliˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil kyukˈaxjal toj Éfeso , ayeˈ mi n ‑ okx toj kywiˈ , tzeˈnqeku toj kˈul txuk , mix aˈl n ‑ oksin kyiˈj , me ¿ Tiˈtzin nkanebˈa tiˈj , qa oˈkx nchin bˈisinjiˈy tiˈj jun chojbˈil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , ex noqit mi nchi jaw anqˈin kyimnin ? Noqit ikytzjo , bˈaˈntla tuˈn tkubˈ qqˈmaˈn tzeˈnku ntqˈmaˈn jun yol kyxolxjal : Qo waˈn ex qo txˈujte , quˈn yajtzilaˈ qa xqo kyimku nchiˈj .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Mi chi txalpaja toj kynimbˈila , ikyjo tzeˈnku ntqˈmaˈn juntl yol kyxolxjal : Mi chex kybˈinjiˈy yol nya tumilqe , tuˈn mi cheˈxa qˈiˈn kyuˈn .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Bˈaˈnqexa kykaˈyink kyibˈa noq chi bˈinchiˈn il . Nxi nqˈmanjiˈy luˈn kyeˈy , noq tuˈn kytzaj txˈixwekuy , quˈn at junjun kyxola , a naˈmx tel tnikyˈ te Dios .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Nlayla txi kynimiˈn tiˈjjo anqˈbˈil kye kyimnin , quˈn at junjun kyxola aku txi tqˈmaˈn : ¿ Tzeˈntzilaˈ qxmilil aj qjatz anqˈin kyxol kyimnin ?

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Qa ikyjo , me ntiˈ tumiljo nabˈl ikyjo . Quˈn ¿ Ma mitzin ojtzqiˈn kyuˈn , tzeˈn aj tkuˈx awet jun twutz ijaj , il tiˈj tuˈn tjatz twiˈ , exsin tuˈn tqˈayjtz ?

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Quˈn ajtzin tkux awet jun wiq ijaj , qa triy mo qa alkye jun ijaj , nya otaq tzˈel twiˈ aj tkux awet ; qalaˈ a tejo tal twutz kˈwelix awet .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Me ate Dios ntzaj qˈonte tqan awal , tzeˈnkuxjo taj , ex teyile junjun wiq ijaj noqx alkye kaˈyin .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Ex nya jun elnin tkyaqil wiq xmilil . Quˈn awo xjalqo at jun wiq qxmilil , ex aye txuk juntl wiq ; exqetziˈn pichˈ junxitl , exqetziˈn kyiẍ toj aˈ , ex junxitl .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Quˈn atziˈn qxmilil , tbˈanilx tuˈn qtzalaj tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ . Ex ikyxjo , aj qjapin toj kyaˈj , ex ktzajil qˈoˈn juntl wiq qxmilil tbˈanilx , tuˈn qtzalaj toj kyaˈj .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Quˈn ikytziˈn tzeˈnku te qˈij , mikyxi tqoptzˈajiyiljo tzeˈnku te xjaw mo tzeˈnkuˈ kye cheˈw . Me ex ikyqex kye cheˈwjo nya junx kyqoptzˈajiyil kykyaqilx .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , bˈin quˈn qa tkyaqiljo tbˈanil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ ex tkyaqiljo nqoptzˈaje toj kyaˈj nchi ajbˈin te jun yekˈbˈil tiˈjjo kyjawlintz anqˈin kyimnin . Ikytziˈn qxmilil kˈwelix muqet tzeˈnku jun ijaj , tuˈn tqˈayj . Me ex kjawitz anqˈin , tuˈn mi kyime te jun majx .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Kˈwelix muqetjo jun qxmilil , a ntiˈ tipin , tuˈn tel qˈayj , me kjawitz anqˈin juntl qxmilil tbˈanilx wen , ex nimxix tipin .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Ajo qxmilil te twutz txˈotxˈ kˈwelix muqet , me a qxmilil te Xewbˈaj Xjan , at tchwinqil te jun majx . Quˈn ikytziˈn qa at qxmilil te twutz txˈotxˈ , ex ikyxjo , il tiˈj jun qxmilil te Xewbˈaj Xjan .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Quˈn ikytziˈn ntqˈmaˈn toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios : Atzin tnejil ichin Adán , ma tzaj tqˈoˈn qchwinqil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ . Ex ikyxjo tkabˈ Adán , a Jesús , ex ma tzul te qˈol chwinqil te qe te jun majx .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Quˈn ikytzin n ‑ el qnikyˈ te , qa a qxmilil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , nej xten ; ex atziˈn tzul yajxi atziˈn te qxmililjo te Xewbˈaj Xjan .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Quˈn atzin tnejil ichin xkubˈ bˈinchin tukˈa txˈotxˈ , ex te twutz txˈotxˈ teˈ . Me anteˈ tkabˈ te toj kyaˈj teˈ .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Ma qo ok tzeˈnku te Adán , a te twutz txˈotxˈ , ex qo okil tzeˈnku te Crist , a te toj kyaˈj .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Quˈn teyile junjun qe at jun t ‑ xmilil tzeˈnku te Adán , a te twutz txˈotxˈ . Ex qqˈonktzin tilil , tuˈn qok tzeˈnku te Crist , a te toj kyaˈj .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Waja tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy werman ; qa a qxmilil te twutz txˈotxˈ ntiˈ toklin tuˈn tten toj Tkawbˈil Dios te jun majx toj kyaˈj ; quˈn a nlay tpa , ntiˈ toklin tiˈjjo a nlay bˈaj .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Waja tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈmaˈnjiˈy a ewintaq : Quˈn nya qkyaqilx qo kyimil . Me qkyaqilx qo txˈixpitil

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: te jun paqx , tzeˈnku jun qmutzˈbˈin qwutz , aj t ‑ xi qbˈiˈn tqˈajqˈojil chun , te yekˈbˈil , aj tjapin bˈaj tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ . Ex ayetzin kyimnin kchi jawitz anqˈin , tuˈntzin mi chi kyime juntl majl , ex awotzin qe , awo itzˈqo , qo txˈixpitil .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Quˈn a qxmilil , a nlay tpa , il tiˈj tuˈn ttxˈixpit , tuˈn tten te jun majx . Ex atziˈn tuˈn tbˈaj , il tiˈj tuˈn ttxˈixpit , tuˈntzin mi bˈaje . Aj tjapin bˈajjo lo , ok japin bˈajiljo yol lo : Ma kubˈ tiˈjjo kyimin tuˈn chwinqil te jun majx .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , qo xmayiltz tiˈjjo kyimin , tzeˈnku kyij tzˈibˈit toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios : Ay kyimin , ¿ Jaˈn taˈ tipiˈn jaˈlin , ex jtojtzin bˈaˈn qkubˈ tbˈyoˈn ?

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: A bˈiybˈil tuˈn kyimin , atziˈn a bˈinchj il . ¿ Ex jaˈn ntzaje tipin bˈinchj il ? Noq tuˈn qbˈinchbˈin tiˈjbˈinxiˈ tkawbˈil Dios .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Me chjontexla Dios . Ma tzaj tqˈoˈn tumil tuˈn tkubˈ tiˈj il quˈn , noq tuˈn qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn werman , nimx tqˈaqˈbˈil nkˈuˈja kyiˈja , chi weˈkuxixa wen , ex mi chi yekjxa toj kynimbˈila . Kybˈinchinkuy taqˈin qMan Dios tukˈa tkyaqil kyanmiˈn , quˈn ojtzqiˈn kyuˈn , qa a kyaqˈiˈn anetziˈn , nya noqx kukxjo , qalaˈ at chojbˈil te .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , kxel nqˈmaˈn tiˈjjo oyaj , tuˈn t ‑ xiˈ kye nimil : Kybˈinchinkuy tzeˈnkuxjo xi nqˈmaˈn kye Ttanim Dios toj txˈotxˈ te Galacia .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Toj tnejil qˈij te junjun seman , teyile junjun kyeˈ , bˈaˈn tuˈn tel tpaˈn chˈin tiˈjjo ntkanbˈin , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi tkˈuˈn , tuˈntzintla aj nkaniˈn , mina jaw chmet oyaj .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Quˈn tuˈntzin aj nkaniˈn kyxola , kxel nqˈoˈn jun uˈj kye erman te oqxenbˈilkye , ayeˈ kchi jawil kyskˈoˈn , tuˈn t ‑ xi kyiˈn oyaj , tuˈn tpon kye erman toj Jerusalén .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Ex qa wentaq toj kywutza tuˈn nxiˈy , okla kqo xela kyukˈa .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Chin poˈn kyukˈiy , aj nxiˈy toj txˈotxˈ te Macedonia , quˈn il tiˈj tuˈn nxiˈ neja antza .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Me bˈalaqa chin tenbˈila kyukˈiy ilaˈ qˈij , ex bˈalaqa axsi kkyˈela jbˈalil wuˈn , tuˈntzintla kyoniˈn wiˈja toj nbˈey , a jaˈ kchin xeliˈy .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Quˈn nkyˈeˈ weˈ noq tuˈn wikyˈ aja kyukˈiy , qalaˈ wajatlaˈy tuˈn nteˈn ilaˈ qˈij kyxola , qa iky taj qAjaw .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Me axsa chin kyjela teniˈy tzaluˈn toj Éfeso , tzmaxiˈ aj tpon tqˈijil nintz qˈij te Pentecostés ,

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: quˈn ma tzaj qˈoˈn ambˈil weˈy , tuˈn waqˈniˈn toj taqˈin qAjaw , tuˈn ma nintzxjal tuˈn tnimin , ex nimku ajqˈoj wiˈja .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Ex qa ma pon Timotey , kykaˈyinka tuˈn tten kyukˈiy tukˈa tzaljbˈil , quˈn n ‑ aqˈnin toj taqˈin qAjaw tzeˈnkuxjo weˈ .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , mix aˈl jun kye tuˈn tel ikyˈinte . Qalaˈ bˈaˈn tuˈn kyoniˈn tiˈj toj tbˈe tukˈa tnukˈbˈil qMan Dios tibˈaj , tuˈn ttzaj wukˈiy . Quˈn loqin nchin yoˈn tiˈj ex kyiˈjjo erman , aye nchi bˈet tukˈa .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , kxel nqˈmaˈn tiˈjjo qerman Apolos . Wajxixtaqa tuˈn t ‑ xiˈ kyukˈa erman lol kyeˈy . Me mi xttziye tuˈn t ‑ xiˈ jaˈlin , me okla kxeˈl , aj tten ambˈil tiˈj .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Kykaˈyinktzin kyibˈa , ex chi weˈkuxixa toj kynimbˈila ; chi okxa jun xjal kujxix wen , at kyipin toj kynimbˈil .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Tkyaqiljo nbˈant kyuˈn , kybˈinchinkuy tukˈa kykˈuˈjbˈil kyibˈa kyxola .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Ojtzqiˈn kyuˈn aye tbˈaj Estéfanas , a tnejil nimil toj tkyaqil txˈotxˈ te Acay . Ex ma txi kyqˈoˈn kyibˈ tuˈn kyajbˈin kyxol txqantl nimil .

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , nchin kubˈsin nwutza kyeˈy , tuˈn tkubˈ kyniminjiˈy xjal tzeˈnku kye Estéfanas , exqetziˈn txqantl nchi mojin toj taqˈin qMan Dios .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Me nim ma chin tzalaja , tuˈn ma chi ul Estéfanas , Fortunato ex Acaico , quˈn ma kubˈ kybˈinchiˈn a naˈmxtaq tbˈant kyuˈn , quˈn ntiˈqetaqa .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Quˈn ma tzaj kyqˈoˈn jun chewsbˈil wanmiˈn , ikyxjo tzeˈnku kubˈ kybˈinchin kyukˈiy . Bˈaˈntla tuˈn t ‑ xi kyqˈoˈn chjonte kyeˈ xjal ikyjo .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Tkyaqil Ttanim Dios toj txˈotxˈ Asia nxi tsmaˈn jun qˈolbˈil kyeˈy . Ex ikyxjo te Aquila ex Priscila , nxi kysmaˈn jun qˈolbˈil toj tbˈi qAjaw , junx kyukˈa tkyaqil Ttanim Dios , a n ‑ ok kychmoˈn kyibˈ toj kyja .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Ex tkyaqil erman tzaluˈn wukˈiy nxi qsmaˈn qˈolbˈil kyeˈy . Ex kyqˈolbˈink kyibˈa kyxolxa tukˈa tkyaqil kykˈuˈja .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Ayinkuy Pabl , nkubˈ ntzˈibˈinjiˈy qˈolbˈil luˈn tuˈn nqˈobˈkuy .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Qa at jun , a mi s ‑ ok kˈuˈjlin te qAjaw , kyjel tjaqˈ tqanbˈil qMan Dios . Ay qAjaw , txok txontxxa .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Noqit tten t ‑ xtalbˈil qAjaw Jesús kyukˈiy .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Nimxix nqˈaqˈin nkˈuˈja kyiˈja , noq tuˈn Crist , a Jesús .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Ayiˈn Pabl jun tsanjil qAjaw Jesucrist tuˈn tajbˈil qMan Dios . Junx tukˈa erman Timotey , nxi ntzˈibˈinjiˈy uˈj luˈn kye erman , ayeˈ Ttanim Dios toj tnam Corint ex toj tkyaqil txˈotxˈ te Acay .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Noqit ax qMan Dios ex Jesucrist , a tAjaw Tkyaqil , tzaj qˈonte t ‑ xtalbˈil ex jun tnukˈbˈil toj tkyaqil .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Qo nimsin tbˈi qMan Dios , a Manbˈaj te qAjaw Jesucrist , quˈn atziˈn Manbˈajjo at tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj qiˈj , ex kukx ntchewsin qanmin .

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Ex ax ntzaj qˈonte chewsbˈil qanmin toj tkyaqiljo a n ‑ ikyˈx quˈn , tuˈntzintla tbˈantqe qchewsinte kyanmiˈnjo noq tiˈchaqku n ‑ ikyˈx kyuˈn , tuˈnxjo chewsbˈil anmin , a ma tzaj qˈon qe tuˈn Dios .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Quˈn ikytziˈn tzeˈnkuˈ qeˈ nim yajbˈil n ‑ ikyˈx quˈn , noq tuˈn tpaj taqˈin Crist , ex ikyxjo nimxix chewsbˈil qanmiˈn ktzajil qˈoˈn tuˈn .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Exla qa ma tzˈikyx quˈn tuˈn tpaj tbˈi Crist , mo qa nqo tzalaja tuˈn chewsbˈil qanmiˈn tuˈn , tkyaqiljo lo n ‑ ajbˈin te chewsbˈil kyanmiˈn , ex te kolbˈil kyeˈy , tuˈntzintla kyweˈxixa toj kynimbˈila toj tkyaqiljo yajbˈil n ‑ ikyˈx kyuˈn , tzeˈnkuxjo qeˈ n ‑ ikyˈx quˈn .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , qˈuqlexix qkˈuˈja kyiˈja , quˈn bˈiˈn quˈn qa ikyx n ‑ ikyˈxjo kyuˈn tzeˈnku qeˈ , exsin ikyxjo tojjo chewsbˈil qanmin .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Werman , waja tuˈn kybˈintiˈy tkyaqiljo yajbˈil s ‑ ikyˈx qiˈja toj txˈotxˈ te Asia . Quˈn nyakuj tjaqˈ jun iqtz o nikyˈbˈajtziˈy , exsin ntiˈx qipiˈn tuˈn tkyˈisje quˈn . Ex otaq kubˈ qximiˈn qa nyataq tuˈn qetza antza tukˈa qchwinqila .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Quˈn otaq qnaˈy tuˈn qkyij kyima antza . Me ma tzˈokin luˈn , tuˈn mi qeye qkˈuˈja qiˈjxa , qalaˈ tuˈn tqe qkˈuˈja tiˈj qMan Dios , a at tipin tuˈn tjatz anqˈin kyimnin tuˈn .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Me ax te Dios ma klon qey te kyimin toj Asia , ex nqo tkloˈn jaˈlin , ex ma qe qkˈuˈja tiˈj , qa kukx qo kletiljiˈy tuˈn ,

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: noq tuˈn kynaˈj Diosa , ayeˈ nchi mojin qiˈja toj taqˈin qMan . Quˈn qa ma chi naˈn Diosa qiˈja , ex qa ma tzaj ttzaqˈwin Diosjo kykubˈsbˈil kywutza , ax Dios kkˈmolte nim aqˈbˈil chjonte .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin nqo tzalaja tiˈjjo lo : Quˈn a qanmiˈn qˈmante qa bˈaˈn ma qo bˈetiˈy kyxolxjal , ayeˈ nya nimilqe , ex ikyxjo kyxola tukˈa jun qchwinqila saqxix ex junchˈin tumil . Atziˈn lo tzajnin tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil qMan Dios , ex nya te jun kynabˈlxjal te twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , mi xi qtzˈibˈiˈn junjun nmaq tumil , a nlay tzˈel kynikyˈa te , noq te qnimsbˈil qibˈa . Qalaˈ , kukx nqo tzˈibˈinjiˈy kyojjo quˈja tukˈa jun yol , a nya kuj tuˈn tja kyuˈjiˈn , ex tuˈn tel pjet toj kynabˈla . Ex kqebˈil qkˈuˈja tiˈj ,

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: quˈn ikytziˈn tzeˈnku ma tzˈel kynikyˈa te toj junjun tnej , me nchin kubˈsin nwutza kyeˈy , tuˈn kytzalaja qiˈja toj tkyaqil , tzeˈnku qe qo tzalajila kyiˈja , aj tul tqˈijil tuˈn tul qAjaw Jesús .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Quˈn qˈuqletaq nkˈuˈja tiˈjjo lo , kubˈ nbˈisiˈn tuˈn wikyˈa lol kyeˈy kabˈe maj , tuˈntzintla nmojiˈn kyiˈja .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Quˈn kubˈ nximiˈn tuˈn wikyˈa kyukˈiy , aj nxiˈy toj nbˈeˈy tzmax toj txˈotxˈ te Macedonia . Ex aj nmeltzˈaja , tuˈn wikyˈtaq juntl majla lol kyeˈy , ex tuˈn kymojintaqa wiˈja toj nbˈeˈy , aj nxiˈy toj Judey .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Tej tkubˈ nbˈisiˈn ikyjo , ¿ Ma tukˈapela kabˈe nkˈuˈja tzeˈnku jun sbˈulxjal te twutz txˈotxˈ , a nxi tqˈmaˈn qa bˈaˈn tuˈn tbˈinchin jun tiˈ ex te jun paqx qa mina ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Me mina , erman . Quˈn ikyxjo tzeˈnku te Dios kukx njapin bˈaj Tyol , ex ikyxjo qeˈ . Mina nqo yoliˈn tukˈa kabˈe qyola .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Quˈn ikytziˈn te qAjaw Jesús , a Tkˈwal qMan Dios , a nqo yoliˈn tiˈj kyxola , junx tukˈa Silvano ex Timotey . Ex mina nyolintaq Jesús tukˈa kabˈe tyol , qalaˈ a Jesús kukx nyolin twutzxix tukˈa junchˈin tumil , ex ikyxjo qeˈ .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Quˈn tkyaqiljo ntqˈmaˈn Dios , o japin bˈaj tukˈa Crist . Tuˈnpetziˈn , at tqˈuqbˈil qkˈuˈj tiˈjjo Tyol , a twutzxix , ex nqo nimsin tbˈi , ex nxi qqˈmaˈn qa ikyxjo .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Quˈn axte Dios ma qˈonte qe , tuˈn qweˈ wen toj qnimbˈil tiˈj Crist , ex o qo jaw tskˈoˈn , tuˈn qbˈinchin taqˈin tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: Ex o tzˈok tqˈoˈn jun qechil toj qanmin , a Xewbˈaj Xjan , tuˈn tyekˈin qa o qo ok te te . Quˈn atziˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan jun kujsbˈil Tyol tiˈjjo ktzajil tqˈoˈn qe toj kyaˈj .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Kubˈ nximiˈn nej , tuˈn nxiˈy kyukˈiy , me bˈaˈntla qa ma chex nkawiˈn kujxix , tuˈn kybˈinchbˈiˈn nya bˈaˈn . Me ojtzqiˈnqinxa tuˈn Dios , qa nkyˈeˈytaqa ikyjo . Tuˈnpetziˈn , mix in ikyˈiˈy kyukˈiy liwey toj Corint .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Qa ma chex nkawiˈn , nya noq tuˈn qnimsin qibˈa kywutza , qalaˈ tuˈn qmojiˈn kyiˈja tuˈn kytzalaja toj kynimbˈila . Quˈn noq tuˈnjo lo , kchi elile wena toj tkyaqil .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , xkubˈ nbˈisiˈn ikyjo , tuˈn mi chinka juntl majla kyukˈiy jaˈlin , tuˈntzintla mi chi jaw bˈisiniˈy , noq tuˈn nkawbˈila kujxix kyibˈaja .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Quˈn qa ma chi jaw bˈisiˈn tuˈn npaja , ¿ Tzeˈntzin ttentz tuˈn ntzalaja kyukˈiy ? ¿ Ma akutzin chi tzalaja wukˈiˈy , qa otaq chi bˈisiˈn wuˈn ?

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Qˈuqletaq nkˈuˈja kyiˈja , tuˈn qtzalaj junx qkyaqilx . Me tej tok nbˈiˈn qa attaq nya bˈaˈn kyxola , bˈeˈx xi ntzˈibˈiˈn wuˈja kyeˈy kuj chˈin , me ¿ Nyapela tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈinchin kyibˈa , tuˈntzintla mi chin jaw bˈisiniˈy , aj nteˈn kyxola ? Quˈn ayepen kyeˈ tuˈn kyqˈonte tzaljbˈil weˈy .
