text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ oxe abˈqˈe , in xiˈy Jerusalén tuˈn tok wojtzqintiˈy Pegr ; in teˈn jweˈlajaj qˈij tukˈa .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Ex mix aˈl juntl tsanjil Jesús nliˈy , oˈkx Santyaw , a titzˈin qAjaw .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Kxel nqˈmaˈnjiˈy luˈn twutz qMan Dios : Tkyaqiljo ma txi ntzˈibˈiˈn kyeˈy , twutzxix .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ ikyjo , in xiˈy tojjo txˈotxˈ te Siria ex Cilicia .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Ex tkyaqil nimil kyojjo Ttanim Crist , a iteˈ toj txˈotxˈ Judey , naˈmtaq wok kyojtzqiˈn .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Noq tqaniltaq at wiˈja kyxol nimil antza : Atzaj Pabl nqˈojletaq qiˈj , ex nimtaq taj tuˈn qel xitj ; me atzin jaˈlin , lu nyolin tiˈjjo Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , chi chiˈ .

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Ex noq tuˈn ikyjo , nimx jaw kynimsin tbˈi qMan Dios .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ kyajlajaj abˈqˈe , in xiˈy juntl majla Jerusalén , junx tukˈa Bernabé , ex xi nkˈleˈn Tito wukˈiy .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: In xiˈy antza , quˈn otaq tqˈma Dios weˈy , qa iltaq tiˈj tuˈn nxiˈy . Tej nkaniˈn Jerusalén , ok qchmoˈn qibˈa noq kyukˈa nejinel , ayeˈ a nimxix kyoklin kywutz nimil , exsin xi nqˈmaˈn kye tiˈjjo Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , a nkubˈ nyolintaqa kyxoljo ayeˈ nya Judiyqe . Kubˈ nbˈinchinjiˈy ikyjo , quˈn wajtaqa tuˈn nbˈintiˈy qa wentaqjo nbˈant wuˈn toj kywutz nejinel , mo qa minaj . Quˈn nyataq waja noq tuˈn tkubˈ naj waqˈiˈn .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Me bˈaˈn ele nyola toj kywutz tiˈj t ‑ xtalbˈil qMan Dios . Tuˈntziˈn ikyjo , mixpe a te Tito mix oke il tiˈj tuˈn tok qitit techil tiˈj ttzˈumil , tzeˈnku tzˈibˈin toj ojtxe qkawbˈila , awoˈy aj Judiy . Mix kubˈe nimitjo lo , quˈn a te Tito nya Judiy , qalaˈ aj griego .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Quˈn junjun nyakuj nimil okx qxola toj ewajil , ex otaq tzˈok kykaˈyin qa ntiˈtaq techil Tito tok . Ex noq tuˈn ikyjo , ox chi labˈtex , tuˈn tkubˈ qniminjiˈy ojtxe kawbˈil , a tuˈn tel qitit ttzˈumil Tito , tuˈn tkyij toj wen twutz Dios . Me quˈn at jun qtzaqpibˈl tjaqˈ ojtxe kawbˈil jaˈlin , tuˈn qel wen twutz Dios noq tuˈn qmujbˈil qibˈ tukˈa Crist , a Jesús ,

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: mix kubˈe qniminjiˈy kyyol , quˈn qajtaqa tuˈn kukx tten Tbˈanil Tqanil kyukˈiy tzˈaqlexix , ex ntiˈ chˈintl tuˈn tok tzˈaqsit .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Me ayetziˈn nejinel toj Ttanim Dios Jerusalén , ayeˈ a nimxix kyoklin kywutz nimil , ntiˈ juntl tumil tzaj kyqˈoˈn weˈy , tuˈn tkujsit nyola . Tzeˈnku weˈ ntiˈ waja tiˈj alkyetaq kyoklinxjal , quˈn ntiˈ te Dios nqanin tiˈj .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Qalaˈ , ayex kyexjal el kynikyˈ te , qa a Dios tzaj oqxenin teˈ aqˈuntl weˈy , tuˈn t ‑ xi wiˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil kye xjal nya Judiy , ikyxjo tzeˈnku xi toqxenin te Pegr kye aj Judiy .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Quˈn ax te Dios tzaj smaˈn qey qkabˈila tuˈn qoka te tsanjil : Ante Pegr kyukˈa aj Judiy ; ayintzin weˈ kyukˈa nya aj Judiyqe .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , ate Santyaw , Pegr ex Juan , aye nejinelqe te Ttanim Dios toj Jerusalén , el kynikyˈ te , qa a Dios tzaj qˈoˈnte wokliˈn tuˈn nyoliˈn Tyol kyxol nya aj Judiy . Ex noq tuˈn tok te jun yekˈbˈil qa otaq qo oka te kyukˈa , tzaj kyqˈoˈn kyqˈobˈ weˈy ex te Bernabé . Ex kubˈ kykˈuˈj , tuˈn qaqˈniˈn kyxoljo nya aj Judiyqe , ex ayetzin kyetz , kyxol qxjalila , aye Judiy .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Oˈkx tzaj kyqˈmaˈn qeˈy tuˈn qoniˈn kyiˈj xjal , ayeˈ yajqe . Me ataqpen wejiˈy n ‑ ok tilil wuˈn tuˈn tbˈant .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Jun maj , teˈ tkanin Pegr toj tnam Antyokiy jaˈ intiniˈy , xi nqˈmaˈn toj twutz , qa nyataq bˈaˈn nbˈant tuˈn .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Quˈn tnejil , nwaˈntaq Pegr junx kyukˈa xjal nya Judiyqe . Me atzaj teˈ kyul kanin junjun xjal , a tzajninqe kyxol junjun tukˈa Santyaw , tukˈa jun kyximxjal , qa nyaxix toj tumiltaq a nbˈanttaq tuˈn Pegr . Tuˈn ikyjo , bˈeˈx el tpaˈn Pegr tibˈ kyiˈj nimil , a nya Judiyqe , tuˈn twaˈntaq kyukˈa . Quˈn bˈeˈx tzaj t ‑ xobˈil kye xjal Judiyqe , a kyajxix tuˈn tjapin bˈajjo tkyaqil tkawbˈil Moisés .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Ex majqex kyeˈ txqantl nimil toj Antyokiy , a Judiyqe , ok lipe tiˈjjo t ‑ xmiletzˈil anetziˈn tuˈn tkaˈmin kykˈuˈj . Ex majxl te Bernabé ok lipe kyiˈj .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Atzaj teˈ kyok nkaˈyiˈn mitaq nchi bˈet toj tumil , a tzeˈnxtaqjo a ntyekˈin Tbˈanil Tqanil , bˈeˈx xi nqˈmaˈn te Pegr kywutz tkyaqil nimil . Nchijiˈy kyjaluˈn : Noq samiˈy Pegr , me mi nbˈeta toj tumil tuˈn t ‑ xima tojjo lo . Quˈn tnejil , nbˈeta ikyx tzeˈnku jun nimil , a nya Judiy , exsin nya ikyjo tzeˈnku jun Judiy , a nbˈettaq tzeˈnku ojtxe qkawbˈil . Ex wentaqjo ntbˈinchiˈn ikyjo , quˈn junchˈin kyoklin tkyaqil nimil twutz Dios , exla qa Judiy mo nya Judiy . Me qa ikyjo , ¿ tiquˈniltz n ‑ ok tqˈoˈn il kyiˈjjo ayeˈ nya Judiyqe , tuˈn t ‑ xi kyiˈn tzeˈnqe aj Judiy ? Ntiˈ tumila tojjo lo .

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Quˈn awotzinqe Judiyqo toj qitzˈjlintz , ex nya tzajninqo kyxol xjal , aye mi ojtzqiˈn Dios kyuˈn .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Me bˈiˈnqe quˈn , qa mix aˈlx junqe kkletil noq tuˈn Judiyqe , ex tuˈn tjapin bˈaj ojtxe tkawbˈil Moisés quˈn , qalaˈ noq tuˈn qnimbˈil tiˈj Klolqe Jesucrist . Tuˈnpetziˈn , o kubˈ qnimiˈnqe Jesucrist . Ex noq tuˈn ikyjo , qo kletil toj najin , ex nya tuˈn tjapin bˈaj ojtxe kawbˈil quˈn . Quˈn mix aˈlx junqe kkletil tuˈn ikyjo .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Quˈn ma qo klet noq tuˈn ma tzˈok qe qkˈuˈj tiˈj Crist , ex nya tuˈn tjapin ojtxe kawbˈil quˈn . Exla qa ma qo klet , ¿ Ma nyatzin aj il qotz ? ¿ Ma apela Cristtz at tpaj tiˈjjo qil ? ¡ Mina !

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Me qa ma kyij tiˈjliˈn tnimbˈila noq tuˈn t ‑ xiˈy juntl majl bˈinchil teˈ a ntqˈmaˈn ojtxe kawbˈil , tuˈn tnimsin tibˈa , axa at tpaj tiˈjxa . Atziˈn luˈn ikytzin tzeˈnku jun xjal nkubˈ tyuchˈin jun tiˈ , ex njaw tbˈinchin juntl majl . Ntiˈ tnabˈljo ikyjo . Ikytziˈn xi nqˈmanjiˈy te Pegr .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Quˈn a teˈ ojtxe kawbˈil nqanin qiˈj , tuˈn qkyim te chojbˈil qil , tuˈn mi njapin quˈn . Me bˈeˈx kyim Jesús te chojbˈil qil , ex nya il tiˈj tuˈn t ‑ xi qchjoˈn qil jaˈlin , qalaˈ noq tuˈn qbˈet tukˈa qMan Dios toj qchwinqil , ex tuˈn qajbˈin te ; o qo ok tqˈoˈn Dios nyakuj o qo kyim twutz cruz junx tukˈa Kolil Jesús .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Ex atziˈn jaˈlin , nya wunx wibˈa itzˈqiˈn , qalaˈ noq tuˈn Crist , a najle toj wanmiˈn . Ex nchin bˈeta toj nchwinqila tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , noq tuˈn tipin Tkˈwal qMan Dios , a qˈaqˈin tkˈuˈj wiˈja , ex xi tqˈoˈn tibˈ tuˈn tkyim noq tuˈn npaja .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Tuˈntziˈn ikyjo , nlay tzˈel wikyˈiˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil qMan Dios . Quˈn noqit aku chin kleta noq tuˈn tjapin bˈajjo ojtxe kawbˈil wuˈn , ntiˈxitla tajbˈiˈn tkyimlin Crist .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: ¡ Ay , aj Galacia ! Najninx kye kynabˈl . ¿ Altzila kye xkˈalin kyiˈja tuˈn tel kyiˈjlinjiˈy t ‑ xtalbˈil qMan Dios , a awokuy o qo kubˈ chikyˈbˈin teˈ wen kywutza : Qa a Kolil Jesucrist kyim twutz cruz te najsbˈil kyila ?

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Tuˈn ikyjo , waja tuˈn ttzaj kytzaqˈwinjiˈy a nxjela kyeˈy : ¿ Ma man tzaj kykˈmonjiˈy Xewbˈaj Xjan toj kyanmiˈn noq tuˈn tjapin bˈaj ojtxe kawbˈil kyuˈn , mo qa tuˈn ma qe kykˈuˈja tiˈj Tbˈanil Tqanil , a o kybˈiˈy ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: Ma ntiˈxsin kynabˈla , a otaq txi xkye tkabˈ chwinqil kyuˈn tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan te tnejil ; me atzin jaˈlin , ¿ Ma kyajtziˈn tuˈn tjapin bˈajjo kynimbˈila kyuˈnx kyibˈxa ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: ¿ Jniˈxsiˈn sikyˈx kyuˈn tuˈn tpajjo kynimbˈila , a twutzxix ? ¿ Exsin kˈwel najtz kyuˈn ? ¡ Nya tumiljo ikyjo !

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Qalaˈ noqit aku tzˈokin te kyeˈy , tuˈn tel kynikyˈa tiˈj . Quˈn axte Dios o tzaj qˈoˈnte Xewbˈaj Xjan toj kyanmiˈn , ex nimku techil tipin kubˈ tbˈinchin kyxola . Me nya tuˈn tjapin bˈajjo ojtxe kawbˈil kyuˈn , qalaˈ noq tuˈn t ‑ xi kyniminjiˈy a Tbˈanil Tqanil , a o kybˈiˈy .

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Ikyxjo tzeˈnku te Abraham , a ojtxe qxeˈchil . Xi tnimin a tzaj tqˈmaˈn Dios te . Ex tuˈn ikyjo , ok tqˈoˈn Dios te jun xjal tzˈaqle twutz .

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Tuˈnpetzintzjo , tzˈelku kynikyˈa te alkyeqexixjo tyajil Abraham ; me nya qeˈ xjal ayeˈ tzajninqe tiˈj tyajil Abraham , qalaˈ aye , a ikyx kynimbˈiljo tzeˈnku te Abraham .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Quˈn ojtzqiˈntaq tuˈn Dios , qa iltaq tiˈj tuˈn kykletjo nya Judiyqe noq tuˈn kynimbˈil tiˈj Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil . Tuˈnpetziˈn , xi tqˈmaˈn te Abraham kyjaluˈn : Noq tuˈn tpaja , kˈwel nkyˈiwliˈn tkyaqil xjal twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , tkyaqil xjal qa ma txi tnimin tzeˈnku te Abraham , at tkyˈiwbˈil Dios kyibˈaj , tzeˈnku te Abraham , tuˈn tnimbˈil .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: ¿ Me ankyex teˈ , k ‑ okil qe tkˈuˈj tuˈn tklet , noq tuˈn tjapin bˈaj ojtxe kawbˈil tuˈn ? Ntiˈx teˈ tumil , ex ok kyjel ten tjaqˈ tqanbˈil qMan Dios , quˈn ikytziˈn tqˈmaˈn toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios : At jun qanbˈil kyibˈaj tkyaqil xjal , aye mi njapin bˈaj kyuˈn tkyaqilxjo , a kyij tzˈibˈin tojjo uˈj lo .

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , bˈiˈnxix quˈn , qa mix aˈlx jun kkletil noq tuˈn qa ma japin bˈaj ojtxe kawbˈil tuˈn . Quˈn ikytzin ntqˈmaˈn Dios toj Tuˈjil Tyol : Aye xjal tzˈaqleqe nwutza , noq tuˈn kynimbˈil wiˈja , ktenbˈil kyeˈ kychwinqil te jun majx .

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Me metzin te ojtxe kawbˈil nya tuˈn qnimbˈil teˈ , qalaˈ ntqˈmaˈn kyjaluˈn : Aye xjal , a kyaj tuˈn tjapin bˈaj kawbˈil kyuˈn , tuˈn kykanbˈin tkabˈ chwinqil , il tiˈj tuˈn kybˈet tjaqˈ kawbˈil , ex tuˈn tjapin bˈaj kyuˈn jotx tkyaqilx .

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Tuˈn ojtxe kawbˈil , at jun qanbˈil qibˈaj nqanin qiˈj tuˈn qkyim , tuˈn mi njapin bˈaj quˈn . Me atziˈn qanbˈil , ate Crist s ‑ el qˈinte , tej tkyim twutz cruz te qxel . Quˈn kyij tzˈibˈin toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios kyjaluˈn : At jun qanbˈil tibˈajjo xjal , a kjawil yoˈbˈit twutz jun tze .

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Bˈajjo ikyjo , noq tuˈn qkˈmoˈnte kyˈiwbˈil , a tzaj tqˈoˈn qMan Dios te Abraham ojtxe , ex tuˈn qok te jun xjal tzˈaqle twutz qMan , exla qa Judiyqo , ex qa mina . Ex noq tuˈn qnimbˈil tiˈj Crist , a Jesús , at Xewbˈaj Xjan toj qanmin , a o tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios , tzeˈnku tqˈma .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Ayiˈy werman , noq tuˈn tel kynikyˈa tiˈjjo lo , kˈwel nqˈoˈn jun techil . Qa at jun xjal nbˈant jun tyol tukˈa juntl , il tiˈj tuˈn tkubˈ tqˈoˈn tbˈi toj uˈj , ex tuˈn tkubˈ tsqitinte tbˈi tibˈaj , noq tuˈn tkujsit , tuˈntzin mix aˈl juntl tzˈok qˈonte chˈintl tiˈ tiˈj , mo tuˈn tqˈmante qa nya twutzx .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Me atzin jaˈlin , a Dios tzaj tqˈoˈn tkyˈiwbˈil te Abraham ex te tyajil . Me mi ntqˈmaˈn Tuˈjil Tyol Dios qa kyiˈj ilaˈ tyajil , qalaˈ tiˈj junchˈin tyajil , ax Crist .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Atzin t ‑ xilin yol lo : Ma bˈant tiˈj tuˈn Dios tukˈa Abraham , ex ma kubˈ tkujsin Dios tyol te jun majx . Tbˈajlinxiˈ 430 abˈqˈe , ul tkawbˈil Moisés . Me nlay bˈant tyupitjo tnejil yol , a bˈant tiˈj tuˈn Dios tukˈa Abraham , quˈn tuˈn ma tkujse Dios tnejil tyol te jun majx .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Quˈn noqit ma qo klet a tuˈn tjapin tkawbˈil Moisés quˈn , ntiˈtla tajbˈintzjo tnejil yol , a bˈant tiˈj tuˈn Dios tukˈa Abraham . ¿ Ma ma nqo klettz tuˈn tjapin bˈaj tkawbˈil Moisés quˈn ? ¡ Mina ! Qalaˈ noq tuˈn Tyol qMan Dios , a bˈant tiˈj tuˈn tukˈax Abraham .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Me qa ikytzjo , ¿ Tiˈtzin tajbˈintzjo tkawbˈil Moiséstz ? Tzaj qˈoˈn tkawbˈil Moisés noq tuˈn tyekˈinkuˈ kyilxjal , a naˈmxtaq tul kanin Kolil Jesús tnejil maj tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , a tyajil Abraham , axjo tzaj tqˈmaˈn Dios te . Atzin tkawbˈil Moisés qˈumj noq kyuˈn t ‑ angel Dios , ex atzin Moisés ajbˈin te jun yolil Tyol Dios kyxol xjal .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Me tej tyolin Dios tukˈa Abraham , ntiˈtaq tajbˈin juntl xjal te yolil kyxol , quˈn aku Dios nyolintaq .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: ¿ Ma attzin tkyˈitzjo tkawbˈil Moisés tukˈa tnejil yol , a bˈant tiˈj tuˈn Dios tukˈa Abraham ? ¡ Ntiˈ ! Quˈn noqit at kolbˈil tuˈn tjapin bˈaj tkawbˈil Moisés quˈn , matla qo ok tzˈaqle tuˈn toj qchwinqil .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Quˈn qkyaqilx awo xjalqo twutz txˈotxˈ o qo bˈinchin il , ikytziˈn tzeˈn ntqˈmaˈn Tyol Dios . Tuˈn ikyjo , tkyaqilx xjal tokx tjaqˈ tkawbˈil il . Me noq tuˈn qnimbˈil tiˈj Jesucrist , at qoklin tiˈjjo aj bˈantnin tiˈj atxix ojtxe tukˈa Abraham , a chwinqil te jun majx .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Ojtxe , tej naˈmtaq tuljo nimbˈil tiˈj Kolil Jesús , jpuˈnqokxtaq tjaqˈ tqanbˈil ojtxe kawbˈil , ex nqo ayoˈntaq tuˈn qtzaqpaj . Me atzin jaˈlin , ma qo tzaqpaj noq tuˈn qnimbˈil tiˈj Jesús .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Ikytziˈn , a tkawbˈil Moisés tzeˈnku jun ojtxe aqˈnil nchex tiˈntaq tal kˈwal tojjo ja te xnaqˈtzbˈil . Ex ikyxsin tkawbˈil Moisés , nqox tiˈn tojjo qnimbˈil tiˈj Crist , tuˈntzin qok tzˈaqle twutz qMan Dios .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Me atziˈn jaˈlin , tej xqo nimin , nya il tiˈj tuˈn qxi qˈiˈn tuˈn ojtxe kawbˈil , quˈn o japin bˈaj t ‑ xilin tajbˈil kawbˈil , a tuˈn qok tzˈaqle tuˈn qnimbˈil .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , noq tuˈn kynimbˈila tiˈj Crist , a Jesús , ma tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios kyokliˈn te tkˈwal .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Ex noq tuˈn jawsbˈil aˈ , at kymujbˈil kyibˈa tukˈa Crist , ex ma tzaj tqˈoˈn jun akˈaj kychwinqila , ikytziˈn tzeˈn nbˈaj txˈixpit kyiˈja tukˈa kyxbˈaliˈn txjoˈn wen .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Quˈn tuˈn kynimbˈila tiˈj Crist , at kyokliˈn jaˈlin , iˈchaqx Judiytz mo qa minaj , ex qa aqˈnil mo qa tajaw aqˈuntlj , ex qa ichin mo qa qya . Noq qa at kymujbˈil kyibˈa tukˈa Crist , a Jesús , ma chi oka te junxchˈin Ttanim qMan Dios .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Quˈn qa ma chi oktza te te Crist , ma chi oktza te twutzxix tyajil Abraham , ex at kyokliˈn tiˈjjo jniˈ bˈaj tyolin Dios te .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Nyatzin tiˈ weˈ waj tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈmaˈnjiˈy luˈn : Qa at jun tkˈwal qˈinin , at toklin tiˈjjo tkyaqil at te ttata tuˈn tetzinte . Me qa naˈmtaq tpon kanin qˈij , jaˈ tuˈn tetzinte , ikyx toke tzeˈnku jun aqˈnil te jun majx .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Ex iteˈ junjuntl aqˈnil iteˈk tuˈn manbˈaj , noq te xnaqˈtzil kyeˈ tkˈwal toj tkyaqil , ex tuˈn kykaˈyin tiˈj tkyaqil at te . Ex atzin te kˈwal il tiˈj tuˈn kykubˈ tnimin , tzmaxi ajxi tpon tqˈijil , a qˈoˈnkj tuˈn ttata , tuˈn tetzin te etzbˈil .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Ikyxsin xbˈajtzjo qiˈj tzeˈnku kˈwal lo , tej naˈmtaq qnimin Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , ex kubˈ qniminl jniˈ nimbˈil te twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Me atzaj teˈ tkanin tqˈijil , a qˈoˈnkjtaq tuˈn qMan Dios , tzaj tsmaˈn Tkˈwal twutz txˈotxˈ , tuˈn titzˈje tiˈj jun qya tzeˈnku tkyaqil xjal aj Judiy . Ex tuˈn ikyjo , nbˈettaq toj tchwinqil tzeˈnku ntqˈmaˈn toj tkawbˈil Moisés ,

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: noq tuˈn qklet tjaqˈjo ojtxe kawbˈil , ex tuˈn qok te kˈwalbˈaj te qMan Dios te jun majx .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Ex noq tuˈnjo lo , tzaj tyekˈin qa ma qo ok te tkˈwal : Tzaj tqˈoˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , a T ‑ xew Tkˈwal , toj qanmin , ex tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan nxi qqˈmaˈn te qMan Dios kyjaluˈn : Ay Ntatiˈy .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn jaˈlin , nya noq jun aqˈnilqo , qalaˈ kˈwalbˈajqo te qMan Dios . Ex tuˈntzin kˈwalbˈajqo , at qoklin tiˈj tkyaqiljo at te , noq tuˈn Crist .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Me atzin kye ojtxe , tuˈn naˈmtaq tel kynikyˈa te Dios , ma chi ajbˈiˈn kye dios , aye nya Diosqe .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Me atzin jaˈlin , ma tzˈel kynikyˈa te Dios , ex ojtzqiˈnqiˈy tuˈn . ¿ Tiquˈntz s ‑ okx kyqˈoˈn kyibˈa tjaqˈ kyxim xjal , a ntiˈ kynabˈl , ex ntiˈ kyajbˈin , noq tuˈn kyoka juntl majla tzeˈnku jun aqˈnil te jun majx ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Quˈn nkubˈ kybˈinchiˈn tzeˈnku ojtxe : Nkubˈ kyxjansiˈn junjun nintz qˈij , xjaw , tqˈijil jbˈalil exsin junjun abˈqˈe , nim kyoklin toj kywutza .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Erman , nim nchin bˈisiˈn kyiˈja , tuˈn ma kyij kytzaqpiˈn kynimbˈila , ex atziˈn waqˈiˈn kyxola bˈalaqa noqx ma kyij najx .

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Ayiˈy werman , tej t ‑ xi nnimiˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , mix oke qeye nkˈuˈja tiˈj Tkawbˈil Moisés te Klol wey . Tuˈn ikyjo , ma tzˈok nqˈoˈn wibˈa tzeˈnku kyeˈ , ayiˈy nya Judiyqe , quˈn atzin kolbˈil kyeˈy nya tzajnin tuˈn tjapin bˈaj ojtxe kawbˈil kyuˈn , qalaˈ noq tuˈn tqe kykˈuˈja tiˈj Crist . Me atzin jaˈlin , nchin kubˈsin nwutza kyeˈy , tuˈn kymeltzˈaja , ex tuˈn kyoka tzeˈnku weˈ toj kynimbˈila . Quˈn tej intintaqa kyukˈiy , ntiˈx chˈin nya bˈaˈn s ‑ ok kybˈinchiˈn wiˈja . Me atzin jaˈlin , ma kyij kytzaqpinjiˈy nxnaqˈtzbˈila .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Ikytzin tzeˈnku bˈiˈn kyuˈn , te tnejil , in kyija kyukˈiy noq tuˈn tpaj jun yabˈil tzaj wiˈja , ex in yoliˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil kyeˈy .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Ex atzin yabˈil tzaj wiˈja kujxtaq te kyeˈy , me ajbˈin te jun nikyˈbˈil kyiˈja , quˈn mix in ele kyikyˈiniˈy , noq tuˈn tpajjo yabˈil lo . Qalaˈ in kˈmeta kyuˈn tzeˈnku jun t ‑ angel Dios , mo nyakuj aku Crist , a Jesús .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Ex noq tuˈn tqˈaqˈbˈil kykˈuˈja wiˈja , i etztaqpe kyinjiˈy kywutza , noq tuˈn tulku Dios weˈy . Nimxtaq nchi tzalaja tuˈn kynimbˈila . Me atzin jaˈlin , ¿ Ntaˈtzin tzaljbˈil , a attaq te tnejil ?

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: ¿ Ma man chin oka te kyajqˈoja noq tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈmaˈnjiˈy a twutzxix ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Aye xjal , a kyaj tuˈn tjapin bˈaj tkawbˈil Moisés kyuˈn , nimxix nchi jyon tumil tzeˈn tten tuˈn tkubˈ kykˈuˈja kyuˈn . Me atzin kyximjo nya wen , quˈn a kyajjo tuˈn tel kypaˈn kyibˈa qiˈja , ex tuˈn kyxi lipey kyiˈj .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Me ntiˈtla tetz tkyˈi , qa kyaj tuˈn tkubˈ kykˈuˈja kyuˈn tiˈjjo jun tiˈ , a twutzxix ; ex qa kukx nchi bˈinchiˈn ikyjo tukˈa tkyaqil kyanmiˈn , ex nya noq oˈkxjo tzeˈnku intiˈn kyukˈiy .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Ayiˈy wermana , nyakuj tal nkˈwalqiˈy ; juntl majl n ‑ ikyˈx kyixkˈoj wuˈn , ikyxjo tzeˈnku n ‑ ikyˈx tuˈn jun qya , aj tjaw qˈiˈn tukˈa tal , noq tuˈn kytijinkuy toj kynimbˈila , ex tuˈn tok qe kykˈuˈja tiˈj Crist .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Noqxit aku chin ten kyukˈiy , tuˈn nyoliˈn toj jun tumil nya ma kujxix wen , tzeˈnkuˈ xi ntzˈibˈiˈn , quˈn ntiˈ kytxolila te weˈy .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Ayetzin kye , ayiˈy kyaja tuˈn kyokxa tjaqˈ ojtxe kawbˈil tuˈn kyel wena twutz Dios , noq tuˈn tjapin bˈaj kyuˈn , ¿ Ma nyatzin bˈiˈn kyuˈn titziˈn ntqˈmaˈn ojtxe kawbˈil ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Quˈn tzˈibˈin toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios , qa a Abraham , a ojtxe qxeˈchil , ul kabˈe tkˈwal , jun tiˈj Agar , a qya noq ok te jun taqˈnil te jun majx , ex juntl tiˈj Sara , a t ‑ xuˈjilkuxix .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Me atzin tkˈwal Abraham , a itzˈje tiˈjjo qya aqˈnil , noq itzˈje tzeˈnqekuxjo txqantl kˈwal . Me atzin tkˈwal itzˈje tiˈj t ‑ xuˈjil , itzˈje tuˈn tjapin bˈajjo yol , a bˈantninl tiˈj tuˈn Dios tukˈa Abraham .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Ayetzin kabˈe qya lo nchi ajbˈin te jun yekˈbˈil kyiˈjjo kabˈe tumil bˈantnin tuˈn Dios , tzeˈn qten twutz . Tnejil , a Agar nyekˈinte jun techil tiˈj wutz Sinaí toj txˈotxˈ Arabia , a jaˈ tzaje tqˈoˈne Dios ojtxe kawbˈil te Moisés . Tuˈnpetziˈn , atzin Agar tok te techil wutz Sinaí ex techil tnam Jerusalén tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , quˈn atziˈn tnam Jerusalén tokx tjaqˈ ojtxe kawbˈil tzeˈnku jun aqˈnil te jun majx , junx kyukˈa tkyaqil xjal aj Judiy . Tuˈntzin ikyjo , ntiˈ tzaqpibˈl kye .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Me atzin te Sara juntl techil Jerusalén , me toj kyaˈj , a tzaqpiˈn tjaqˈ ojtxe kawbˈil . Atzin tnam luˈn ok qˈoˈn nyakuj te qnana , awo nimilqo , quˈn tzaqpiˈnqo ikyx tzeˈnku te Sara .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , ntqˈmaˈn toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios tiˈj Sara kyjaluˈn : Tzalajxa ay qya mina s ‑ aliˈn , ex mix tliˈy tchyoˈn kˈwal . Quˈn atziˈn qya , a ntiˈ tal , me noq tuˈn tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj qMan Dios , ilaˈxix teˈ tal tzul , tzeˈnkul teˈ , a at tchmil , ex sul tal tzeˈnkux nchi itzˈje txqantl kˈwal .

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Ayiˈy werman , ikyqotziˈn tzeˈnku Isaac , a tal Sara . Quˈn awotzin qe , ma qo ok te tkˈwal Dios , ikyx tzeˈnku te Isaac , noq tuˈn Tyol , a bˈant tiˈj tuˈn tukˈa Abraham .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Ex ikytziˈn tzeˈn ojtxe , a kˈwal itzˈje tiˈj Agar tzeˈnkux txqantl kˈwal , el tikyˈiˈn kˈwal , a itzˈje tiˈj Sara , a itzˈje tzeˈnku tajtaq Xewbˈaj Xjan . Ex ikyxsin jaˈlin , aye xjal , a qˈuqlek kykˈuˈj tiˈj ojtxe kawbˈil tuˈn kyklet , nchi el kyikyˈin aye qˈuqlek kykˈuˈj tiˈj Tyol Dios .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Me bˈiˈn quˈn a ntqˈmaˈn Tuˈjil Tyol Dios tuˈn tex lajet Agar , a qya noq aqˈnil exsiˈn tal , quˈn atzin tal Agar ntiˈtaq toklin tiˈj tkyaqiljo at te ttata , tzeˈnkul teˈ tal Sara , a qya xuˈjilkuxix , ex at tzaqpibˈl , quˈn nya noq aqˈnil .

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Ikytzin qe jaˈlin werman ; nya albˈajqo teˈ Agar , a noq aqˈnil te jun majx , quˈn mi nqe qkˈuˈj tiˈj , tuˈn tjapin bˈaj ojtxe kawbˈil quˈn , tuˈn qklet . Qalaˈ at qchwinqil te jun majx noq tuˈn Tyol Dios bˈantnin tiˈj tuˈn . Tuˈnpetziˈn , ma qo ok albˈaj jaˈlin te Sara , a qya , a at tzaqpibˈl teˈ .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Jaˈlin , o qo tzaqpaj tjaqˈ tkawbˈil ojtxe kawbˈil tuˈn Crist . Tuˈntzintzjo , qo weˈxix wen toj qchwinqil ex toj tzaqpibˈl o tzaj tqˈoˈn qe , ex nya tuˈn tokx qqˈoˈn juntl majl qibˈ tjaqˈjo ojtxe kawbˈil , jaˈ ntiˈye tzaqpibˈl , ex ntiˈ kolbˈil qe .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Kybˈiˈntziˈn a kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , a ayiˈn Pabl : Qa ma txi kytziyiˈn tuˈn tok qitit jun kyechila tiˈj kytzˈumila , nyakuj tuˈn kykyija toj wen tukˈa Dios , ikyxjo tzeˈnku ntqˈmaˈn ojtxe kawbˈil , ntiˈxla tajbˈin Crist kyeˈy tuˈn kykleta , quˈn k ‑ okil qe kykˈuˈja tiˈj kybˈinchbˈiˈn tuˈn kykleta .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Kxel nqˈmaˈn juntl majla : Ankye taj tuˈn tkubˈ tnimin ojtxe kawbˈil , noq tuˈn tok techil tiˈj ttzˈumil , ilxix tiˈjtz tuˈn tjapin bˈaj tuˈn tkyaqiljo ntqˈmaˈn ojtxe kawbˈil .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Ex ayiˈy , a kyaja tuˈn kykleta noq tuˈn tjapin bˈaj ojtxe kawbˈil kyuˈn , ma tzˈel kypaˈn kyibˈa tiˈj Crist ex tiˈjjo t ‑ xtalbˈil qMan Dios .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Me metzin qeˈ , noq tuˈn qnimbˈila , a tzajnin tiˈj Xewbˈaj Xjan , qˈuqle qkˈuˈja tuˈn qoka tzˈaqle twutz Dios .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Ex awo , a o qo klet tuˈn Crist , a Jesús , ntiˈxla tajbˈin qa tok qechil ex qa mina . Qalaˈ axix te at tajbˈin , tuˈn qnimin , ex atzin qnimbˈil ok qo anqˈil tuˈn , tuˈn qkˈuˈjlin te qibˈ qxolx .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Ayiˈy werman , tnejil lajoˈnxixtaq kyuˈn wen toj kynimbˈila , tzeˈnqeku rinil , tuˈn kykanbˈinte jun chojbˈil . ¿ Me aˈltzila xqˈmante kyeˈy , tuˈn tkyij kytzaqpinjiˈy Tbˈanil Tqanil , a twutzxix ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Nya te qMan Dios at tpaj tiˈjjo luˈn , quˈn apente Dios tzaj txkon kyeˈy , tuˈn kyoka te Tkˈwal noq tuˈn kynimbˈila .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: At jun yol nqˈumle kyjaluˈn : Tukˈaxpe chˈin txˈam , qa ma txiˈ toj tqˈotjil wabˈj , chebˈe ktxˈamixil tkyaqilx .

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Ikytzin n ‑ ele tumil luˈn tiˈjjo jun , a nxnaqˈtzin juntl xnaqˈtzbˈil kyeˈy , a nya twutzx , quˈn aku bˈinchin mibˈin tiˈj Ttanim Dios tkyaqil . Me qˈuqle weˈ nkˈuˈj tiˈj qMan Dios , qa nlay chex lipey tiˈjjo t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈil . Ex tzul te Dios tqˈoj tiˈjjo xnaqˈtzil ikyjo , ex aˈlchaqx kyetz .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Atpe junjun n ‑ el kyyolin , qa nchin xnaqˈtziˈn qa ilxix tiˈj tuˈn tel qitit chˈin qtzˈumil te qechil tuˈn qklet , ex tuˈn tkubˈ qnimin tkyaqil ojtxe kawbˈil . Ayiˈy werman , me noqpetzin iky teˈ , ¿ Tiˈtzintla nchi xoˈnitz yol wiˈja ? Quˈn ikypetzin kyxnaqˈtzbˈiltzjo . Noqit iky chin xnaqˈtzinjiˈy tzeˈnku kyaj , wenpetzintlatz te kye ikyjo . Quˈn noqpetziˈn iky tetzjo , aku qo klet tuˈn qbˈinchbˈin , a tzeˈnku kyxnaqˈtzin xjal lo , ex ntiˈxitla tajbˈintz jniˈ sikyˈx tuˈn Kolil Jesús , tej tkyim twutz cruz .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Me ayetziˈn xjal nchi qˈmante , qa ilxix tiˈj tuˈn tel qitit chˈin kytzˈumil te kyechil , bˈantla kye tuˈn tel kyqitin kychibˈjil te jun majx . Tuˈnpetziˈn , ojtzqiˈn kyuˈn , tuˈn mi cheˈx lipey kyiˈj .

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Ayiˈy werman , ma chi txoklajtza tuˈn qMan Dios , tuˈn kytzaqpaja tjaqˈ tkyaqiljo lo . Me nya tuˈn ma chi tzaqpeta , kˈwel kybˈinchinjiˈy tkyaqiljo ntqanin ojtxe kyteˈn , a tkyaqil achbˈil . Qalaˈ il tiˈj tuˈn kyajbˈiˈn kyxolilixa , ex tuˈn tok kykˈuˈjlin kyibˈa .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Quˈn atzin ntqˈmaˈn Tuˈjil Tyol Dios kyjaluˈn : Kˈuˈjlinqek tukˈiy tzeˈnkux ntkˈuˈjlin tibˈa til tibˈxa .

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kykaˈyinktzin kyibˈa , tuˈn mi bˈaj kytxˈaˈn kyibˈa kyxolxa tuˈn yasbˈil , ex tuˈn mi bˈaj kybˈinchiˈn tzeˈnqeku txuk toj kˈul noq nkyxbˈayin kyibˈ . Quˈn qa ikyjo , aku chi el xitja kyxolxa te jun majx .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , nqˈmaˈn tuˈn kybˈeta tzeˈnkuxjo taj Xewbˈaj Xjan ; tuˈn mi txi kyqˈoˈn ambˈil teˈ jniˈ ntqaniˈn ojtxe kyteˈn , ex mi ja kynimsin kyibˈa .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Quˈn jniˈ ntqanin ojtxe kyteˈn , a nya bˈaˈn , tkyˈeˈ Xewbˈaj Xjan tiˈj ; ex a taj Xewbˈaj Xjan , tkyˈeˈ ojtxe kyteˈn tiˈj . Tkyˈeˈ teˈ jun tiˈjjo tajjo juntl , ikyx teˈ juntl . Me axte Xewbˈaj Xjan n ‑ onin kyeˈy tuˈn tbˈantjo a taj .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Quˈn qa ma chi bˈeta tzeˈnku taj Xewbˈaj Xjan , nya il tiˈj tuˈn tjapin bˈaj ojtxe kawbˈil kyuˈn , tuˈn kykyija toj wen tukˈa qMan Dios .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Quˈn qˈanchaˈlqex kyeˈ xjal nya bˈaˈn ntqanin ojtxe kyten tzeˈnku : Tuˈn kyjyon juntl kyxuˈjil tiˈjbˈinxi kyxuˈjilku mo tiˈjlbˈinxi kychmilku ; ex jniˈqe kyˈaˈjil ; ex aye nchi bˈinchin tkyaqil tzeqbˈajil , a nya bˈaˈn .

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: Nchi kˈulin twutzjo twutzbˈiyil jun tiˈ ; nchi tyuẍin ; nchi yasin kyxolx ; nchi ikyˈin ; nchi xkyˈaqlin kyiˈj kyukˈa ; jun paqx ntzaj kyqˈoj kyiˈj kyukˈa , noqx nchi ximin kyiˈjx , expe n ‑ el kypaˈn kyibˈ ; ex jun paqx nchex lipe tiˈj jun xnaqˈtzbˈil nya bˈaˈn .

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: Ex noq nloˈchj kykˈuˈj ; bˈyol xjalqe ; twiˈ txˈujtilqe ; ma txi kytolinx kyibˈ toj tkyaqil achbˈil ; ex nchi bˈinchin tkyaqil wiq il . Kxel nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy tzeˈnkuxjo xi nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy ojtxe : Kykyaqiljo iky nbˈantjo kyuˈn , ntiˈx kyoklin tiˈj Tbˈanil Tkawbˈil qMan Dios .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Me atzin teˈ ntqˈoˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan kyjaluˈn : A qkˈuˈjbˈil qibˈ qxolx , tzaljbˈil , qmujbˈil qibˈ , tqˈuqbˈil qkˈuˈj tiˈj Dios , ex qwenil , tkyaqil bˈaˈn , tzˈaqleqoxix tuˈn tjapin bˈaj qyol ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: ex tuˈn qmutxsin qibˈ , exsin tuˈn tbˈant qtzyunte qibˈ . Mixla aˈl aku tzaj kawinqe tiˈjjo ikyjo , quˈn ntiˈ jun kawbˈil tiˈjxi lo .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Ayetzin o chi nimin tiˈj Crist o jaw kyqˈoˈn twutz cruz a nbˈanttaq kyuˈn ojtxe , tzeˈnku tkyaqil achbˈil ex jniˈ tzeqbˈajil nya bˈaˈn .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Quˈn qa o tzaj tqˈoˈn akˈaj qchwinqil tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , il tiˈj tuˈn qbˈet toj tkyaqil , tzeˈnkuxjo taj Xewbˈaj Xjan .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Tuˈn ikyjo , mi jaw qnimsin qibˈ , tuˈn mi tzaje nya bˈaˈn qxol , ex mi loˈchj qkˈuˈj tiˈj juntl .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Ayiˈy werman , qa at jun kyxola ma kubˈ tzˈaq toj il , me ayetzin kyeˈ , ayiˈy waˈlqiˈy toj kynimbˈila , kyxkonksa , ex kywaˈbˈinkuy juntl majl toj tnimbˈil . Me chebˈeku kybˈinchinkuy , quˈn yajtzila qa ayekul kyeˈ ẍi kubˈ tzˈaq toj il .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Bˈaˈnqexa ; kyonim kyibˈa tuˈn tikyˈx yajbˈil kyuˈn , quˈn atzin tumiljo tuˈn tjapin bˈajjo Tkawbˈil Crist kyuˈn .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Me qa at jun kyeˈ tkyˈeˈ tuˈn tkubˈ tbˈinchiˈn lo , noq tuˈn tnimsin tibˈ , ntiˈ tajbˈin ikyjo , ex ax nkubˈ sbˈunte tibˈ .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Qalaˈ , ax te junjun k ‑ okil tkaˈyin tibˈ : Qa wen n ‑ ele toj twutz tzeˈnku taˈye , bˈaˈn ttzalaj , me nya tuˈn tok tqˈoˈn twutz tiˈj juntl .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Quˈn teyilex te junjun k ‑ okil toj paˈbˈin twutz Dios , ex nlay tzˈok tqˈoˈn til te tpaj juntl .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Ikytzin kyeˈ werman , alkye ntzaj kˈmonte Tyol Dios te jun xnaqˈtzil , il tiˈj tuˈn tkubˈ tpaˈn a at te tukˈa xnaqˈtzilte .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Mi kubˈ kysbˈuˈn kyibˈa ayexa . Quˈn mix aˈlx te Dios aku kubˈ sbˈunte , quˈn tzeˈnxjo kbˈantil tuˈnxjal , ikyx t ‑ xeljo ktlaˈbˈil .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Altzin kye kˈwel bˈinchinte jun tiˈ nya bˈaˈn , a tzeˈnku ntqanin ojtxe tten , ikytzin t ‑ xeljo ktlaˈbˈil , ex kkyimil teˈ te jun majx . Me atzin teˈ a kˈwel tbˈinchin bˈaˈn , a tzeˈnku taj Xewbˈaj Xjan , ktlaˈbˈil tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan jun tchwinqil te jun majx .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , mi txi qtzaqpiˈn tuˈn qbˈinchin teˈ wen , tuˈntzin aj tkanin tqˈijil chojbˈil , kqlaˈbˈil jun chwinqil te jun majx .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kukx qo bˈinchiˈn bˈaˈn qkyaqil kyiˈj tkyaqil xjal , me nejxix kyiˈj nimil .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Kykaˈyinkutziˈn ; ayinkuy ma chin kubˈ tzˈibˈiˈnte luˈn tukˈa ma nmaq ntzˈibˈiˈn .

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Ayetziˈn xnaqˈtzil nchi qˈmaˈnte , qa ilxix tiˈj tuˈn tel qitit chˈin kytzˈumila te kyechila . Nkyqˈmaˈn ikyjo , noq tuˈn kyel wen kywutzxjal , ex noq tuˈn mi chi el ikyˈine , tuˈn tpajjo xnaqˈtzbˈil lo : Qa nya tuˈn qbˈinchbˈin at kolbˈil qe te jun majx , qalaˈ noq tiˈj Crist , a kyim twutz cruz te qxel .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Me ayetzin xjal luˈn , a kyaj tuˈn tok kyechila tiˈj kychibˈjila , me mi njapin tkyaqil ojtxe kawbˈil kyuˈn . Oˈkxnaj kyajjo tuˈn tok kyeˈ kyechil , noq tuˈn tjaw kynimsin kyibˈ , qa noq tuˈn kytzi nkubˈ kybˈinchinjiˈy a nkyqˈmaˈn .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Me metzin weˈ , nkyˈeˈy tuˈn tjaw nnimsin wibˈa . Qalaˈ , noq tuˈn nnimsiˈn tkyimlin qAjaw Jesucrist twutz cruz . Quˈn tkyaqiljo at twutz txˈotxˈ , a kyaj txqantl xjal , ntiˈl waja tiˈj , quˈn nyakuj kyimnin taˈye toj nwutza , ex nyakuj kyimninqiˈn toj twutz .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Ikytziˈn luˈn : Ex qa at qechil tok , ex qa mina , me qa at qnimbˈil tiˈj Crist , a Jesús , o qo itzˈje tkabˈ majin tuˈn qnimbˈil tiˈj .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , tkyaqiljo nbˈet tzeˈnku xnaqˈtzbˈil lo , a twutzxix Ttanim qMan Dios . Axit Dios kubˈ kyˈiwlin kyeˈy tukˈa jun nukˈbˈil ex tukˈa tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , mix aˈl jun tuˈn tjaw yolbˈin wiˈja , quˈn nimx weˈ wechil ma tzˈok tuˈn ẍin bˈaj kyjubˈchiˈn xjal , noq tuˈn ẍinx lipeˈy tiˈj Jesús .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Ayiˈy werman , axit qAjaw Jesucrist qˈonte t ‑ xtalbˈil tojile kyanmiˈn kykyaqilxa . Ikyxitjo .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ayiˈn Pabl jun tsanjil Jesucrist , noq tuˈn tajbˈil qMan Dios . Kxel ntzˈibˈinjiˈy uˈj lo te kyeˈy , ayiˈy nimil iteˈ toj tnam Éfeso , a ayiˈy waˈlqexix toj kynimbˈila tiˈj Crist , a Jesús .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Axit qMan Dios junx tukˈa qAjaw Jesucrist ktzajil qˈoˈnte t ‑ xtalbˈil ex jun kymujbˈil kyibˈa kyxola .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Qnimsinks tbˈi Dios , a tDios ex tMan qAjaw Jesucrist . Noq tuˈn Crist , tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios toj qanmin jniˈ tkyˈiwbˈil te toj kyaˈj , a at tajbˈin qe tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Quˈn o qo jaw tskˈoˈn Dios , a naˈmtaq tuˈn tkubˈ tchˈiˈysin twutz txˈotxˈ , tuˈn qok xjanxix , ex ntiˈ qkyˈi twutz . Ex noq tuˈn tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj qiˈj ,

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: ma qo el tpaˈn , tuˈn qok tqˈoˈn te tkˈwal , noq tuˈn Jesucrist , a tzeˈnkuxtaqjo taj , a otaq bˈant tiˈj tuˈn .

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kukx qo nimsin tbˈi qMan Dios tuˈn tbˈanilxix t ‑ xtalbˈil , a ma tzaj toyin qe , noq tuˈn Tkˈwal , a kˈuˈjlinxix tuˈn .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Tuˈnjo tchkyˈel Tkˈwal ma qo kotpaj toj tkyaqil nya wen , ex ma kubˈ tnajsin qil , noq tuˈn nimku t ‑ xtalbˈil ,

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: a noqx ma tzaj tchitin qibˈaj , tuˈn ttzqet ‑ xix qnabˈl ex qojtzqibˈl .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Ex ma tzaj tchikyˈbˈiˈn qe a t ‑ xilin t ‑ xim , a ewintaq ojtxe , a otaq kubˈ t ‑ ximin Dios tuˈn tjapin bˈaj noq tuˈn Crist .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Atzin t ‑ ximjo lo : Kchi okil tqˈoˈn Dios tkyaqil tjaqˈ junchˈin tnukˈbˈil Crist : Jniˈ at toj kyaˈj exsin twutz txˈotxˈ , a il tiˈj tuˈn tjapin tojjo tqˈijil .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Quˈn noq tuˈn Crist , o qo jaw tskˈoˈn Dios , tzeˈnkuxjo kubˈ t ‑ ximin t ‑ xe tnejil , tuˈntzintla qkˈmonte qetzbˈil . Quˈn nkubˈ tbˈinchin Dios tuˈn tjapin bˈaj tkyaqil t ‑ xim ikyx tzeˈnkuxjo taj .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Kubˈ tbˈinchin tkyaqiljo lo tuˈntzintla awo qeˈ , a Judiyqoˈy , a tnejil tuˈn tqe qkˈuˈja tiˈj Crist , tuˈn qoka te Ttanim te jun nimsbˈil tbˈi Dios , a nimxix t ‑ xilin .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Ex ikyqex kyejiˈy jaˈlin , ma chi ok kyeˈ te Ttanim junx qukˈiy , noq tuˈn Crist , tej t ‑ xi kynimiˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil . Ex tej t ‑ xi kynimiˈn , ma tzˈok kyechila toj kyanmiˈn , a Xewbˈaj Xjan ,

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: a ma tzˈok te jun kujsbˈil Tyol qMan tiˈjjo qetzbˈil , a ktzajil tqˈoˈn , ajxi kykotpajjo tkyaqilx , a at toklin tiˈj , tuˈntzintla tjaw nimsitjo tbˈi , a nimxix t ‑ xilin .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , atxix teˈ nbˈintiˈy qa at kynimbˈila tiˈjjo qAjaw Jesús , ex qa at tqˈaqˈbˈil kykˈuˈja kyiˈj tkyaqil nimil ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: kukx nchin qˈonjiˈy chjonte te Dios kyiˈja , ex kukx nchi tzaj nnaˈnjiˈy toj nnaˈj Diosa .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Kukx nxi nqaninjiˈy te qMan , a tDios qAjaw Jesucrist , a nimxix tbˈi , tuˈn ttzaj tqˈoˈn kynabˈla toj kyanmiˈn , tuˈn tel kynikyˈa tiˈjjo jniˈ t ‑ xilin .

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Ex kukx nxi nqaninjiˈy te Dios , tuˈn t ‑ xi tqˈoˈn tumil toj kyanmiˈn , tuˈntzin tel kynikyˈa tiˈj alkye t ‑ xilin tkyaqil , a nchi ayoˈn tiˈj toj kyaˈj , a ma chi txokliˈy tiˈj tuˈn Dios ; ex tuˈn tel kynikyˈa tiˈj alkye t ‑ xilin tkyaqil at toklin Dios tiˈj , a awo Ttanimqo , a tbˈanilxix wen twutz ;

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: ex tuˈn tel kynikyˈa tiˈjjo nimxix tipin Dios , a nbˈant tuˈn qukˈa , awo nimilqo . Atzin tipin lo ikyxjo tzeˈnkuxjo xkubˈ tyekˈin ,

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: tej tjaw anqˈin Crist tuˈn kyxol kyimnin , ex ma kubˈ tqˈuqbˈin toj tman qˈobˈ toj kyaˈj kawil tukˈa .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Xi tqˈoˈn Dios toklin kyibˈajjo tkyaqil nukˈbˈil , ex tkyaqil kawbˈil , ex jniˈ at tipin , ex kykyaqiljo nejinelqe , ex tibˈaj tkyaqiljo a n ‑ ok qˈoˈn kyoklin tojjo tqˈijil jaˈlin , ex tojjo tzul kanin .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Ex kubˈ tqˈoˈn Dios tkyaqil tjaqˈ tkawbˈil Crist , quˈn xi tqˈoˈn toklin tibˈaj tkyaqil . Ex ikyxjo , xi tqˈoˈn toklin tuˈn tok te wiˈbˈaj , a nejinel , tibˈaj Ttanim .

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Atziˈn Ttanim , atzin t ‑ xmilil Cristjo . Ex ntzqet ‑ xixjo Ttanim tuˈn , quˈn ante Crist ntzqet ‑ xix tuˈn tkyaqil .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Quˈn ojtxe kyimnintaq otoˈye twutz Dios , noq tuˈn tpajjo tkyaqil qil ex jniˈ qachbˈil ,

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: a lipcheqoxtaq tiˈj tzeˈnkuxjo kyexjal tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , a nkubˈ kybˈinchin tzeˈnku tajbˈil tajaw il , a kawil tibˈaj tkyaqil taqˈnil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ . Ex ayetziˈn taqˈnil lo nchi aqˈnin toj kyanminxjal , a mi nkubˈ kybˈinchin tajbˈil qMan Dios .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Ikytaqtzin tumiljo nqo bˈettaq qkyaqilx ojtxe , lipcheqoxtaq tzeˈnkuxtaq tajjo qtzeq , ex njapintaqjo qxim , a nya wen , a tzeˈnkuxjo ntqanintaq tachbˈil qxmilil . Tuˈntzin tpajjo jniˈ luˈn , toj qilxtaqqe , tuˈn qkyij tjaqˈ kujxix tkawbˈil Dios te jun majx , tzeˈnqeku txqantl .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Me ante Dios , noq tuˈn nimxix tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj qiˈj , ma qo tkˈuˈjle nimxix ,

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: ex ma tzaj tqˈoˈn qchwinqil junx tukˈa Crist , exla qa kyimninqotaq twutz Dios tuˈn tpaj qil . Me noq tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil Dios , ma qo klete .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ex ma qo jaw anqˈin tuˈn , junx tukˈa Crist , a Jesús , ex ma qo kubˈ tqˈuqbˈin junx tukˈa toj tanmin kyaˈj .

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: Kubˈ tbˈinchin ikyjo , noq tuˈn ttzaj tyekˈin kyexjal kyojjo tqˈijil tzul , at nimxix t ‑ xtalbˈil qiˈj , a nyekˈin tuˈn twenil qukˈa , noq tuˈn Crist , a Jesús .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Quˈn noq tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil Dios , ma qo klete , tuˈn qnimbˈil tiˈj , ex nya tuˈn qbˈinchbˈin . Quˈn nya awox xqo jyonte , qalaˈ a Dios saj qˈonte qe .

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Ntiˈ tumil tuˈn tjaw qnimsin qibˈ , quˈn nya kyuˈnjo qbˈinchbˈin xknete kolbˈilqe .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Qalaˈ ate Dios saj qˈonte akˈaj qchwinqil . Ex ma qo anqˈin tuˈn Crist , a Jesús , tuˈn tkubˈ qbˈinchin bˈaˈn , a tzeˈnkuxjo xkubˈ t ‑ ximin Dios te tnejil .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Ex mi tzˈel naj toj kykˈuˈja , a ojtxe , toj kywutz aj Judiy , ntiˈtaq kyajbˈiˈn , quˈn nyataq tok kyechila tzeˈnku kye . Me te weˈy , ajo kyechil noq jun tiˈ tiˈj tchibˈjil kyxmilil , bˈinchin kyuˈnxjal , ex ntiˈ tajbˈin twutz qMan .

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: Quˈn kyojjo qˈij ojtxe , ntiˈtaq Crist bˈiˈn kyuˈn , ex nimxtaq nchi qˈojiˈn kyukˈa aj Judiy , a skˈoˈnqe tuˈn Dios , ex ntiˈtaq tumil tuˈn kykyija toj wen tukˈa Dios . Ntiˈtaq Dios toj kyanmiˈn tuˈn nya nimilqetaqa , ex ntiˈtaq jun qˈuqbˈil kykˈuˈja tiˈj jun akˈaj kychwinqila , aj kykyima .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Me atzin jaˈlin , noq tuˈn kymujbˈil kyibˈa tukˈa Crist , a Jesús , a ayiˈy , a najchaq iteˈtaqa tukˈa Dios ojtxe , ma chi oka jaˈlin te Ttanim , noq tuˈn tchkyˈel Crist .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Quˈn ate Crist ma tzˈok te qmujbˈil qibˈ , quˈn ma qo ok tmujbˈin te junchˈin Ttanim , exla qa Judiy , tzeˈnku weˈ , exla qa nya Judiy , tzeˈnku kyeˈ . Quˈn ma kubˈ tyuchˈin qˈoj , a attaq tzeˈnku jun nim maqbˈil qxol .

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: Ex noq tuˈnjo tkyimlin Crist , ma tzˈel tipin kawbˈil tukˈa tkyaqil nukˈbˈil ex jniˈ jikysbˈil qchwinqil , a noq tuˈn kykyijxjal toj wen tukˈa Dios . Ex atzin jaˈlin , ma chi ok tmujbˈin kabˈe tnam , ayeˈ aj Judiy junx kyukˈa nya Judiy , tuˈn kyok akˈaj junx tukˈa , tuˈntzin at qmujbˈil qibˈ qkyaqilx .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Ikytzin tumiljo , noq tuˈn tkyimlin Crist twutz cruz , ma kubˈe tiˈjjo qˈoj , a attaq kyxoljo kabˈe tnam , ex ma chi kyij toj wen tukˈa Dios , ex ma chi ok qˈoˈn te junchˈin Ttanim .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Quˈn ma tzul Crist qˈmalte tqaniljo Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil te kykyaqilxjal , exla qa ayiˈy , a najchaqtaq iteˈy tkˈatz Dios , exla qa aye Judiy , aye nqayintaq iteˈ .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Ex noq tuˈn Crist , ma jqet jun akˈaj tumil , tuˈn qkyij qkyaqilx toj wen tukˈa Manbˈaj , noq tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , ma chi oka te Ttanim Dios , ex nya bˈetin xjalqiˈy jaˈlin , toj jun tnam , a nya kyeˈy . Qalaˈ at kyokliˈn tzeˈnqeku txqantl , a aye etzinqe tuˈn Dios , ex ma chi oka tajlal Ttanim .

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Quˈn ma qo ok qkyaqilx nimil te jun ma tij ja , ex ma qo kubˈ qˈuqbˈin tibˈajjo tqˈuqil , a kyxnaqˈtzbˈil tsanjil Jesús , exqetziˈn jniˈ yolil Tyol Dios , aye i kˈmonte Tyol ojtxe . Ex aku Jesucristjo , tnejil abˈj te tqˈuqil , a nimxix toklin .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Noq tuˈn Crist , ajo ma tij ja kyja tjaw chˈiy toj ttxolil , tuˈn tok te jun ja te naˈbˈl Dios , a xjanxix tiˈj qAjaw .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Ex ikyqex kyejiˈy , ayiˈy nimil toj tnam Éfeso , junx ma chi jawe chˈiya , tuˈn kyoka te jun ja , jaˈ najle Dios tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , ayiˈn Pabl intinkuxa toj tze , noq tuˈn tpajjo nchin yoliˈn Tyol Crist , a Jesús , noq tuˈn kyel wena ayiˈy , a nya Judiy .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Ma naˈmxsin kybˈintiˈy , qa a Dios tukˈa tkyaqil tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj saj yekˈin te weˈy , ex ma tzaj toqxenin , tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈmaˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil t ‑ xtalbˈil kyeˈy , a ayiˈy nya Judiy . Ajo Tbˈanil Tqanil lo , a t ‑ xim Dios ewintaq ojtxe , a tzeˈnkuxjo ma txi ntzˈibˈiˈn .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Aj tjaw kyuˈjiˈn , antza k ‑ elile kynikyˈa tiˈj , qa wojtzqiˈnjiˈy , a t ‑ xim Crist lo ,

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: a mix xaye tchikyˈbˈin kywutzxjal ojtxe . Me atzin jaˈlin , ma tzaj tyekˈin Dios , tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , kyejo xjan tsanjil Jesús , exqetziˈn xjan yolil Tyol Dios , aye i kˈmonte Tyol .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Atzin t ‑ ximjo , a ewintaq lo : Qa noq tuˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , aye nimil nya Judiy at kyoklin tiˈjjo etzbˈil , a tzajnin te Dios , junx kyukˈa nimil Judiy . Atzin jaˈlin ma chi oka te junchˈin Ttanim , ex at kyokliˈn junx tiˈjjo tkyaqil , a ma tzaj ttziyin Dios , noq tuˈn Crist , a Jesús .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Ex noq tuˈn nimxix tipin t ‑ xtalbˈil qMan , ma chin ok tqˈoˈn te taqˈnil tiˈjjo Tbˈanil Tqanil lo .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Toj nwutza , ntiˈ wokliˈn kywutzjo tkyaqil txqantl toj Ttanim Dios . Me noq tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil qMan , ma tzaj tqˈoˈn wokliˈn , tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈmanjiˈy Tbˈanil Tqanil jniˈ t ‑ xilin tqˈinimil Crist , a ntiˈ tbˈajil , kye nya Judiyqe .

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: Ex ma tzaj toqxenin weˈy , tuˈn t ‑ xi nchikyˈbˈiˈn kywutz tkyaqilxjal , a t ‑ xilin t ‑ xim Dios , a ewintaq atxix te tnejil , quˈn iky tajbˈil Diosjo , a kubˈ bˈinchinte tkyaqil .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Quˈn ajo tajbˈil Dios , qa noq tuˈn Ttanim k ‑ elile kynikyˈ tkyaqil angel ex jniˈ at tipin toj kyaˈj ex twutz txˈotxˈ , tiˈjjo jniˈ t ‑ xilin tnabˈl Dios .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Quˈn ikyx t ‑ xim Diosjo atxix te tnejil , a naˈmtaq tkubˈ tbˈinchin tkyaqil . Ajo xim lo ma japin tuˈn qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , at jun akˈaj tumil ma jqet , tuˈn qkyij qkyaqilx toj wen tukˈa Dios , noq tuˈn qnimbˈil tiˈj Crist , ex tuˈnjo qˈuqbˈil qkˈuˈj tiˈj .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , chin kubˈsin nwutza kyeˈy , tuˈn mi chi numjiˈy tuˈn tpaj tkyaqiljo n ‑ ikyˈx wuˈn , noq tuˈn tel kynikyˈa tiˈj Tbˈanil Tqanil , quˈn atzin yol lo , atzin kytzaljbˈiljiˈy .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , nchin kubˈ mejeˈy naˈl Dios twutz qMan Dios kyiˈja .

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: Quˈn antza tzajnin qbˈi awo kˈwalbˈajqo te Dios , awo nimil tiˈj , exla qa toj kyaˈj , mo qa twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Ex nxi nqaniˈn te Manbˈaj , a at nimxix tqˈinimil toj tqoptzˈajiyil kyaˈj , tuˈn ttzaj tqˈoˈn kyipiˈn , noq tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan toj kyanmiˈn ,

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: tuˈntzintla tnajan Crist tukˈa tkyaqil tipin toj kyanmiˈn noq tuˈnjo kynimbˈila . Ex nchin naˈn Diosa kyiˈja , tuˈntzintla kyteˈn jikyinxix toj kynimbˈila , ex atitla nimxix tqˈaqˈbˈil kykˈuˈja kyxolxa , tzeˈnku jun tlokˈ tze , a nimx ma txaˈye ;

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: ex tuˈntzintla telxix kynikyˈa tiˈj , kyukˈa tkyaqil nimil , jniˈ t ‑ xilin twutz , ex jniˈ tqine , ex jniˈ t ‑ xe , ex jniˈ tokxeˈ tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj Crist .

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: Ex nxi nqaniˈn , tuˈntzintla tel kynikyˈa tiˈjjo tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj lo , exla qa mi tzˈelpin bˈajx tuˈn tel kynikyˈa tiˈj tkyaqilx ; ex tuˈntzintla tnoj kyanmiˈn te jun majx tukˈa tkyaqil t ‑ xilin Dios .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , qo qˈoˈn chjonte te qMan Dios , a at tipin tuˈn tbˈant nimxixtl tuˈn , tibˈaj tkyaqiljo nxi qqanin te , ex nqo ximin tiˈj , noq tuˈnjo tipin , a n ‑ aqˈnin toj qanmin .

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: Nimxit tbˈi kyxoljo Ttanim , noq tuˈn Crist , a Jesús , jaˈlin ex te jun majx .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , exla qa intinkuxa toj tze tuˈn tpaj qAjaw , nchin kubˈsin nwutza kyeˈy tuˈn kyanqˈiˈn , tzeˈnkuxjo tuˈn tbˈant , a ayiˈy o chi txokliˈy tuˈn Dios tuˈn kyoka te te .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Kymutxsinku kyibˈa , ex bˈunin chi yoliˈn . Kyyonkuy tajbˈil qMan kyukˈa txqantl nimil , ex kukx tzikyˈxi kyuˈn jun tukˈa juntl , tuˈn tqˈaqˈbˈil kykˈuˈja kyxolxa .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Kyqˈonka tilil , tuˈn kukx tuˈn kymujbˈin te kyibˈjiˈy , a tzeˈnkuxjo ma tzaj tqˈoˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan tnukˈbˈil te qmujbˈil qibˈ .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Quˈn junchˈin Ttanim Dios , a t ‑ xmilil Crist , ex junchˈin Xewbˈaj Xjan , ex junchˈin qˈuqbˈil qkˈuˈj tiˈj tkyaqil nqo ayoˈn toj kyaˈj , a tzeˈnkuxjo xqo txokle .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Ex noq junchˈin qAjaw at , ex junchˈin qnimbˈil , ex junchˈin jawsbˈil aˈ , a noq mujbˈinqe .

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Ex junchˈin Dios , a kyMan tkyaqil nimil , ex tibˈaj qkyaqil , ex n ‑ aqˈnin tuˈn qel wen , ex at qoj qkyaqil .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Me teyile junjunqe , exla qa junchˈin t ‑ xtalbˈil Crist , ma tzaj qˈoˈn junxilchaq qoklin , a tzeˈnkuxjo taj .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , ikytzin ntqˈmaˈn toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios : Tej tmeltzˈaj toj kyaˈj , xi tiˈn tukˈa aye i kubˈ tiˈj tuˈn , tuˈn kyxi tyekˈin kywutz tkyaqil toj nintz qˈij te tzaqpibˈl . Ex xi tqˈoˈn junxilchaq kyoklinxjal .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , ¿ Tiˈtzin ele yol lo , qa ma meltzˈaj toj kyaˈj ? Atzin ntqˈmaˈn qa nej xkutz toj kyaˈj , tuˈn tkˈuˈl tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Ex atzin xkutz , axsin xjaxjo najchaq kyibˈajxi kyaˈj , tuˈntzin tnoj tkyaqil tuˈn tukˈa tkyaqil tqoptzˈajiyil .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Ex ax xi qˈonte toklin junjun tuˈn kyok te tsanjil , ex junjun te yolil Tyol Dios , a nkˈmoˈnte Tyol , ex junjun te qˈmal te Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , ex junjun te kyikˈlel ex xnaqˈtzil ,

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: tuˈntzintla kyok te taqˈnil , tuˈn kyajbˈin kye txqantl , tuˈn tchˈiyjo Ttanim Dios , a t ‑ xmilil Crist ,

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: tzmaxi aj qpon qkyaqilx toj jun twutzxix qmujbˈil qibˈ toj qnimbˈil , ex tuˈn tel qnikyˈ tiˈj jniˈ t ‑ xilin Tkˈwal Dios . Ikytziˈn , qo okil te xjal tzˈaqle , tzeˈnkuxjo jniˈ t ‑ xilin Crist ,

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: tuˈntzintla mi qo okil tzeˈnku kyekˈwal , a jun paqx ntxˈixpit kynabˈl , ex jun paqx nchex lipe tiˈj alkyechaqku xnaqˈtzbˈil , a nya toj tumil ; ex nxi kyqˈoˈn kyibˈ tuˈn kykubˈ sbˈuˈn kyuˈnxjal , a ẍtijqe , a nchi chuˈchin kyiˈj , tuˈn kyxiˈ toj jun bˈe te najin .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Atzin qe , qo yolin tiˈjjo twutzxix tukˈa jun yol te tqˈaqˈbˈil kˈuˈjbˈaj , tuˈntzin qchˈiy toj tkyaqil tumil , mujleqo tukˈa Crist , ajo nejinel tibˈaj Ttanim , a t ‑ xmilil .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Ex noq tuˈn Crist , tkyaqiljo t ‑ xmilil tmujbˈin tibˈ tiˈj , tuˈn taqˈin teyile tnej , tuˈntzintla tchˈiy , ex tuˈn kyonin te kyibˈ toj kyqˈaqˈbˈil kykˈuˈj , tzeˈnku taj .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Atzin kxel nqˈmanjiˈy , ex kxel woqxeniˈn toj tbˈi qAjaw , tuˈn mi chi anqˈiniˈy tzeˈnqeku xjal , a nya nimil tiˈj Dios , a nchi anqˈin tzeˈnku ntqanin kynabˈl , a ntiˈ tumil .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Toj qxopin taˈ kynabˈl , ex najchaq iteˈ tiˈj akˈaj chwinqil tuˈn Dios , quˈn ntiˈ tumil toj kywutz , tuˈn tpajjo tchˈuẍil kyanmin .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Ma tzˈel naj kynabˈl te txˈixwejil , ex ma txi kyqˈoˈn kyibˈ toj kyachbˈil , tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈinchin tkyaqil wiq tzeqbˈil , a nya wen .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Me atzin kyeˈ , mi s ‑ el kyxnaqˈtzin ikyjo tiˈj Crist .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Qalaˈ ma tzˈok kybˈiˈn te , ex ma chi xnaqˈtzajtza , a tzeˈnkuxjo twutzxix , a at tiˈj Crist .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , tzeˈnku nchi anqˈintaqa ojtxe , kytzaqpinkjiˈy ojtxe kyteˈn , a ntiˈ tajbˈin , a ma kubˈ sbˈuˈn tuˈn kyajbˈila nya wen .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Ex kytxˈixpinksjiˈy kyanmiˈn ex kynabˈla , tuˈn kyoka akˈaj toj tkyaqil .

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: Ex kyqˈoˈnksinjiˈy kyteˈn , a saqxix , a bˈantnin tzeˈnkuxjo taj Dios , tuˈntzintla tyekˈin jun kychwinqila twutzxix , a tzˈaqle , ex xjanxix kywutz kykyaqil .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , mi chi nikyˈin yola , qalaˈ teyile junjun tuˈn tyolin twutzxix kyukˈa tukˈa , quˈn qkyaqilx ma qo ok te junxchˈin Ttanim Dios , a t ‑ xmilil Crist .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Ex qa ma tzaj kyqˈoja , mi chi bˈinchin ila ; ex atzin qˈoj mi txi kykˈuˈn ajxi tex qˈij .

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Ikytziˈn , mi txi kyqˈoˈn ambˈil te tajaw il .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Ex aye ileqˈ , noqit mi chi elqˈin , qalaˈ tuˈn kyaqˈnin , ex tuˈn tbˈant jun tbˈanil aqˈuntl kyuˈn , tuˈntzintla tknet chˈin kyuˈn , tuˈn kysipin kyukˈa yaj .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Mi txi kyqˈmaˈn jun yol , a nya wen . Qalaˈ i tokin jun yol kyuˈn , a wen , a at tajbˈin tuˈn kychˈiyjo txqantl , tuˈntzintla at tkyˈiwbˈil Dios kyibˈajjo aye nchi bˈiˈn tiˈj .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Mi txi kyqˈoˈn ambˈil , tuˈn tbˈisin Xewbˈaj Xjan , quˈn noq tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , ma txi tqˈoˈn Dios kyechila toj kyanmiˈn , tuˈn tel kynikyˈtzajila qa te Diosqiˈy , ex tuˈn kykotpaja tojjo tqˈijil tzul te paˈbˈin .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Mi chi yoliˈn kujxix kyukˈa kyukˈiy ; ex mi txi kyqˈoˈn kyibˈa toj kyachbˈila ; ex mi chi qˈojiˈn ; ex mi chi ẍchˈiˈn tuˈn kyqˈoja ; ex mi chi yasiˈn , ex mi kubˈ kybˈinchiˈn tkyaqil wiq il .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Qalaˈ , chi okxa wen , bˈunin kyanmiˈn jun tukˈa juntl . Kynajsinkuy kyila kyxola , tzeˈnku te Dios ma kubˈ tnajsin kyila tuˈn Crist .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , tzˈok tilil kyuˈn , tuˈn kyoka tzeˈnku te Dios , quˈn ayiˈy jun tkˈwal , a kˈuˈjlinxix tuˈn .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Kukx chi bˈetjiˈy toj tqˈaqˈbˈil kykˈuˈja kyukˈa kykyaqil , tzeˈnku te Crist , nqo ok tkˈuˈjlin , ex xi tqˈoˈn tibˈ te jun chojbˈil qil , ex te jun oyaj tbˈanilx ele twutz qMan Dios .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Ayetzin kye , a te Diosqiˈy . Tuˈntziˈn , mi chi yoliˈn kukxjo tiˈjjo kyˈaˈjin , ex jniˈ nya wen , ex tkyaqilxjo npon kykˈuˈjxjal tiˈj . Quˈn nya wen tuˈn qyolin tiˈj qxolx .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Ex mi chi yoliˈn tiˈjjo yol te txˈixwejil , exqetziˈn yol , a ntiˈ kyajbˈin , ex jniˈ yaq . Quˈn tkyaqiljo lo nya wen te qe , qalaˈ qo yolin tiˈj aqˈbˈil chjonte te Dios .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Quˈn bˈiˈn kyuˈn ankye kˈwel bˈinchin te kyˈaˈjin , mo qa a jniˈ nya wen , ntiˈ toklin tiˈj Tkawbˈil Crist ex tiˈjjo te Dios . Ex ikyqexjo aye , a npon kykˈuˈj tiˈj jun tiˈ , quˈn ikyx tzˈelpineˈ tzeˈnku tuˈn kykˈulin twutz junxil kydios .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Mi txi kyqˈoˈn kyibˈa tuˈn kykubˈ sbˈuˈn tuˈn kyyolxjal , a nkyxnaqˈtzin qa wen tuˈn tkubˈ qbˈinchin jniˈ tzeqbˈil . Me tuˈnpetzin tpajjo jniˈ lo , tzuljo kujxix tkawbˈil Dios kyibˈajjo a mibˈin chi nimin .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , mi tzˈok kymujbˈin kyibˈa kyukˈa .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Quˈn atzin ojtxe , nchi bˈettaqa toj qxopin ; me atzin jaˈlin , noq tuˈn kymujbˈil kyibˈa tukˈa qAjaw , nchi bˈeta tqan qˈijil . Chi bˈet ‑ xsintza toj kychwinqila , tzeˈnqeku nchi bˈet tqan qˈijil .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Quˈn ikytzin k ‑ yekˈila kychwinqiljiˈy tbˈanilx , ex tzˈaqle , ex twutzxix .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Ex tzˈok tilil kyuˈn , tuˈn ttzalaj qMan Dios kyiˈja .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Mi kubˈ kybˈinchinjiˈy jniˈ nya wen , a nkubˈ kybˈinchin aye iteˈ toj qxopin , qalaˈ kyinqemetza tqan qˈijil ,

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: quˈn manyor txˈixwejilx tuˈn qyolin tiˈj a nkubˈ kybˈinchin toj ewajil .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Me qa ma kubˈ qchikyˈbˈin tqan qˈijil , kyjel qˈanchaˈlix jaˈ ntzaje .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Quˈn toj tspikyˈemil tqan qˈij , n ‑ ele tnikyˈtzajil tkyaqil . Tuˈnpetziˈn , ntqˈmaˈn kyjaluˈn : Qˈimiltzin twatla , a ay nktan . Ex weˈksa kyxol kyimnin . Ex ktzajil tqˈoˈn Crist spikyˈin toj tanmiˈn .

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kykaˈyinktzin kyibˈa tzeˈn tuˈn kybˈetiˈy , nya tzeˈnku jun ntiˈ tnabˈl , qalaˈ tukˈa tkyaqil tumil .

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: Kyqˈonka tilil , a atxku ambˈil , tuˈn kybˈinchiˈn wen , quˈn aye tqˈijil jaˈlin , nya wenqe .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , mi kubˈ kybˈinchinjiˈy a ntiˈ tajbˈin . Tzˈelxit kynikyˈa tiˈj alkye tajbˈil qAjaw .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Ex mi txi kyqˈoˈn kyibˈa noqx tuˈn tnoj kykˈuˈja tuˈn qˈeˈn , quˈn nqox tiˈn te toj jun qchwinqil , a nlay tzyet . Qalaˈ kyqˈoˈnx kyibˈa tuˈn tnoj kyanmiˈn tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Ex chi yoliˈn kyxoliliy tukˈa Tyol Dios , ex ilaˈ bˈitz te qnimbˈil . Ex chi bˈitziˈn , ex chi nimsiˈn tbˈi qAjaw tukˈa tkyaqil kyanmiˈn .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Ex kukx , kyqˈonxjiˈy chjonte te Dios , a Manbˈaj , tiˈj tkyaqil , noq toj tbˈi qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , kyniminku kyibˈa kyxolxa , noq te nimsbˈil tbˈi Crist .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Ayetzin xuˈjlbˈaj , kyniminqekutzinjiˈy kychmila , tzeˈnku te qAjaw .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Quˈn ate chmilbˈaj nejinel te t ‑ xuˈjil , ikyx tzeˈnku te Crist , a nejinel te Ttanim , a t ‑ xmilil , ex xi tqˈoˈn tibˈ te klolte .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Quˈn ikytziˈn tzeˈnku te Ttanim Dios nkubˈ tnimin Crist , ex ikyqetzin kye xuˈjlbˈajjo , tuˈn tkubˈ kynimin kychmil toj tkyaqil .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Exsin ikyx kyejiˈy chmilbˈaj , kykˈuˈjlimqektzinjiˈy kyxuˈjila , tzeˈnku te Crist s ‑ ok tkˈuˈjlin Ttanim , ex xi tqˈoˈn tchwinqil tuˈn tpaj .

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: Ma bˈantjo ikyjo , tuˈntzintla kyok xjan , ex tuˈn kytxjet kyanmin tuˈn Tyol Dios , ex tuˈnjo aˈ te jawsbˈil aˈ ,

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: tuˈntzintla tkˈmoˈnte Ttanim , tzeˈnku jun t ‑ xuˈjil tbˈanilxix wen , a ntiˈ chˈin tkyˈi , ex ntiˈ chˈin tzˈil tiˈj , qalaˈ manyor xjanxix ex tzˈaqlexix .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Ikytzin tzeˈn te chmilbˈaj ntkˈuˈjlin t ‑ xmilil , ex ikytzin tuˈn tok tkˈuˈjlin t ‑ xuˈjil . Quˈn alkye ma tzˈok tkˈuˈjlin t ‑ xuˈjil , ax n ‑ ok tkˈuˈjlin te tibˈ .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Quˈn mix aˈl jun , aku tzˈel ikyˈin te t ‑ xmilil , qalaˈ n ‑ ok tkˈaˈchin , ex n ‑ ok tkaˈyin , tzeˈnku te Crist tiˈj Ttanim , quˈn atzin t ‑ xmililjo .

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: Ex ikyxjo qe , at qoklin tiˈjjo Ttanim , a t ‑ xmilil , a junchˈin .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Quˈn ikytzin ntqˈmaˈn toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios : Tuˈntzin tpajjo , kyjel ttzaqpiˈn ichin ttata ex tnana , tuˈn tok meje tukˈa t ‑ xuˈjil , ex kabˈe kchi okil te junchˈin xmilil .

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Ojtzqiˈn wuˈn , qa nim t ‑ xilinjo lo , ex nlay tzˈel qnikyˈ tiˈj , me mi nchin yoliˈn noqx tiˈjjo mejebˈlin , qalaˈ tiˈjjo Crist tukˈa Ttanim , a t ‑ xmilil .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kxel nqˈmaˈn juntl majl kyeˈy , ayiˈy chmilbˈaj , qa teyile junjun kye tuˈn tok kykˈuˈjliˈn kyxuˈjila tzeˈnkuxjo ayiˈy , ex ikyx te qya , tuˈn tkubˈ kynimin kychmil .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Ayiˈy kˈwalbˈaj , kyniminqekutzinjiˈy kytatiy , tzeˈnku taj qAjaw , quˈn ante wenjo ,

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: ex ante tnejil nukˈbˈiljo , a at t ‑ xel tuˈn Dios , quˈn ikyx ntqˈmaˈn toj Tuˈjil Tyol Dios : Kyniminqekujiˈy kytatiy ex kynaniy ,

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: tuˈntzintla kytzalaja , ex tuˈn kyteˈn ilaˈ qˈij twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Ex ikyqex kyejiˈy manbˈaj , mi kaˈmin kykˈuˈja kyukˈa kykˈwala , tuˈn tbˈaj kykˈuˈj . Qalaˈ kychˈiysinqeksa tukˈa tumil , ex kyxnaqˈtzinqexa tuˈn kynimin tiˈj qAjaw .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Ex ayiˈy aqˈnil , kyniminqekujiˈy tajaw aqˈuntl tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ tukˈa kymutxbˈil kyibˈa , ex tuˈn kykubˈ kynimin toj tumil , ex tukˈa tkyaqil kyanmiˈn , nyakuxtlaj te Crist nchi ajbˈiniˈy .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Chi ajbˈinxita , nya noq oˈkx tzeˈnku nchi kaˈyin kyiˈja , noq tuˈn kyel wena kywutz , qalaˈ kybˈinchinkujiˈy lo tukˈa tkyaqil kyanmiˈn , a tzeˈnku taj qMan Dios .
