text2: Atzin jaˈlin erman , o bˈaj qnikˈuˈn kyeˈy tzeˈn tuˈn kybˈetiˈy toj tumil , ex tzeˈnku taj qMan Dios tzeˈnkuxjo nkubˈ kybˈinchiˈn jaˈlin . Me qo kubˈsil qwutza kyeˈy toj tbˈi qAjaw Jesús , tuˈn kukx tkubˈ kybˈinchinjiˈy ikyjo .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Quˈn ojtzqiˈn kyuˈn a xnaqˈtzbˈil xi qqˈoˈn , axjo tzaj tqˈoˈn qAjaw Jesús :

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: A tajbˈil qMan Diosjo , tuˈn kyoka tzˈaqle toj kychwinqila , ex tuˈn tel kypaˈn kyibˈa tiˈjjo kyˈaˈjin tiˈjlbˈinxi mejebˈlin .

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: Quˈn teyilex te junjun tuˈn tel tnikyˈ te , tuˈn tnajan xjan wen tukˈa t ‑ xuˈjil , ex atitla toklin t ‑ xuˈjil toj twutz ;

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: nya tuˈn tnajan tukˈa achbˈil ex tzeqbˈil tiˈj juntl ichin mo juntl qya , tzeˈnkuxjo nbˈant kyuˈnxjal , a naˈm tel kynikyˈ tiˈj qMan Dios .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Mix aˈl jun kyeˈ tuˈn tkubˈ tbˈinchin ikyjo , quˈn tuˈn ikyjo nkubˈ tsbˈuˈn juntl . Quˈn axte qMan Dios ktzajil qˈonte tkawbˈil kujxix kyibˈajjo nchi bˈinchin teˈ ikyjo , a tzeˈnkuxjo xi qqˈmaˈn kyeˈy .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Quˈn aku te qMan Dios o txkonqe tuˈn qanqˈin saqxix toj tkyaqil , ex nya tukˈa jun nya bˈaˈn toj qchwinqil .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Ikytziˈn , qa at jun n ‑ el ikyˈin teˈ xnaqˈtzbˈil lo , nya noq jun ichin n ‑ el tikyˈin , qalaˈ aku qMan Dios , a tzaj qˈonte Xewbˈaj Xjan toj qanmin .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , nya il tiˈj tuˈn qtzˈibˈiˈn tiˈjjo tqˈaqˈbˈil kykˈuˈja kyxolxa , quˈn axte qMan Dios o tzaj yekˈinte kyeˈy , tzeˈn tuˈn kykˈuˈjlin te kyibˈa kyxoliliˈy .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Ex nkubˈ kybˈinchiˈn ikyjo kyukˈa jniˈ nimil toj tkyaqil txˈotxˈ te Macedonia . Me qo kubˈsil qwutza kyeˈy , erman , tuˈn tchˈiyxixjo kykˈuˈjbˈil kyibˈa .

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Kyqˈonka tilil , tuˈn kyanqˈiˈn wen , ex tuˈn mi tzˈokx kylimoˈn kyibˈa tojjo a nya kyeˈy . Qalaˈ kukx chi aqˈninjiˈy , tzeˈnkuxjo o txi qqˈmaˈn kyeˈy ,

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: tuˈntzintla kykubˈ nimiˈn kyuˈnxjal , a nya nimil , ex tuˈntzin ntiˈ atx taj kyeˈy .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , erman , qaja tuˈn tel kynikyˈa kyiˈjjo ayeˈ nimil nchi kyim , tuˈntzin mi chi jaw labˈiˈn , tzeˈnqeku txqantl xjal , aye nya nimilqe , aye ntiˈ tqˈuqbˈil kykˈuˈj , tuˈn kylonte kywutz juntl majl .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Quˈn bˈiˈn quˈn qa kyim Jesucrist , ex jatz anqˈin juntl majl . Exsin ikyqexjo nimil , aye nchi kyim , kchi jawitz anqˈin juntl majl tuˈn Dios , ex kchi tzajil tiˈn tukˈa Jesús , aj tul juntl majl .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , nxi qqˈmaˈnjiˈy t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈil qAjaw : A awo itzˈqox , ajxi tul kanin qAjaw , mi qo nej kywutzjo ayeˈ o chi kyim .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Quˈn ax te qAjaw kˈwelitz toj kyaˈj tukˈa jun tqˈajqˈojil twiˈ kujxix wen , ex tukˈa tqˈajqˈojil twiˈ tnejil angel , ex tukˈa tqˈajqˈojil tsu qMan Dios . Ex ayetziˈn nimil otaq chi kyim , kchi jawitz anqˈin nejxix .

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Tbˈajlinxiˈ ikyjo , awotzinqe , a itzˈqoxtaq , qo xel tiˈn junx kyukˈa toj muj , tuˈntzin qten tukˈa qAjaw te jun majx .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Twutzxixjo xnaqˈtzbˈil lo . Tuˈnpetziˈn , kyqˈuqbˈimtzin kykˈuˈja , tuˈnjo yol lo .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin erman , nya il tiˈj tuˈn t ‑ xi nqˈmaˈn tijjo tqˈijil mo tiˈjjo jtoj tuˈn tul Jesús juntl majl tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ ,

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: quˈn bˈin kyuˈn qa il tiˈj tuˈn tul qAjaw , me mix aˈl bˈilte jtoj bˈaˈn tul , qalaˈ ikytziˈn tzeˈnku jun ileqˈ n ‑ ul qnikyˈin .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Quˈn toj kywutzxjal tkyaqil bˈaˈn taˈ , ex ntiˈ jun xobˈajil . Me ntiˈkux toj kynabˈl , aj tuljo xitbˈil kyibˈaj tuˈn qAjaw , quˈn ikyxjo tzeˈnku njaw qˈiˈn jun qya tuˈn tchyoˈn tal , ex mix aˈl jun ktzˈaqpajil .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Me ayetzin kyeˈ , erman , nlay chi jaw kaˈylaja , aj tul qAjaw , quˈn mi nchi bˈeta toj qxopin toj kyanmiˈn , quˈn bˈiˈn kyuˈn qa il tiˈj tuˈn tul , a ntiˈkux toj qnabˈl , tzeˈnku tulil jun ileqˈ .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Quˈn qkyaqil ma qo ok te spikyˈin , ex te qˈijl toj qanmin , quˈn qojtzqiˈn qMan Dios , ex nya te qnikyˈinqo , ex ntiˈ nqo bˈet toj qxopin .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , mi qo ktan toj qnimbˈil tzeˈnqekuˈ xjal nchi ktan , aj tul ileqˈ . Qalaˈ qkˈasim qibˈ toj qnimbˈil , ex tenxit qnabˈl , tuˈntzintla noq bˈinchil qten , aj tul .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Quˈn ayetzin kyeˈ , a nchi bˈet toj qxopin , ex nya tok tilil kyuˈn tiˈj qMan Dios , ikyx tzele tzeˈnku jun xjal nktan qnikyˈin . Ntiˈ bˈin kyuˈn tiˈ kbˈajil . Ex ikyx tzeˈnku aye nchi txˈujte , toj qnikyˈin nchi txˈujte .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Me metzin qeˈ , a awo nimil , te qˈijlqo . Tuˈnpetziˈn , qtzyuˈmtzin qibˈ , ex qklomtzin qibˈ noq tuˈn qnimbˈil tiˈj qMan Dios , ex tuˈn qkˈuˈjbˈil qibˈ qxol , ikyx tzeˈnku jun xoˈl qˈaqˈ ntkloˈn tibˈ tukˈa jun kxbˈil te kolbˈil tkˈuˈj . Ex qˈuqlek qkˈuˈj tiˈjjo kolbˈilqe , ikyxjo tzeˈnku kolbˈil twiˈ jun xoˈl qˈaqˈ .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Quˈn nya ma qo tzaj tqˈoˈn te Dios tuˈn tikyˈx jun kawbˈil quˈn , kujxix te jun majx , qalaˈ noq oˈkx tuˈn qklet tuˈn qAjaw Jesucrist ,

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: a o kyim te qxel , tuˈn qanqˈin junx tukˈa , qa itzˈqoxtaq , ex qa otaq qo kyim .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kynimsinx kykˈuˈja kyxolilixa , ex kykujsinx kyibˈa , tzeˈnkuxjo ntena kyuˈn .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Atzin jaˈlin erman , nqo kubˈsin qwutza kyeˈy , tuˈn kykubˈ kyniminjiˈy ayeˈ nchi aqˈnin kuj kyxola , a ayeˈ nejinel kyxola toj tbˈi qAjaw , ayeˈ nchi jikysin kyeˈy toj kynimbˈila .

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: Chebˈe chi kykaˈyinqeka , ex chi kykˈuˈjlinqeka , quˈn tuˈn aqˈuntl nbˈant kyuˈn kyxola , ex tenxit kymujbˈil kyibˈa kyxolilixa , tuˈntzin kyteˈn toj tbˈanil .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Ex ikyxjo erman , nqo kubˈsin qwutza kyeˈy , tuˈn kyxi kykawinjiˈy ayeˈ kykyˈeˈ tuˈn kyaqˈnin , ex tuˈn kynimsin kykˈuˈjjo ayeˈ kyjaˈ kykubˈ numj , ex tuˈn kymojiˈn kyukˈa a ntiˈxixl kyipin . Chebˈe chi ayoˈn tajbˈil qMan Dios kyukˈa kykyaqil .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Kykaˈyink kyibˈa , quˈn qa at jun xkubˈ bˈinchinte jun nya bˈaˈn kyiˈja , mi xelin kyuˈn ikyxjo , noqpe kyjaˈ kxela kychjoˈn tukˈa jun bˈaˈn . Kybˈinchima ikyjo kyxola ex tukˈa kykyaqil xjal .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Kukxit chi tzalajiˈy .

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: Mi txi kytzaqpiˈn tuˈn kynaˈn Dios .

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: Kyqˈonxa chjonte te qMan Dios tojjo bˈaˈn ex qa tojjo nya bˈaˈn , quˈn ikytzin taj Diosjo qukˈa , awo nimilqo tiˈj tbˈi Crist , a Jesús .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Mi tzˈok kymiyonjiˈy a tajbˈil Xewbˈaj Xjan toj kyanmiˈn .

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: Mi tzˈel kyiˈjlinjiˈy Tyol Dios nyolajtz kyxola .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Kyxpichˈinkujiˈy tkyaqil kyxnaqˈtzbˈilxjal , ex kyniminkujiˈy a wen .

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: Ex kypaˈmil kyibˈa tiˈj tkyaqiljo nya wen .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Axit Dios , a Tajaw tkyaqil nukˈbˈil , kubˈ qˈon kyeˈy saqxix , ex tzˈok kaˈyin teˈ kyanmiˈn , kynabˈla , ex kyxmilila , tuˈntzintla ntiˈx jun tiˈ atx taj kyeˈy , aj tul qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Quˈn tzˈaqlexix teˈ , a ma txkon kyeˈy , tuˈn tjapin bˈaj Tyol , tzeˈnkuxjo ma tzaj tqˈmaˈn kyeˈy .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin erman , chi naˈn Diosa qiˈja .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Kyqˈonxa jun qˈolbˈil twutzxix kye kykyaqil erman .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Ex kxel woqxeniˈn kyeˈy toj tbˈi qAjaw , tuˈn tkubˈ kyuˈjinjiˈy uˈj lo kyxol kykyaqil erman .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Noqit kukx tten t ‑ xtalbˈil qAjaw Jesucrist kyukˈiy . Ikyxitjo .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Ayiˈn Pabl nxi ntzˈibˈinjiˈy uˈj luˈn , junx tukˈa Silvano ex Timotey . Nxi ntzˈibˈiˈn kyeˈy , ayiˈy Ttanim Dios toj tnam Tesalónica , a ayiˈy ma tzˈok kymujbˈin kyibˈa tukˈa qMan Dios ex tukˈa qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Chjonte qMan Dios tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil ex tnukˈbˈil kyibˈaja , a qTata ex qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Erman , kukx nxi qqˈonjiˈy chjonte te qMan Dios kyiˈja . Ex il tiˈjjo lo tuˈn tkubˈ qbˈinchiˈn , quˈn a kynimbˈila nchˈiyxix wen , junx tukˈa kykˈuˈjbˈila teyile junjun .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kukx nqo yoliˈn kyiˈja kyxol kykyaqil Ttanim Dios , quˈn tuˈn nimxix kynimbˈila ex tuˈn waˈlqexixa toj tkyaqiljo nya bˈaˈn ntzaj kyuˈnxjal , ex toj tkyaqiljo bˈis n ‑ ikyˈx kyuˈn .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Ate luˈn nyekˈinte qa tzˈaqlexix Dios tukˈa tkawbˈil , quˈn toj tkyaqiljo jniˈ n ‑ ikyˈx kyuˈn , ma tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios kyokixa toj kyaˈj .

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Quˈn tzˈaqlexix te Dios . Tuˈnpetziˈn , il tiˈj tuˈn ttzaj tqˈoj Dios kyiˈjjo ayeˈ nchi yajin kyiˈja .

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: Ex ktzajil tqˈoˈn ajlabˈl kyeˈy , ayiˈy n ‑ ikyˈx kyuˈn ; ikyxjo tzeˈnku qeˈ ktzajil tqˈoˈn ajlabˈl qeˈy , toj tqˈijil , aj tul qAjaw Jesús toj kyaˈj tukˈa qˈaqˈ njulin wen , ex kyukˈa jniˈ t ‑ angel .

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Ex tzul qˈolte tkawbˈil kujxix kyibˈaj kykyaqiljo , a mi ẍi nimin tiˈj Dios , ex mi xkubˈ kynimin a Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil te qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Ex ktzajil qˈoˈn kawbˈil kujxix te jun majx , ex kchi elix lajet najchaq tkˈatz Dios toj kyaˈj , jaˈ nqoptzˈaje qAjaw tukˈa tkyaqil tipin .

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: Tkyaqiljo lo kbˈajil , aj tul tqˈijil , tuˈn tul qAjaw , tuˈn tjaw nimsin tbˈi , ex tuˈn kyjaw kaˈylaj tkyaqil nimil , junx kyukˈiy , ayiˈy ma txi kyniminjiˈy a yol xi qqˈmaˈn kyeˈy .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kukx nqo naˈnjiˈy Dios kyiˈja , tuˈn kybˈeta toj tumilxix , a tzeˈnkuxjo kyokliˈn , teˈ ẍi tzaj txkoˈn tuˈn . Ex nqo kubˈsin qwutza te Dios , tuˈn kytzaj oniˈn tuˈn , tuˈn tjapin bˈajjo jniˈ kyajbˈila bˈaˈn ex tkyaqil kyaqˈiˈn , a nkybˈinchiˈn tuˈn kynimbˈila , noq tukˈa tkyaqil tipin qMan .

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ikytziˈn , kjawil nimsit tbˈi qAjaw Jesucrist toj kychwinqila , ex ikyxjo kyeˈ ex kchi jawil nimsiˈn kywutz tkyaqil xjal noq tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil qMan Dios ex qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Atziˈn tiˈjjo tulil qAjaw Jesucrist , ex tiˈjjo aj qchmet junx tukˈa , qo kubˈsil qwutza kyeˈy , erman ,

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: tuˈn mi jaw kytxˈixpinjiˈy kynabˈla , ex mi chi jaw xobˈa , qa at juntl xnaqˈtzbˈil , nyakutlaj tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , mo tuˈn jun yol , aj tok kybˈiˈn , mo tuˈn jun uˈj , nyakutlaj awoˈy xqox smaˈnte , ex qa ntqˈmaˈn qa lu tqˈijil qAjaw ma tzul , qa chiˈ .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Mi txi kyqˈoˈn kyibˈa tuˈn kykubˈ sbˈuˈn kyuˈnxjal , quˈn aj naˈmxtaq tpon tqˈijil tuˈn tul qAjaw , ok chi qˈojlilxjal tiˈj qMan Dios nej , ex antza kˈwele tyekˈin ichin tibˈ , a ajqˈojxix tiˈj Dios , a o tzˈel qˈoˈn te najin te jun majx .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Quˈn atzin ichin lo kjawil tnimsin tibˈ twutz Dios , ex kqˈojlil tiˈj tkyaqil kydiosxjal ex tiˈj tkyaqil kˈulbˈil . Ex okpe kˈwel qe toj tnejil ja te kynabˈl nxjalila Dios , ayeˈ aj Judiy . Ex k ‑ okil tqˈoˈn tibˈ nyakuj Dios . Ex ok tqˈmaˈbˈil : Ayiˈn weˈ Dios , chilaˈ .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: ¿ Mitzin naˈn kyuˈn , tej t ‑ xi nqˈmaˈn kyeˈy tiˈj tkyaqiljo lo , tej intinxtaqa kyukˈiy ?

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Ex atzin jaˈlin , bˈiˈn kyuˈn tiˈ ma tzˈok meqonte , tuˈn mi tzule ichin lo . Naˈmx tkanin tqˈijil .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Atziˈn tipin nya bˈaˈn , n ‑ aqˈnin jaˈlin twutz txˈotxˈ toj ewajil , tzmaxiˈ aj teljo a meqolte .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Bˈeˈxsin kˈwel tyekˈiˈn ichin tibˈ , a aj ilxix , me bˈeˈx kˈwel bˈyoˈn tuˈn qAjaw , noq tukˈa T ‑ xew . Ex noq tuˈn tqoptzˈajiyil tten , bˈeˈx kˈwel yuchˈj te jun majx .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: Atzin ichin aj ilxix tzul noq tuˈn tipin satanás , a tajaw il . Ex kˈwel tbˈinchin nim techil tipin , a noq tuˈn kyjaw kaˈylajkuxjal tiˈj , me noq te sbˈuˈbˈl .

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: Ex kˈwel tbˈinchin tkyaqil wiq il , noq tuˈn kysbˈetku xjal tuˈn , aye kyjaˈ kyxiˈ toj najin , quˈn kykyˈeˈ tuˈn kynimin tiˈjjo Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , a twutzxix , tuˈn kyklet .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , ax Dios kxel tzaqpinkye tuˈn kykubˈ sbˈuˈn , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi kynimin a yol nya twutzx ,

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: tuˈntzin kynaj te jun majx , quˈn kykyˈeˈ tuˈn t ‑ xi kynimin Tbˈanil Tqanil , quˈn noq oˈkx nchi tzalaj tuˈn kybˈinchin il .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Me metzin kyeˈ , erman , ayiˈy kˈuˈjlinqiˈy tuˈn qAjaw , o chi jaw skˈoˈn atxix ojtxe tuˈn qMan Dios , tuˈn kykleta , noq tuˈn o saqix kyanmiˈn tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , ex tuˈn o chi nimiˈn tiˈj Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , a twutzxix . Tuˈnpetziˈn , kukx kxel qqˈoˈnjiˈy chjonte te Dios kyiˈja .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ikytziˈn , ma chi txokliˈy tuˈn qMan Dios tuˈn kykleta , noq tuˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , a xi qqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , tuˈntziˈn jaˈlin at kyokliˈn tiˈjjo a at toj kyaˈj , jaˈ nqoptzˈaje qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , ayiˈy erman , chi weˈxixa jikyin wen toj kynimbˈila , ex mi tzˈel naj toj kykˈuˈja a xnaqˈtzbˈil xi qqˈoˈn kyeˈy , tej otoˈxtaqa kyukˈiy , ex tojjo uˈj xi qsmaˈn kyeˈy .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Aku qAjaw Jesucrist ex qMan Dios o tzˈok kˈuˈjlinqe , ex o tzaj tqˈoˈn jun qˈuqbˈil qkˈuˈj te jun majx . Ex tuˈn ikyjo , tzaj tqˈoˈn jun tbˈanil tumil tuˈn kyayoˈn tiˈjjo a at toj kyaˈj , noq tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil . Axit qAjaw ex qMan Dios nimsin te kyanmiˈn ex tuˈn kyweˈxixa kujxix , tuˈntzin kyyoliˈn ex tuˈn kybˈinchintejiˈy wenxix toj tkyaqil .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , erman , chi naˈn Diosa qiˈja , tuˈn tkanin Tbˈanil Tqanil qAjaw liwey toj tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ , ex tuˈn tkubˈ nimin , tzeˈnkuxjo tej xpon kanin kyxola .

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Ex chi naˈn Diosa qiˈja tuˈn qkleta toj kyqˈobˈxjal piˈsqe ex aj ilqe , quˈn nya tkyaqilxjal nimilqe tiˈj Tyol Dios .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Me me te Dios tzˈaqlexix teˈ , ex chi kˈwel tzyuˈn tuˈn jikyinxix , ajxi tjapin bˈaj tkyaqil ; ex ok chi elil kloˈn tuˈn , toj tqˈobˈ tajaw il .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Ex qˈuqle qe qkˈuˈj tiˈj qAjaw , quˈn atziˈn xi qqˈmaˈn kyeˈy , ax nkubˈ kybˈinchinjiˈy , ex noqit kukx kubˈ kybˈinchinjiˈy .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Axit qAjaw tzˈonin kyeˈy , tuˈn tel kynikyˈa te tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj qMan Dios kyukˈiy , ex tuˈn kykujsin te kyibˈa , tzeˈnku te Crist , toj tkyaqiljo a n ‑ ikyˈx kyuˈn .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Atzin jaˈlin erman , kxel qqˈmaˈn kyeˈy toj tbˈi qAjaw Jesucrist , tuˈn tel kypaˈn kyibˈa tiˈj tkyaqiljo erman , a tkyˈeˈ tuˈn taqˈnin , ex mi nbˈet tzeˈnku tojjo xnaqˈtzbˈil , a xi qyekˈiˈn .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Qalaˈ bˈiˈn kyuˈn qa il tiˈj tuˈn kyok lipeˈy tiˈjjo yekˈbˈil xkubˈ qqˈoˈn kywutza , quˈn nyataq kyˈajqoˈy kyxola ,

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: ex mix jaˈ xqo ok waniˈy kyiˈja . Qalaˈ ma qo aqˈniˈn qˈijl ex qnikyˈin , tuˈntzin mi tzˈoke jun iqtz kyiˈja .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: ¿ Quˈn noqittzin ntiˈtaq qokliˈn tiˈj jun onbˈil , tuˈn t ‑ xi qqaniˈn kyeˈy ? Me mi xi qqaniˈn . Qalaˈ ma qo aqˈniˈn , tuˈntzintla tkyij qqˈoˈn jun yekˈbˈil kyeˈy , tuˈn kyok lipeˈy tiˈj .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Quˈn tej qteˈn kyukˈiy , xi qnikˈuˈn kyeˈy , qa at jun aˈla tkyˈeˈ tzˈaqˈnin , ex ntiˈ tuˈn twaˈn .

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Nxi qnaˈnjiˈy luˈn kyeˈy , quˈn bˈiˈn quˈn qa at junjun kyxola , a kykyˈeˈ chi aqˈnin , ex noq n ‑ ex kyqˈij kybˈetbˈin kytziyile ja .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Me aye xjal lo kxel qqˈmaˈn kye toj tbˈi qAjaw Jesucrist , tuˈn kyaqˈnin , tuˈntzintla tkanbˈitjo telix kyqˈij kyuˈn .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Ayiˈy erman , mi chi sikytiˈy tuˈn kybˈinchintejiˈy wen .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Ex qa at jun kyxola mi nkubˈ tbˈiˈn a nxi qqˈmaˈn kyeˈy tojjo uˈj lo , noq kykaˈyinka , exsin kypamil kyibˈa tiˈj , tuˈntzin ttzaj txˈixwe .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Me mi tzˈel kyikyˈiˈn , qalaˈ kyqˈoˈnxa jun tnabˈl , quˈn erman .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Noqit ax qAjaw , a Tajaw tkyaqil nukˈbˈil , kukx tzaj qˈonte tnukˈbˈil toj tkyaqil . Ex axit qAjaw ten kyukˈiy toj tkyaqil .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Atzin qˈolbˈil luˈn ayinkuy Pabl nchin kubˈ tzˈibˈiˈnte tzeˈnkuxjo nkubˈ ntzˈibˈinjiˈy tkyaqil wuˈja . Ex ikytzin k ‑ elile kynikyˈjiˈy te , qa ayinkuy nchin kubˈ tzˈibˈinte uˈj lo .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Noqit a t ‑ xtalbˈil qAjaw Jesucrist kyibˈaja kykyaqila . Ikyxitjo .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Ayiˈn Pabl , jun tsanjil Jesucristqiˈn , chqˈoˈn tuˈn Dios , a Klolqe , ex tuˈn qAjaw Jesucrist , a qˈuqlexix qkˈuˈj tiˈj .

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Nxi ntzˈibˈinjiˈy uˈj luˈn tey , Timotey , ay ok nqˈoˈn te nkˈwala toj qnimbˈil . Noqit ax qMan Dios ex Crist , a Jesús , tzaj qˈoˈnte t ‑ xtalbˈil , tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj , ex jun nukˈbˈil toj tchwinqila .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Quˈn ikytziˈn tzeˈnku in kubˈsin nwutza tey , tej nxiˈy toj txˈotxˈ te Macedonia , exsin ikyx teˈ jaˈlin kxel nqˈmaˈn juntl majla tey , tuˈn tkyija toj tnam Éfeso , tuˈn t ‑ xi tnikˈuˈn te junjun xjal , tuˈn mina txi kyyekˈin jun xnaqˈtzbˈil , nya toj tumil ,

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: ex tuˈn mi tzˈok kybˈiˈn kylaˈjxjal ex jniˈ kybˈisxjal , a ntiˈ bˈajsbˈil kye , kyiˈj ojtxe qxeˈchil . Quˈn tkyaqiljo luˈn , noq tuˈn qyasin tiˈj , ex mi n ‑ onin qiˈj tuˈn tjapin qnimbˈil tzeˈnku taj Dios .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Nya tiquˈnil nxi ntzˈibˈinjiˈy luˈn , noq tuˈn tok kykˈuˈjlin kyibˈa kyxolxa kykyaqilxa , tukˈa jun kˈuˈjbˈil , a tzajnin tojxix kyanmiˈn saqxix , ex toj tbˈanil kynabˈla , ex tuˈn kynimbˈila twutzxix .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Quˈn at junjun ma tzˈel txalpaj kyiˈjjo lo ; ma txi lipe tiˈjjo kyximxjal , a ntiˈ tajbˈin .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Kyaj tuˈn kyok te xnaqˈtzil tiˈjjo tkawbˈil qMan Dios , ex mi n ‑ el kynikyˈ te a nkyqˈmaˈn , ex tiˈjjo kyxnaqˈtzbˈil nxi kyqˈoˈn nyakuj twutzxix .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Quˈn bˈiˈn quˈn , qa bˈaˈn teˈ tkawbˈil Dios , me qa ma tzˈajbˈin quˈn tzeˈnkuxjo taj .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Bˈaˈn tuˈn ttzaj qnaˈn , qa ntiˈ kawbˈil ntzaj kyibˈajjo nkubˈ kybˈinchin wen , qalaˈ kyibˈajjo nchi bˈinchin nya wen : Tzeˈnqeku xjal n ‑ el kyiˈjlin kawbˈil , ex kykyˈeˈ tuˈn kynimin , ex aye nya bˈaˈnqe , ex aj ilqe , ex aye kykyˈeˈ tuˈn t ‑ xi kynimin qMan Dios exsin Tyol , ex aye nkubˈ kybˈyoˈn kyman ex kytxu , ex kykyaqiljo bˈyol xjal ,

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: ex kykyaqiljo nchi bˈinchin aj pajil tiˈjlbˈinxi mejebˈlin , ex aye nchi kyˈaˈjin , ichin tukˈax jun ichin ex qya tukˈax jun qya , exqetziˈn jniˈ elqˈil xjal , ex jniˈ sbˈul yol , ex tkyaqiljo nkujsinte tyol , a nya twutzx , twutz kawil ; ex tkyaqiljo nkubˈ kybˈinchin nya bˈaˈn tiˈjjo xnaqˈtzbˈil twutzxix .

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: Ex atziˈn xnaqˈtzbˈil luˈn ikyxjo tzeˈnku ntqˈmaˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil tzˈaqlexix , a oqxenintz weˈy tuˈn qMan Dios , nimxixjo tbˈi .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Kxel nqˈoˈn chjonte te qAjaw Jesucrist , a ma tzaj qˈoˈnte wipiˈn , quˈn ma chin ok tqˈoˈn tzˈaqle twutz , ex ma chin kubˈ tqˈoˈn toj taqˈin .

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: Nejlku nim ma chin qˈojliˈy tiˈj , ex ajinqiˈn ẍin el iˈjlin kye Ttanim , ex ma chin yasin tiˈj . Me ma tzaj qˈaqˈin tkˈuˈj wiˈja , quˈn naˈmtaq nnimiˈn tiˈj , ex mi n ‑ eltaq nnikyˈa teˈ nbˈanttaq wuˈn .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Me nimxix t ‑ xtalbˈil ma tzaj tqˈoˈn qAjaw wibˈaja , junx tukˈa qnimbˈil ex tqˈaqˈbˈil qkˈuˈj , noq tuˈn qmujbˈil qibˈ tukˈa Crist , a Jesús .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Twutzxix teˈ luˈn , ex tkyaqil tuˈn t ‑ xi niminte : Qa a Crist , a Jesús , ul twutz txˈotxˈ tuˈn kykletjo aj il , ex ayinkuy nimxix wila tzeˈnku kye txqantl .

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , qa ma chin kleta tuˈn tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj Jesucrist wiˈja , exsin ikyx aku klet txqantl . Quˈn ikytziˈn ma chin okejiˈy te jun yekˈbˈil kyejo a tuˈntaq kynimin tiˈj , tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil , tuˈn tten kychwinqil te jun majx .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kukx qqˈonx chjonte ex qnimsiks tbˈi qMan Dios , a Kawil tibˈaj tkyaqil , a itzˈ te jun majx , me a nya qˈanchaˈl , a oˈkx jun Dios at . Ntiˈ juntl . Ikyxitjo .

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Atzin jaˈlin , Timotey , ay nkˈwala , kxel woqxeninjiˈy nukˈbˈil lo tey : Tzˈokxit tilil tuˈn , tuˈn tbˈet ‑ xixa wen toj tnimbˈila ex tukˈa tnabˈla , tuˈntzin tjapin tuˈn , tzeˈnkuxjo yolajtz tiˈja ojtxe toj tbˈi qMan Dios .

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: Quˈn ilaˈ ma chi kubˈ tzˈaq toj kynimbˈil , tuˈn mi ẍi ok lipe kyiˈjjo lo ,

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: tzeˈnku ma bˈaj te Himeneo ex Lejantr , ayeˈ o chex nqˈoˈn tjaqˈ tkawbˈil tajaw il , a satanás , tuˈntzin tajtz tiˈj kyanmin , ex tuˈn mi chi yolbˈine tiˈj qMan Dios .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , kxel woqxeniˈn tey , tuˈn kykubˈsin kywutza tukˈa naˈj Dios tiˈj tkyaqil xjal , ex tuˈn kyyolin tukˈa Dios kyiˈj , tukˈa nim aqˈbˈil chjonte te ;

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: ex tuˈn kynaˈn Dios kyiˈjjo tkyaqil nejinel ex jniˈ kawil , tuˈntzintla qbˈet toj tumil , ex tukˈa jun bˈaˈn nukˈbˈil , ex tuˈn tajtz tiˈj qanmin twutz Dios , ex tuˈntzin qok tzˈaqlexix toj tkyaqil .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Quˈn tbˈanilxjo luˈn , ex ntzalaj Dios , a Klolqe te jun majx , tiˈj .

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Quˈn atzin taj Diosjo tuˈn kyklet ‑ xjal kykyaqil , ex tuˈn tel kynikyˈ tiˈjjo a twutzxix .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Quˈn junchˈin Dios at ; ex junchˈin ichin yolil kyiˈjxjal twutz Dios , aku Jesucrist ,

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: a xi qˈoˈnte tibˈ te kyimin te chojbˈilte qil , tzeˈnkuxjo otaq chikyˈbˈajtz tuˈn qMan Dios toj tqˈijil , tuˈn tkotpit tkyaqil xjal tuˈn .

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , ma tzaj qˈoˈn wokliˈn , tuˈn nyoliˈn tiˈjjo tzaqpibˈl lo , ex ma chin oka te tsanjil qMan , tuˈn kyxnaqˈtzitjo aye nya Judiyqe tiˈjjo nimbˈil , a twutzxix . Twutzxix weˈy ; nya noq nja bˈant wuˈn .

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Waja tuˈn kynaˈnxjal Dios tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ . Ex aj tja kyiˈn kyqˈobˈ twutz qMan toj kynaˈn Dios , kybˈinchim tukˈa kyanmin saqxix , nya tukˈa qˈoj , ex nya tukˈa yolbˈil tiˈj juntl .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Ex waja tuˈn tok kyoksin qya kyxbˈalin tbˈanilx ex toj tumil , me nya noq tuˈn tjaw kynimin kyibˈ kywutzxjal , qalaˈ tukˈa jun mutxsbˈil ; nya tuˈn tjax kyqˈoˈn txqan tiˈ toj kywiˈ tuˈn tqoptzˈaj , noq tuˈn kykaˈyinxjal kyiˈj , ex tuˈn mina tzˈok kyqˈoˈn kyxbˈalin ntzˈiltzˈin tukˈa taˈl qˈanpwaq , ex tuˈn mina tzˈokx kyqˈoˈn kyu noq tal abˈj nqopin wen ,

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: qalaˈ tukˈa kybˈinchbˈin bˈaˈn tzeˈnkux ntene tuˈn jun qya nimil tiˈj qMan Dios .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Ayejo qya , aj kyok toj xnaqˈtzbˈil tiˈj Tyol qMan toj tja Ttanim Dios , bˈaˈn tuˈn kykubˈ nume , ex tuˈn mutxin kyten .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Mi chin qˈoˈn qya xnaqˈtzbˈil kyibˈaj ichin , ex nya tuˈn kykawin kyibˈaj . Qalaˈ , noq tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈiˈn , ex nya tuˈn kychˈotj .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Quˈn ate Adán bˈant nej tuˈn Dios , exsin kubˈ bˈinchinxilte Eva .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Ex nya te Adán kubˈ sbˈuˈn tuˈn tajaw il , qalaˈ a teqya . Ex tej tkubˈ sbˈuˈn , bˈeˈx i ok aj il .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Me kkletil te qya te tkyaqil tiˈ , qa ma kubˈ ten toj tja , ex qa ma tzˈok tqˈoˈnxix tilil tuˈn tjapin bˈaj tuˈn , tzeˈnkux jun tbˈanil txubˈaj kyxol tal , ex tukˈa tnimbˈil , ex tukˈa tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj , tuˈntzin tten saqxix wen .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Twutzxix te luˈn : Qa at jun nimil taj tuˈn tok te nejinel kyxol nimil , tbˈanilxjo t ‑ xim ikyjo .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Me il tiˈj nej tuˈn tbˈet tojxix tumil , tuˈn ntiˈ jun xjal yolbˈin tiˈj , ex junchˈin t ‑ xuˈjil , jikyinxix toj tchwinqil , ex tzyuˈn tibˈ tiˈj tkyaqil nya bˈaˈn , ex nkubˈ nimin kyuˈnxjal , bˈaˈn xkˈamin kyiˈjxjal toj tja , at ‑ xix tnabˈl tuˈn t ‑ xnaqˈtzin ,

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: ex nya txˈujtinel , ex nya bˈujil , qalaˈ wen , ex cheˈwxix tanmin , ex nya xoˈnk tkˈuˈj tiˈj pwaq .

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: Ex bˈaˈn kawin toj tja , bˈaˈn chi nimin tkˈwal tukˈa mutxbˈil .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Quˈn qa mibˈin kawin toj tja , ¿ Tzeˈntzin ttentz aj tbˈant tkawin tibˈaj Ttanim Dios ?

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , nya wen tuˈn tok jun aˈla te nejinel , qa aˈkxtaq tnimin , quˈn aku ja tnimin tibˈ , ex tuˈn ikyjo , aku kubˈ tzˈaq tjaqˈ tqanbˈil Dios , tzeˈnkuˈ bˈaj teˈ a ok te tajaw il ojtxe .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Ex il tiˈj tuˈn tnimajtz kyuˈnxjal nya nimilqe , noq tuˈn nbˈet toj tumil , tuˈntzin mi tzˈele toj ttxˈixew , ex tuˈn mi kubˈ tzˈaq toj tqˈobˈ tajaw il .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Ex ikyxjo kye mojil , tuˈn tok jun kyoklin , il tiˈj nej tuˈn kybˈet toj tumil , tuˈntzin kynimajtz kyuˈn txqantl , nya noq tuˈn kymeltzˈaje tukˈa kyyol , ex nya txˈujtinelqe , ex nya tuˈn kykanbˈin jun pwaq , a nya toj tumil .

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: Ex il tiˈj tuˈn tkubˈ kynimin a t ‑ xilin qnimbˈil , nya tukˈa kabˈe kykˈuˈj .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Me il tiˈj tuˈn kyok kaˈyit nej , ex qa ntiˈ chˈin kykyˈi , bˈaˈn tuˈn kyok te mojil toj Ttanim Dios .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Ex aye qya , a mojilqe , il tiˈj tuˈn kybˈet toj tumil , tuˈn kynimajtz kyuˈn txqantl , ex nya iqil yolqe , qalaˈ mutxin kyten , ex tzˈaqleqe toj tkyaqil .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Ex ikyqexjo , aye ichin mojilqe , junxchˈin kyxuˈjil tuˈn tten , ex il tiˈj tuˈn tten jun bˈaˈn kawbˈil toj kyja kyxol kykˈwal .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Quˈn ayetziˈn mojil njapin kyaqˈin tojxix tumil , bˈaˈn kchi elile toj kywutzxjal , ex tukˈa tkyaqil tqˈuqbˈil kykˈuˈj , kxel kyqˈmaˈn kynimbˈil tiˈj Crist , a Jesús .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Nchin bˈisiˈn tuˈn nxiˈy lol tey , me qa ẍin weˈtaqkuy , kxeˈl ntzˈibˈinjiˈy uˈj luˈn tey , tuˈn tel tnikyˈa te , tzeˈn tuˈn kybˈeteˈ jniˈ xjal toj Ttanim Dios , a Dios itzˈxix . Ex a Ttanim tzyul teˈ yol , a twutzxix , ex nbˈet tzeˈnkuxjo ntzaj t ‑ xnaqˈtzin , tuˈntzin kyok te yekˈilte Dios kywutzxjal .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , bˈiˈnxix quˈn , qa nimxix t ‑ xilin qnimbˈil , ikyxjo tzeˈnku nqqˈmaˈn : Tzaj tyekˈin Dios tibˈ qe noq tuˈn Jesús , a Tkˈwal , tej tok te xjal . Ex tzaj tchikyˈbˈin Xewbˈaj Xjan qa twutzx , qa a Diosjo ; ex iwle kyuˈn angel . O yolajtz kyexjal tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ , ex nim xjal o nimin tiˈj . Ex jax qˈiˈn toj kyaˈj , jaˈ nqoptzˈaje qMan Dios te jun majx .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Twutzxix ntqˈmaˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan , qa aj chˈixtaq tjapin bˈaj tqˈijil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , at junjun kyjel ttzaqpiˈn tnimbˈil , tuˈn t ‑ xi lipe kyiˈj taqˈnil tajaw il , tukˈa kyxnaqˈtzbˈil , a noq te sbˈuˈbˈl .

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Kxel kybˈiˈn kyyol xmiletzˈ , a nya twutzx chi yolin , ex mi naˈn kyuˈn a wen exjo nya wen , quˈn ajo kynabˈl ntiˈ tajbˈin , nyakuj ma tzˈeˈy tuˈn jun kyaq kxbˈil .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Ex n ‑ el kyikyˈin mejebˈlin , ex n ‑ el kyikyˈin junjun tiˈ , a tchˈiysbˈin Dios , a wen tuˈn t ‑ xi qnikyˈbˈin te jun tzaljbˈil te qe , ex tuˈn t ‑ xi qqˈoˈn chjonte te Dios , a awo ma qo nimin tiˈjjo yol twutzxix .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Quˈn tkyaqiljo tchˈiysbˈin Dios wen teˈ . Ex ntiˈ tumil tuˈn tel qikyˈin ; quˈn qa ma txi qqˈoˈn chjonte te Dios tiˈj , kˈwel tkyˈiwlin Dios tkyaqil .

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: Quˈn kyjel saqixjo jniˈ luˈn tuˈn Tyol qMan , tej tkyij tzˈibˈit ojtxe qa wen tkyaqil , ex tuˈn qnaˈbˈl Dios te aqˈbˈil chjonte te .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Qatzin qa ma txi t ‑ xnaqˈtzinjiy anetziˈn kye nimil , tbˈanil aqˈnilpetzintza te qAjaw Jesucrist , ex nojnin tuˈn yol nimin quˈn , a tbˈanil xnaqˈtzbˈil , ma tzˈok lipey tiˈj .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Ikyˈimiljiy tkyaqil kyyolxjal nya tumil , ex jniˈ kylaˈjxjal , a nya bˈaˈn . Qalaˈ qˈonka tilil , tuˈn tajbˈin te Dios .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Quˈn qa ma tzˈok qqˈoˈn ipbˈil tiˈjjo qxmilil , at chˈin tajbˈin . Exsin ikyx teˈ qa ma tzˈok qqˈoˈn ipbˈil tuˈn qajbˈin te Dios , nimxix tajbˈin te chwinqil tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , ex te chwinqil te jun majx toj kyaˈj .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Twutzxixjo yol kxel nqˈmaˈn , ex bˈaˈn tuˈn tnimajtz kyuˈn tkyaqilxjal .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Nqo aqˈnin ex n ‑ ikyˈx yasbˈil quˈn , noq tuˈn tpajjo yol luˈn : Qˈuqlek qkˈuˈj tiˈjjo Dios itzˈ , a Klol tkyaqil xjal , ayeˈ kchi nimil tiˈj .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Atziˈn luˈn atzin qˈmanxjiy , ex xnaqˈtzinxa kye kykyaqil .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Ex mi kubˈ tbˈinchiˈn tzeˈn kye txqantl kuˈxin , tuˈntzin mi tzˈele ikyˈiniˈy kyuˈnxjal . Qalaˈ tzˈokxa jun yekˈbˈil kywutz tkyaqil : Tuˈn tbˈeta toj tumil tukˈa tyola , tukˈa tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈja , tukˈa tnimbˈila , ex tukˈa tchwinqila saqxix .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: A naˈmxtaq nkaniˈn , jaˈkx n ‑ uˈjin Tyol Dios kywutzxjal , tuˈn t ‑ xi tqˈoˈn tumil kye , ex tuˈn kyxi t ‑ xnaqˈtziˈn .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Mi kubˈ tyajinjiy tokliˈn ma txi tqˈoˈn qMan Dios , tej xkubˈ kyqˈoˈn nejinel toj Ttanim Dios kyqˈobˈ tibˈaja , tuˈn toka te kyikˈlel , quˈn ikykuxtaq taj Diosjo .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Qˈonkxixa tililjo lo , tuˈntzin tok kykaˈyinxjal , qa te Dios tkyaqiljo a nkubˈ tbˈinchiˈn .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Ex kaˈyinkxix tibˈa tuˈn tbˈeta , ex tuˈn t ‑ xnaqˈtziˈn tukˈa tumil . Weˈkuxixa toj tkyaqil . Quˈn qa ma bˈant ikyjo tuˈn , ok kletila exqetziˈn nchi bˈiˈn tiˈja .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Mi chi ok tmiyonjiy xjal ma chi tijin , qalaˈ chebˈe xmoxinqeka nyakuqexitlaj ttatiy ex tnaniy . Ex ikyqexjo kuˈxin qˈa , nyakutlaj titzˈinqiy ; ex ikyqexjo txin nyakutlaj tanebˈqiy . Mi kubˈ tbˈinchin jun nya bˈaˈn kyiˈj , tuˈntzin mix aˈl jun jaw yolbˈin tiˈja .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Oninqexjiy qya , a o kyim kychmil , ex mix aˈl jun itzˈ kyiˈj .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Me qa iteˈ kyal mo iteˈ kychman , ayetzin at iltzjo kyiˈj , tuˈn kyok kykaˈyin kynana mo kytata ex jniˈ kybˈaj toj kyja , noq tuˈn tok kybˈinchin t ‑ xeljo jaˈ ẍi tzaje chˈiye , quˈn atziˈn anetziˈn tbˈanilx twutz qMan Dios .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Me ayetziˈn qya , a o chi kyim kychmil , ex o chi kyij toj mebˈeyil , qˈuqlek kykˈuˈj tiˈj Dios , ex mi tzˈel najx toj kykˈuˈj tuˈn kynaˈn Dios qˈijl ex qnikyˈin .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: Me anteˈ mebˈe , a kˈwel tqˈon tibˈ , tuˈn tbˈinchin tzeˈnkux ntqanin t ‑ xmilil , ma naj twutz Dios .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Qˈmanxa kye nimil tkyaqiljo luˈn , tuˈntzin mi chi yolbˈajtz kyuˈnxjal .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: Quˈn qa mi ẍi ok kykaˈyin kybˈaj toj kyja , mapen chi oktz manyor aj ilx , tzeˈnqeku nya nimil .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Tojjo kyajlal qya mebˈe , oˈkqex kˈwelix kybˈi aye ma japin ox kˈal abˈqˈe kyuˈn , ex qa ma japin mejebˈlin kyuˈn :

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: Qa bˈaˈn jniˈ kybˈinchbˈin , qa ma chi ja kychˈiysin kyal toj wen , ex bˈaˈn nchi xkˈamin kyiˈjxjal toj kyja , ex qa o tzˈel kytxjoˈn tiˈj kyqan nimil , ex qa nchi mojin kyiˈjjo a nim n ‑ ikyˈx kyuˈn , ex kukx n ‑ ok tilil kyuˈn , tuˈn kybˈinchinte tkyaqiljo wen .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: Me mi kux tzˈibˈit kybˈi qya , a kuˈxinqe , a o kyim kychmil , quˈn aku chi ja meje juntl majl tukˈa jun ichin nya nimil , mo aku tzˈel kypaˈn kyibˈ tiˈj Crist , noq tuˈn tajbˈil kyxmilil .

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: Ex tuˈn ikyjo , ayex kchi kˈwelix qˈoˈn te kyil twutz Dios , quˈn k ‑ elil kypaˈn kyibˈ toj kynimbˈil tiˈj Crist .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Ex noqittzin oˈkxtzjo , qalaˈ noq nchi bˈeteje ttziyile ja , ex nchi el kyˈaj , ex nchi bˈaj iqin yol , ex nbˈaj okx kylimon kyibˈ toj tkyaqil , ex nchi bˈaj yolin tiˈjjo ntiˈ kyaj tiˈj .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , wajatlaˈy tuˈn kymejeˈ qya kuˈxinqex , aye o chi kyim tnejil kychmil , tuˈntzintla kyul kyal , ex tuˈn tbˈant kykawin toj kyja , ex tuˈn mi txi kyqˈoˈne ambˈil te tajaw il , tuˈn kyyolinxjal nya bˈaˈn tiˈj qnimbˈil noq tuˈn kypaj .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Quˈn at junjun qya mebˈe ma tzˈel kypaˈn kyibˈ tuˈn kyxi lipe tiˈj tajaw il .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Qa at jun qya nimil at juntl qya toj tja , a o kyim tchmil , bˈaˈn tuˈn t ‑ xi tmojin , tuˈn mi tzˈoke te tkˈaˈch Ttanim Dios ; tuˈntzin tonin Ttanim Dios kyiˈjjo qya , a o kyim kychmil , ayeˈ ntiˈx jun itzˈ kyiˈj .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Aye nejinel , a ma bˈant ‑ xix kykawin toj tumil toj Ttanim Dios , bˈaˈntla tuˈn t ‑ xiˈ jun onbˈil nimxix kyexixpetlaˈ ayeˈ ma txi kyqˈoˈnx kyibˈ tuˈn kyyolin ex tuˈn kyxnaqˈtzin tiˈj Tyol Dios .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Quˈn ntqˈmaˈn Tyol Dios : Mi tzˈok kykˈloˈn ttxaˈn wakx , qa nwaˈbˈin triych . Ex ikyxjo ntqˈmaˈn : Jun aqˈnil at toklin tuˈn t ‑ xi chjet twiˈ tkˈuˈjch .

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Ex mi txi tqˈoˈn ambˈil te jun patbˈil tuˈn jun xjal tiˈj jun nejinel toj Ttanim Dios , qa mix aˈl jun mo kabˈe xlonte .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Me ayetzin nejinel tzunx nchi bˈinchin il , bˈaˈn tuˈn kyxi kawit kywutz txqantl , tuˈntzin kyxobˈjo txqantl .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Kxel woqxeninxixa teˈy twutz qMan Dios , ex twutz Klolqe Jesucrist ex kywutz jniˈ angel , ayeˈ skˈoˈnqexix tuˈn Dios , tuˈn junx tuˈn teleˈ nukˈbˈil lo kyiˈj kykyaqil , aˈlchaqx kyetz .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Mi kubˈ tqˈoˈn tqˈobˈa jun paqx tibˈaj jun aˈla tuˈn tok te nejinel toj Ttanim Dios , qa naˈmxtaq tok tkaˈyin tbˈinchbˈin . Quˈn yajtzilaˈ , qa nyataqku wen tbˈinchbˈin , ajin kxel bˈlen toj til . Qalaˈ kaˈyinkxix tibˈa wen .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Tuˈn noqx nstzˈuyin tkˈuˈja ex teˈ yabˈil ma tzˈok lemtzˈaj tiˈja , mi txi tkˈwaˈn junxte aˈ , qalaˈ kˈwanxa chˈin vin te qˈanbˈilte .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: At junjun xjal n ‑ el tnikyˈtzajil liwey qa aj ilqe . Me ex at junjuntl tzmaxiˈ k ‑ elil tnikyˈtzajiljo , aj tok toj xjelbˈil tuˈn qAjaw .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Exsin ikyxjo jniˈ qbˈinchbˈin wen , qˈanchaˈl kywutz kykyaqil . Ex aye nya qˈanchaˈl kyuˈnxjal , ex nlay tzˈewit te jun majx .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Tkyaqiljo nimil , ayeˈ ma chi ok te aqˈnil te jun majx , il tiˈj tuˈn tkubˈ kynimin tajaw aqˈuntl toj tkyaqil , tuˈntzintla mi chi yolbˈinxjal tiˈj tbˈi qMan Dios ex tiˈjjo qxnaqˈtzbˈil .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Ex qa at jun tajaw aqˈuntl nimil , mi kubˈ kybˈisin aqˈnil qa noq tuˈn kyerman kyibˈ mi chi kubˈ kynimin , qalaˈ noqpe kyja chi kyniminku wen , ex chi ajbˈinxix kye , quˈn nchi ajbˈin kyex nimil , ayeˈ kˈuˈjlinqexix kyuˈn . Atzin luˈn , Timotey , xnaqˈtzinxa , ex qˈonxa tumil kye .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Qa at jun xjal nxnaqˈtzin jun tumil nya twutzx , qa mikyxiˈ tzeˈnku tbˈanil xnaqˈtzbˈil tuˈn qAjaw Jesucrist , ex qa mikyxiˈ tzeˈnku ntyekˈin qnimbˈil ;

text: He is proud , knowing nothing , but doting about questions and strifes of words , whereof cometh envy , strife , railings , evil surmisings ,
text2: jun xjal ikyjo jun nimil tibˈ ex ntiˈx chˈin n ‑ el tnikyˈ te . Oˈkx tajjo tuˈn tyasin ex tuˈn tyolbˈin , ex atziˈn anetziˈn ikytzin tzeˈnku jun yabˈil , ma tzˈok lemtzˈaj tiˈj . Quˈn antza ntzaje loˈchj kˈuˈjbˈaj , jniˈ jyoj qˈoj , ex tkyaqil ikyˈbˈil ex yasbˈil ,

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: ex tkyaqil bˈujin , a mi nbˈajx kyxolxjal , ayeˈ xjal ma tzeˈl naj kynabˈl ; mi n ‑ el kynikyˈ te yol twutzx . Toj kywutz a qnimbˈil n ‑ ajbˈin noq tuˈn kyqˈinimix .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: Twutzx teˈ qa at jun qˈinimil tuˈnjo qnimbˈil , a tuˈn qtzalaj tiˈjjo chˈin , a at qe .

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: Quˈn ntiˈx chˈinqe qˈiˈn quˈn , teˈ xqo ul itzˈje twutz txˈotxˈ , ex ntiˈx chˈin k ‑ ajil qiˈn , aj qkyim .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: Me noq qa at telix qqˈij , ex qa at qxbˈalin , qo tzalaj tukˈa ikyjo .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: Me ayetzin kyeˈ kyaj tuˈn kyqˈinimix tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ . Aj ttzaj jun tiˈ kyiˈj , bˈeˈx nchi kubˈ tzˈaq toj il , ex bˈeˈx nkubˈ kysbˈuˈn kyibˈ tuˈn kyajbˈil , a nya tumil , ex ax n ‑ ok meltzˈajjo qˈol mibˈin kyiˈj , tuˈn kyxi toljx toj najin te jun majx .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Quˈn qa ma tzˈok qxoˈn qkˈuˈj tiˈj pwaq , nya bˈaˈn , quˈn antza ntzaj anqˈin tkyaqiljo wiq nya bˈaˈn . Quˈn at junjun ma txi lipe kyanmin tiˈj pwaq , ex noq tuˈn tpajjo ikyjo , ma chi el txalpaj toj kynimbˈil , ex ayex ma chi ok qˈonte kyixkˈoj kyiˈjx .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: Me atzin te , ma tzˈoka jun ichin te Dios . Tuˈnpetziˈn , tzaqpinkjiy tkyaqil anetziˈn , ex weˈkuxixa jikyin toj tchwinqila , toj tbˈinchbˈiˈn bˈaˈn , toj tnimbˈila , toj tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈja , ex kukx tuˈn tayoˈn tajbˈil qMan toj tkyaqil , ex mutxinku tten .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Tzˈok tilil tuˈn , tuˈn tjapin bˈajjo taqˈin qMan Dios toj tnimbˈila . Ex kukxit tzaj tnaˈnjiy tkabˈ tchwinqila , quˈn tuˈnpetziˈn o txokliˈy tuˈn Dios tiˈj , tej tqˈmaˈy , ex tej tkubˈ tyekˈin tnimibˈila kywutz nimku xjal .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
text2: Kxel woqxeninxixa jaˈlin twutz qMan Dios , a tzaj qˈol chwinqil te tkyaqil , ex twutz Klolqe Jesucrist , a tqˈma te jun yekˈbˈil twutz Poncio Pilat qa twutzxixjo Tyol :

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Niminkujiy a nxi nqˈmaˈn teˈy , tuˈn tkubˈ tbˈinchiˈn , ex mi jaw ttxˈixpiˈn , tuˈntzintla ntiˈx jun tiˈ tuˈn t ‑ xi kawita tiˈj . Bˈinchima ikyjo , tzmaxiˈ ajxi tul juntl majl qAjaw Jesucrist .

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: Kjapin bˈaj tkyaqiljo lo tuˈn Dios tojxix tqˈijil , quˈn oˈkx te Diosjo junchˈin at ; kyˈiwlinxix tbˈi , ex nim toklin te Kawil , quˈn a Kawil tibˈaj tkyaqil kawil , ex a tAjaw Tkyaqil tibˈaj tkyaqil tajaw .

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: Quˈn oˈkx Diosjo nlay bˈaj , ex najle toj tkyaqil tqoptzˈajiyil , a mix aˈlx aku tzˈoksin tkˈatz . Mix aˈl jun o lonte , ex mix aˈl jun aku kaˈyinte . Oˈkx te Dios at tkyaqil toklin ex jniˈ tipin jaˈlin ex te jun majx . Ikyxitjo .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Ayetziˈn at kyqˈinimil twutzjo txˈotxˈ tzaluˈn , qˈmanxa kye tuˈn mi ja kynimin kyibˈ , ex tuˈn mi tzˈoke qe kykˈuˈj tiˈjjo kyqˈinimil , quˈn nya kukx teˈ tten . Qalaˈ oˈkx tuˈn tok qe kykˈuˈj tiˈj Dios , a nimxix ntzaj tqˈoˈn qe , tuˈn qtzalaj tiˈj .

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: Ex qˈmaˈnxa kye tuˈn tkubˈ kybˈinchiˈn wen , ex tuˈn kyok te soˈj .

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: Quˈn tukˈaˈ ikyjo , kxel kyxikybˈin jun qˈinimil te jun majx toj kyaˈj , ex jun chwinqil , a mixla jtojx tuˈn tbˈaj .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: Timotey , qˈonka tililjo a ma kyij oqxenit teˈy . Ex mi txi tbˈinjiy kyyolxjal , a ntiˈ tajbˈin , exsin jniˈ nkyqˈmaˈnxjal , a nyakuj manyor tumil .

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Quˈn iteˈ junjun nchi yolin ikyjo , me ayeˈ o chi el txalpaj tiˈj kynimbˈil . Noq a Dios tzaj qˈoˈnte t ‑ xtalbˈil tibˈaja .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: Ayiˈn Pabl , jun tsanjil Jesucrist ; chqˈoˈnqiˈn tuˈn tajbˈil qMan Dios , ikyxjo tzeˈnku bˈantnin tiˈj tuˈn , tiˈjjo tkabˈ qchwinqil noq tuˈn s ‑ ok qmujbˈin qibˈ tukˈa Crist , a Jesús .

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Nxi ntzˈibˈinjiˈy uˈj lo tey , a ay Timotey , nyakuj nkˈwala , kˈuˈjlinxixa wuˈn . Noqit ax qMan Dios ex qAjaw Jesucrist tzaj qˈoˈnte t ‑ xtalbˈil , ex qˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj , ex jun nukˈbˈil toj tkyaqil tibˈaja .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Timotey , tzeˈnku nchin naˈn Dios , ntzaj nnaˈn te toj nnaˈj Diosa qˈijl ex qnikyˈin , ex kukx nchin qˈonjiˈy chjonte te qMan , quˈn tuˈn nchin ajbˈiˈn te tukˈa jun nnabˈla saqxix , ikyxjo tzeˈn ẍi ajbˈin ojtxe nxeˈchila .

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: Nimxix waja tuˈn tok nkaˈyiˈn juntl majl , ex tuˈn njaw ntzalaja wen tiˈja , quˈn tzunx ntzaj nnaˈnjiˈy , tzeˈnku tej tel qpaˈn qibˈ tukˈiy , quˈn ex ox tzˈoqˈxa wen wiˈja .

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Quˈn kubˈ nnaˈnjiˈy tnimbˈila jikyinxix wen , tzeˈnku te tyayin , a tnejil nimil toj tjaˈy , a Loida , exsin te tnaniy , Eunice . Ex qˈuqlexix nkˈuˈja tiˈja , qa ikyx taˈ tejiy tnimbˈil .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , nxi nnaˈnxixjiˈy luˈn teˈy , tuˈn tja tiˈn tibˈa wen , ex tuˈn mi tzˈel tyajinjiy tokliˈn , a ma tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios , tej tkubˈ nqˈoˈn nqˈobˈa tibˈaja , tuˈn toka te jun nejinel toj Ttanim Dios .

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: Quˈn nya jun xewbˈaj te xobˈajil ma tzaj tqˈon Dios teˈy , qalaˈ a Xewbˈaj Xjan , a xi tqˈon teˈy nim tipin , nim tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj , ex nim toklin tuˈn tbˈant ttzyuˈnte tibˈa wen .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Tuˈntzintzjo , Timotey , mi tzaj txˈixwiˈy tuˈn tyolin tbˈi qAjaw , ex mi tzaj txˈixwiˈy tuˈn ma chin kux jpuˈn toj tze noq tuˈn tpaj . Ex ikyxjo te , kˈaˈ tzikyˈx tuˈn , jniˈ yajbˈil tzul toj tchwinqila , noq tuˈn tpajjo Tbˈanil Tqanil qMan Dios , quˈn ex ax ktzajil qˈonte tipin toj tkyaqil .

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Quˈn ma qo klet tuˈn , ex ikytzin ma qo ttxok , tuˈn qok te tzˈaqle twutz , nya tuˈnxjo qbˈinchbˈin , qalaˈ ikyxtaq t ‑ ximjo atxix ojtxe , tej naˈmxtaq tkubˈ xkye twutz txˈotxˈ , qa tuˈntaqx ttzaj tchqˈoˈn Crist , a Jesús , noq tuˈn t ‑ xtalbˈil .

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: Ex o tzaj tyekˈin tqˈaqˈbˈil tkˈuˈj qe , teˈ tul Jesucrist , a Kolil , a kubˈ tiˈj kyimin tuˈn . Ex tuˈn Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , ma tzaj tqˈoˈn jun chwinqil qe , a mixla jtojx tuˈn tbˈaj .

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: Ma chin jaw tskˈoˈn Dios te yolil teˈ Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil anetziˈn , ex te tsanjil , ex te xnaqˈtzil .

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: Ex noq tuˈn tpajjo lo , n ‑ ikyˈx jniˈ nya bˈaˈn wuˈn . Me ex nlay chin tzaj txˈixwiˈy te luˈn , quˈn ma tzˈel nnikyˈa teˈ Jesús , a ma txi nnimiˈn , ex qˈuqlek nkˈuˈja tiˈj , qa at tipin tuˈn tnaˈyit , ex tuˈn tkˈuyitjo tkyaqiljo ma txi woqxeniˈn te , ajxi tjapin tqˈijil .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Lipektzin tiˈj tkyaqiljo xnaqˈtzbˈil ma txi nyekˈiˈn tey ; ex tuˈn tokin te jun yekˈbˈil tiˈj qnimbˈil , ex tiˈj tqˈaqˈbˈil qkˈuˈj , noq tuˈn qmujbˈil qibˈ tukˈa Crist , a Jesús .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Ex tukˈa onbˈil tuˈn Xewbˈaj Xjan toj qanmin , niminkutzinjiy tbˈanil xnaqˈtzbˈil , a ma kyij woqxeniˈn teˈy .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Bˈiˈnl tuˈn , qa jniˈ erman toj txˈotxˈ te Asia ma chin kyij kytzaqpiˈn , tzeˈnku Figelo ex Hermógenes .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: Noqxit ax qMan Dios tzaj qˈaqˈin tkˈuˈj tiˈj Onesíforo kyukˈa tbˈaj toj tja . Quˈn ilaˈku maj , ul qˈuqbˈil nkˈuˈja , ex mix tzaje txˈixwe , tuˈn jpuˈnqinkuxa toj tze noq tuˈn tpaj taqˈin Dios .

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: Qalaˈ noqx teˈ tkaninku Rom , ok ten pitkˈajil wiˈja , tzmaxiˈ tej nknet ‑ xa tuˈn .

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: Noqxit ax qAjaw tzaj qˈaqˈin tkˈuˈj tiˈj tojjo tqˈijil , aj tul juntl majl , ex ajinkuy bˈilte jniˈxsin xmojin qukˈa , tej otoˈxtaq tojjo tnam Éfeso .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ay Timotey , tzeˈnku jun nkˈwala , qˈinks tibˈa tuˈn xtalbˈil tzaj tqˈoˈn teˈy tuˈn Dios , tuˈn tmujbˈil tibˈa tukˈa Crist , a Jesús .

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: Nchin kubˈsin nwutza tey , tzeˈnkuxjo o tzˈok tbˈiˈn wiˈja , tej nyoliˈn kywutz txqan xjal , axsin kxel woqxeninjiˈy jaˈlin kye xjal , ayeˈ at tqˈuqbˈil tkˈuˈja kyiˈj , tuˈn kyok te xnaqˈtzil kye txqantl .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Tzikyˈxsin tuˈn toj aqˈuntl , tzeˈnku jun xoˈl qˈaqˈ , quˈn ma tzˈoka te jun xoˈl qˈaqˈ te Crist , a Jesús .

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
text2: Quˈn ntiˈ jun xoˈl qˈaqˈ nxiˈ jyol juntl aqˈuntl , qa tokx te xoˈl qˈaqˈ , quˈn ex nlay tzˈel wen toj twutzjo a nejinel .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Ex ikyxjo tzeˈn jun rinil , nlay kanbˈin jun chojbˈil , qa mi s ‑ ok tqˈoˈn tilil , tuˈn tjapin tuˈn , tzeˈnkuxjo nukˈbˈil .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Ex ikyxjo tzeˈnku jun aqˈnil toj kojbˈil , il tiˈj nej tuˈn tok tqˈoˈn tilil taqˈin , tuˈn tjaw tchmoˈn yajxi twutz tawal .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: Ximinkuxixa wen tiˈj tkyaqiljo lo , ex ax qAjaw ktzajil qˈoˈnte tumil , tuˈn tel tnikyˈa te .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: Ex naˈnkuy t ‑ xilin Jesucrist ; ax Dios , quˈn jatz anqˈin kyxol kyimnin , ex ok te ichin , quˈn tzajnin tiˈj tyajil qtzan nmaq kawil David . Atzin Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈiljo lo , a nxi nyoliˈn .

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: Ex tuˈn tpajjo Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil , nim yajbˈil n ‑ ikyˈx wuˈn , nyakuj tzeˈn jun ileqˈ , kˈloˈnqiˈn tuˈn kxbˈil tzaluˈn toj tze . Me metzin teˈ Tyol qMan Dios nlay kˈlet teˈ , qalaˈ lu teˈ nchˈiy wen tkyaqil twutz txˈotxˈ .

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , n ‑ ikyˈx tkyaqiljo luˈn wuˈn , tuˈn kypajjo ayeˈ ma chi jaw tskˈoˈn qMan Dios , ex tuˈntzin kyklet tuˈn Crist , a Jesús , ex tuˈn kyxiˈ tukˈa toj tqoptzˈajiyil kyaˈj te jun majx .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Twutzxixjo yol , a qˈumle kyjaluˈn : Qa o qo kyim tukˈa tiˈj il tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ , ex qo jawil anqˈin juntl majl tukˈa te jun majx .

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: Ex qa ma tzikyˈx quˈn , qo kawil junx tukˈa toj kyaˈj . Qa ma tzˈel qikyˈin , ex ikyxjo qo elil tikyˈin .

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Ex qa at jun xkyij ttzaqpiˈn tnimbˈil , me mete Crist kukx te tten te jun majx , ex nlay bˈant tuˈn tkyij ttzaqpiˈn Tyol , a tuˈn tqˈon jun chojbˈil teˈyila junjun tzeˈnkux tbˈinchbˈin , exla qa te tkyˈiwbˈil qibˈaj mo minaj , quˈn nlay ja ttxˈixpin Tyol , a o tqˈma .

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: Naˈnxjiy luˈn kye nimil , ex qˈonxa kynabˈl toj tbˈi Dios , tuˈn mi chi ja chˈotje kyiˈjjo yol ex xnaqˈtzbˈil , a ntiˈ tumil . Quˈn atzin chˈotjbˈil ntiˈ tajbˈin , quˈn ayetzin nchi bˈin tiˈj , noq kyjaˈ nchi jaw naje .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
text2: Qˈonka tilil tuˈn toka tzeˈnku jun aqˈnil tbˈanil twutz qMan Dios , tuˈntzin ntiˈ tuˈn ttzaj txˈixwiˈy tiˈjjo taqˈnbˈiˈn . Qalaˈ , yekˈimjiy Tyol tzeˈnkux tten .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: Ikyˈimilijiy jniˈ kyyolxjal , a nya wen , quˈn ayetziˈn xjal nchi yolin ikyjo , noqx ipin kyxiˈ toj il .

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: Ex atzin kyxnaqˈtzbˈil ikyjo tzeˈnku jun yabˈil qxol , a chebˈe nxi lemimin , ex aku qo kyim tuˈn . Atzin xbˈajjo tukˈa t ‑ xnaqˈtzbˈil Himeneo exsin Fileto ,

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: quˈn ma chi el txalpaj toj kynimbˈil . Nkyqˈmaˈn qa mi qo jaw anqˈin juntl majl kyxol kyimnin tukˈax qxmilil , qalaˈ o bˈaj teˈ toj qanmin , chi chiˈ . Tuˈntzintzjo luˈn , ma chi ok ten meltzˈil tumil , tuˈn kyjaw naj junjun toj kynimbˈil .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Me ate Dios o kubˈ qˈoˈnte tqˈuqiljo Ttanim , a nlay yekj , quˈn ate Dios o kujsin teˈ kabˈe Tyol lo : Tnejil , tojtzqiˈnqexix te Diosjo , aye o chi ok te te ; ex tkabˈ ; kykyaqiljo o chi nimin tiˈj , il tiˈj tuˈn tel kypaˈn kyibˈ tiˈj il .

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Ikytziˈn tzeˈnku toj tja jun qˈinin , at laq tbˈanilxix wen , bˈinchin tukˈa qˈanpwaq ex saqpwaq , ex at junjun bˈinchin tukˈa tze ex junjun tukˈa tzˈaqbˈaj txˈotxˈ . At junjun nimxix toklin ex at junjun a mina .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Ikyxsin otoˈke tzeˈn kye laq : Qa qaj tuˈn ttzaj qˈoˈn qoklin tbˈanil tuˈn qMan Dios , il tiˈj tuˈn tel qpaˈn qibˈ tiˈj tkyaqil nya bˈaˈn , tuˈntzintla qajbˈin te Dios toj tkyaqiljo wen .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: Tuˈnpetziˈn , ku tel oqa te tkyaqiljo achbˈil kye kuˈxin nya wen , ex lipeka tiˈjjo a tzˈaqlexix , ex tiˈj tnimbˈila , tkˈuˈjbˈila , ex tmujbˈil tibˈa junx kyukˈa aye nchi nimsin tbˈi Dios tukˈa kyanmin saqxix .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: Mi tzˈok tbˈinjiy jniˈ chˈotjbˈil , a ntiˈ tumil , ex ntiˈ tnabˈl , quˈn bˈiˈn tuˈn , qa noq te joybˈil qˈojjo anetziˈn .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Quˈn jun taqˈnil qMan Dios ntiˈ tuˈn tten toj qˈoj , qalaˈ cheˈw tanmin tukˈa tkyaqil , tbˈanil tnabˈl tuˈn t ‑ xnaqˈtzin , ex mi nxi lipin kyiˈjjo nchi yolbˈin tiˈj .

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: Qalaˈ chebˈe tuˈn kyxi tkawiˈn ayeˈ mi nxi kynimin , qapetla taqˈ Dios tuˈn tajtz tiˈj kyanmin ex tuˈn tel kynikyˈ te Tyol , a twutzxix ,

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: tuˈntzintla kytzaqpaj toj tqˈobˈ tajaw il , a tzyulkye ex tuˈn kybˈinchinte tzeˈnkuxjo taj .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: Tzˈelxix tnikyˈa tiˈjjo lo : Aj chˈixtaq tjapin bˈaj tqˈijil twutz txˈotxˈ , tzul kanin jun qˈij te bˈisbˈajil .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: Quˈn iteˈ xjal k ‑ okil qe kykˈuˈj kyiˈjx ex tiˈj pwaq , nimsil kyibˈqe , ex laˈjilqe , xoˈl yolqe tiˈj Dios , k ‑ elil kyiˈjlin kytata ex mi txi kyqˈoˈn chjonte kye , ex nya wenqe .

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: Mi ntzaj qˈaqˈin kykˈuˈj kyiˈj txqantl , aj qˈojilqe , iqil yolqe , mibˈin chi tzyuˈn kyibˈ , kuj kyanmin , ikyˈil tiˈj tkyaqiljo bˈaˈn ,

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: noq nchi ok bˈuˈkˈj , ex ntiˈx kyxobˈil tuˈn kyok lipin tiˈj jun tiˈ , xkabˈilqe , ex oˈkx npon kykˈuˈj tiˈj jniˈ achbˈil nya bˈaˈn , a tzeˈnku ntqanin kyxmilil ; ex ntiˈx chˈin nkubˈ kybˈisin tiˈj qMan Dios .

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: Ex k ‑ okil kyqˈoˈn kyibˈ tzeˈnkuˈ jun nimil kyxola . Me noq tuˈn kybˈinchbˈin , k ‑ elil kynikyˈtzajil qa nya nimilqe , ex qa tuˈn ikyjo , ntiˈ tipin Dios kyukˈa . Paˈmil tibˈa kyiˈjjo xjal anetziˈn .

text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses , and lead captive silly women laden with sins , led away with divers lusts ,
text2: Me kyxoljo xjal ayeˈ , at junjun tbˈanilxix tumil toj kywutz tuˈn kykubˈxjal kyuˈn , ex tuˈn kysbˈuˈn kyiˈjjo qya , ayeˈ kyaj tuˈn tel kynikyˈ teˈ twutzxix , chi chiˈ , me tuˈn lajoˈnqe tuˈn il , ex tuˈn jniˈ achbˈil , a tzeˈnku ntqanin kyxmilil , jun paqx nchex lipe kyiˈjjo xnaqˈtzbˈil , a tbˈanilx tbˈijte ; me tuˈn tpajjo kabˈe kykˈuˈj , nlay bˈant tuˈn tel kynikyˈ teˈ a twutzxix .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Ikyxsiˈn tzeˈnku bˈaj kye Janes ex Jambres , tej tel kyikyˈin Moisés , ex ikyqexsintzjo xnaqˈtzil kyxola ma tzˈel kyikyˈin tkyaqiljo twutzxix . Ma tzˈok naj kynabˈl , ex o chi kubˈ tzˈaq toj kynimbˈil .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: Me nlay chˈiyjo kyxnaqˈtzbˈil , quˈn tkyaqilxjal k ‑ elil tnikyˈ te qa ntiˈ tajbˈin kyxnaqˈtzbˈil , tzeˈnkuj bˈaj kyej kabˈe , ayej i el ikyˈinte Moisés .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: Tzeˈn te , bˈiˈn tuˈn ajo nxnaqˈtzbˈiˈn : Tzeˈn ẍin bˈetiˈy , tzeˈn nbˈisa , tzeˈn nnimbˈila , ex tzeˈn woybˈila tiˈjjo tajbˈil qMan Dios ; tzeˈn tqˈaqˈbˈil nkˈuˈja kyiˈj txqantl , tzeˈn nkujbˈila

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: twutz tkyaqiljo nya bˈaˈn ex jniˈ yajbˈil s ‑ ul kanin wiˈja kyuˈnxjal . Ojtzqiˈnl tuˈn , tiˈ s ‑ ikyˈx wiˈja kyojjo tnam Antyokiy , a Iconio ex Listra . Me toj tkyaqiljo luˈn , ma chin kleta tuˈn qAjaw Jesús .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: Quˈn kykyaqilxjo , a kyaj tuˈn kybˈet tojxix tumil , tzeˈnku taj Crist , a Jesús , ok kyˈelix yajbˈil kyuˈn .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: Me ayetzin kyeˈ xjal nya wenqe , noqx kyja chi xela toj najin , quˈn nchi sbˈuˈn kyiˈj txqantl , quˈn tuˈn o chi sbˈet .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: Me atzin te , weˈkuxixa toj tkyaqiljo ma bˈaj t ‑ xnaqˈtzin , quˈn ma tzˈel tnikyˈa te , ex ojtzqiˈnl tuˈn , alkyeqe ẍi xnaqˈtzin teˈy .

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ex quˈn ojtzqiˈnl tuˈn , ajo Xjan Tuˈjil Tyol Dios atxix toj tkˈwalila , ex bˈiˈnl tuˈn , qa noq tuˈn yol anetziˈn , aku tzˈele tnikyˈa te kolbˈil te jun majx , noq tuˈn tnimbˈila tiˈj Crist , a Jesús .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Quˈn tkyaqiljo Tuˈjil Tyol qMan Dios , ax o qˈmante . Tuˈnpetziˈn , at tajbˈin te xnaqˈtzbˈil , te kawbˈil tiˈjjo nya wen , te jikysbˈil , ex te qˈolte tumil , tuˈntzin qbˈet tzˈaqle toj qchwinqil ,

text: That the man of God may be perfect , throughly furnished unto all good works .
text2: tuˈntzintla aye xjal , a nchi ajbˈin te Dios , tuˈn kyok tzˈaqleqe tiˈj tkyaqil , ex bˈantninl kyten , tuˈn kybˈinchin te tkyaqiljo bˈaˈn .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Kxel woqxeninxixa teˈy twutz qMan Dios ex twutz Crist , a Jesús , a Nmaq Kawil tibˈaj tkyaqil , ex chˈix tul kawil kyiˈjjo tkyaqil xjal , a itzˈqex ex kyimninqe :

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: Qˈmaˈnxixjiy Tyol Dios . Ex qa at ambˈil tiˈja ex qa ntiˈ , tzˈokx tilil tuˈn , tuˈn tbˈant . Kawinqexa , jikysinqexa , ex chebˈe qˈonxa kynabˈl tukˈa jun xnaqˈtzbˈil toj tumil .

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Quˈn tzul kanin jun qˈij , a jaˈ mi kubˈ kybˈiˈnxjal xnaqˈtzbˈil toj tumil , ex noq tuˈn tachbˈil ojtxe kyten , kchi jyol kyiˈj txqantl xnaqˈtzil , tuˈn kyxnaqˈtzin kyiˈj , a wen toj kywutz tuˈn kybˈinchin tzeˈnkuxjo kyaj tuˈn kybˈinchinte .

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Ex kxel kymeltzˈin kyiˈj teˈ xnaqˈtzbˈil twutzxix , tuˈn t ‑ xi kyqˈoˈn ambˈil teˈ xnaqˈtzbˈil , a tzajnin te ojtxe , a ntiˈ tajbˈin .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: Me atzin te , tenx tnabˈla toj tkyaqiljo lo . Tzikyˈx tkyaqil yajbˈil tuˈn ; qˈonka tilil , tuˈn tyoliˈn tiˈjjo Tbˈanil Tqanil kolbˈil ; japinx tkyaqil taqˈiˈn tuˈn , a ma tzaj tqˈoˈn Dios .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Quˈn ma japin kanin qˈij , jaˈ tuˈn nkubˈ bˈyoˈniˈy , jaˈ tuˈn wokiˈy tzeˈnku jun oyaj twutz Dios .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Ma japin bˈaj nnimbˈila wuˈn , tzeˈnku jun wen xoˈl qˈaqˈ ma kanbˈin toj jyoj qˈoj , ex tzeˈnku jun rinil ma kanbˈin toj rinbˈil . Ma tzˈok nqˈoˈn tilil , tuˈn mix ja xkyij ntzaqpiˈn nnimbˈila .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Atziˈn jaˈlin , noq nchin ayoˈn tiˈjjo tbˈanil oyaj ktzajil qˈoˈn weˈy tuˈn Kawil tzˈaqlexix , a qAjaw , aj tjapin tqˈijil . Ex nya noq te weˈy ; qalaˈ majx kye jniˈ nchi ayoˈn tiˈj tulil tukˈa tzaljbˈil .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: Bˈaˈnx jyoˈn tumil tzeˈn tten tuˈn tula lol weˈy liweyxix ,

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
text2: quˈn ate Demas , ma chin kyij ttzaqpiˈn tuˈn t ‑ xi Tesalónica , quˈn ma pon tkˈuˈj tiˈjjo at tzaluˈn twutz txˈotxˈ . Atzin te Crescente o txiˈ toj txˈotxˈ Galacia ; ex ikyxjo te Tito , o txiˈ toj Dalmacia .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Oˈkx Lucas at wukˈiy . Kˈlentza Marks tukˈiy , quˈn at ‑ xix tajbˈin mojil weˈy toj aqˈuntl .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: Atzin te Tíquico , ma txi nsmaˈn toj Éfeso .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Aj ttzaja , liwey tzikyˈa qˈilte ntxoˈwa , aj kyij nqˈoˈn toj tnam Troas toj tja Carpo . Ex kˈaˈ chi tzaj tiˈnjiy wuˈja , exqetziˈn ojtxe uˈj , quˈn ayetzin at ‑ xix kyajbˈin weˈy .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: Atzin te Lejantr , a txˈnol kxbˈil , nimx nya bˈaˈn ma kubˈ tbˈinchin wiˈja . Ax qAjaw ktzajil qˈoˈnte t ‑ xel te , tiˈj tkyaqiljo ma bˈant tuˈn .

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: Bˈaˈnx kaˈyin tibˈa te , quˈn nimxix nqˈojin tiˈjjo qxnaqˈtzbˈil jaˈlin .
